page1.title: Pariyerum Perumal
page1.description: Although an idealistic youth is optimistic about his future as he enters college, a tragic chain of events will wake him up to the harsher realities of life.

page1.title: Aan Devathai
page1.description: A husband and wife, who are poles apart, go through a lean patch after they start living separately.

page1.title: Kaaththamma
page1.description: Kathamma is directed by MD Sukumaran and featured Biju, Aathira and Ashok Raj as lead characters.

Ram is a photographer and nature lover who travels all around India capturing moments. On a chance visit to his hometown Tanjavur, he goes into his school and begins to walk down memory lane to 1994 when he was a student harboring feelings for his classmate Janu.

page1.title: Seema Raja
page1.description: The prince of a town falls for a common woman.

page1.title: Ratsasan
page1.description: A rookie cop attempts to track down a serial killer who is murdering young school girls.

page2.title: Irukku Aana Illai
page2.description: Venkat meets with an accident in which Divya loses her life. However, she starts to haunt him as a ghost. What does she want?. Based on the Korean comedy horror film 'Ghost".

page2.title: Saamy 2
page2.description: A cop seeks revenge against the criminal who murdered his father.

page2.title: U Turn
page2.description: When a flyover in the city becomes the hotbed of accidents, a young reporter decides to investigate the issue. Her quest for an answer would lead her into a web of intrigue, murder and mystery.

page2.title: Megha
page2.description: Megha is a romantic-thriller starring Ashwin Kakmanu. The protagonist plays the role of a forensic expert who specializes in gunshot wounds. Maestro Ilaiyaraaja composes the music for the film.

page2.title: Imaikkaa Nodigal
page2.description: A situational story focalizing on how an unknown person named Rudra gets trapped by an intelligent CBI officer for the series of murders attempted by him.

page2.title: Vanjagar Ulagam
page2.description: A woman is murdered and her neighbor is picked up as a suspect. Meanwhile, a journalist believes he can use this murder to lure an elusive gangster, with help from the guy’s former accomplice.

page3.title: Kolamaavu Kokila
page3.description: Nayanthara plays the titular role of Kokila who is forced to enter the drugs business because of unfortunate circumstances in her family.

page3.title: Thalaivan
page3.description: As the state police are busy eliminating the criminal gang of Daniel, a notorious terrorist, Thalaivan crops up as a bigger threat to the police department.

page3.title: Echcharikkai Idhu Manidhargal Nadamaadum Idam
page3.description: Two men kidnap the daughter of a rich man, and the latter approaches a retired cop to track the missing woman.

page3.title: Goli Soda 2
page3.description: Sequel to 2015 film Goli Soda, a taxi driver, a gangster, and an athlete struggle to better their lives despite obstacles such as crooked politicians, evil dons and caste barriers.

page3.title: Pandiya Naadu
page3.description: A man goes against a mafia gang to avenge his brother's death. A super hit action film!!

page3.title: Vishwaroopam II
page3.description: RAW agent Wisam Ahmad Kashmiri prevents an al-Qaida terrorist from executing a massive attack on New York. He must now wade through further traps and conspiracies to thwart a new plot against three democratic nations.

page4.title: Merku Thodarchi Malai
page4.description: It revolves around the life and times of a group of people living along the foothills of the Western Ghats. A critically acclaimed movie directed by debutant Lenin Bharathi and produced by actor Vijay Sethupathi.

page4.title: Lakshmi
page4.description: Ten-year-old Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition, however, her single mother Nandini detests music and dance.

page4.title: Pencil
page4.description: Two school students find their classmate murdered in their classroom and decide to track down the killer. Based on 2009 South Korean film 4th Period Mystery.

page4.title: Pyaar Prema Kaadhal
page4.description: Sree falls for a woman whom his conservative parents most certainly wouldn't approve of.

page4.title: Meiyyazhagi
page4.description: Meiyyazhagi, a young woman, wants to take care of her disabled brother Deva, which makes marriage a difficult proposition. Meanwhile, the village’s big shot lusts after her and plots to marry her at all cost.

page4.title: Aviyal
page4.description: An anthology of short films contains four shorts with a prelude that are linked by their genre.

page5.title: Kuraiondrumillai
page5.description: A heartwarming and very realistic tale of youth, relationships and advancement in rural sectors.This movie was produced through crowdfunding of over 60 investors.

page5.title: Oru Kanniyum Moonu Kalavaanikalum
page5.description: Tamizh, Malar, and Esakki are three friends who are planning to kidnap Isabella, Tamizh's girlfriend, who is being forced by her rich father to marry against her wishes. A fantasy comedy film!!

page5.title: Unnil Tholaindhein
page5.description: Sivakumar, a resident of Tiruvarur lands himself a job as a sub-editor in a TV station in Bangalore. Circumstances land him face-to-face with a powerful politician, who is considered as the main instigator of riots in the Kavery water river-sharing dispute.

page5.title: Ghajinikanth
page5.description: A forgetful young man falls in love with a girl whose father hates his condition. A remake of  2015 Telugu film Bhale Bhale Magadivoy.

page5.title: Madha Yaanai Koottam
page5.description: The film is a story of two families who are always at loggerheads with each other. A family-drama-thriller!!

page5.title: Junga
page5.description: A simpleton has to turn into a quirky, albeit miserly, don to save his legacy and his ancestral property, a movie hall.

page6.title: Mohini
page6.description: A disfigured man meets a strikingly beautiful woman who claims to love him. Who is she?

page6.title: Tamizh Padam 2
page6.description: An ex-cop rejoins the police department in an attempt to bring down the gangster who laid waste to his life.

page6.title: Kadaikutty Singam
page6.description: Gunasingam, a family-loving farmer who hails from a small town, tries his best to keep his big family united.

page6.title: Joker
page6.description: Mannar Mannan, an ordinary villager, decides to call himself the president of the country and stars fighting against the injustices he comes across in his society. What’s his agenda? A critically acclaimed political satire !!

page6.title: Onaayum Aattukkuttiyum
page6.description: A morbid tale about morals and redemption along with a cynical look at a world run by a pack of wolves, one that’s cruel to the innocents. A neo-noir crime thriller !!

page6.title: Aagam
page6.description: An ambitious youngster who feels very strongly about brain drain gets embroiled in a conspiracy, which borders on what they call, knowledge terrorism.

page7.title: Mr. Chandramouli
page7.description: The film revolves around Raghav, a professional boxer, finds himself in a fix when an unexpected turn of events gets him tangled in a battle between his passion, family and the love of his life.

page7.title: Tik Tik Tik
page7.description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of a city is days away from impacting Earth, India recruits a misfit team to somehow divert it or destroy it.

page7.title: Poriyaalan
page7.description: The movie is about the struggle of an ambitious civil engineer (Harish Kalyan) who quits his regular job as an assistant engineer, with the hope to begin a new construction firm, but falls prey to a land scam and a greedy goon.

page7.title: Ettuthikkum Madhayaanai
page7.description: A young man and his family move into a new town, but his cop-dad is one day, murdered by an unknown gang. Who is behind the killing and how is this connected to the murder of his childhood friend?

page7.title: Kaala
page7.description: Kaala who runs away from Tirunelveli in his childhood, moves to Mumbai where he becomes a powerful don living in the slums of Dharavi.

page7.title: Asuravadham
page7.description: A stranger keeps threatening a man, promising him that he will kill him after a week. Who is the stranger and what is he after? An action-thriller!!

page8.title: Chennai Ungalai Anbudan Varaverkirathu
page8.description: The movie is all about the life of bachelors who throng Chennai to start their careers. A comedy-drama!!

page8.title: Semma Botha Aagatha
page8.description: After a night of binge drinking, a youngster decides to invite a call girl home on the advice of his friend. When the girl ends up dead in his apartment in his absence, he has to track down the person who could have murdered her.

page8.title: Oru Kidayin Karunai Manu
page8.description: People of a village go on a trip to their neighbouring village to offer a goat as a sacrifice with a newlywed couple. On a remote thoroughfare, there is an accident and a local is found dead. What happens next?

page8.title: Pichaikkaran
page8.description: After his mother meets with an accident in her factory, a rich businessman becomes a beggar for 48 days, in order to save her life. A super hit action-thriller!!

page8.title: Nadigaiyar Thilagam
page8.description: The life story of South Indian actress Savitri, who took the film industry by storm in the late '50s and '60s.

page8.title: 6 Candles
page8.description: This film sees the lead character sport six different looks and going around six different states to solve a mystery. The film is extensively shot in 6 different metro cities of India. A crime thriller!!

page9.title: Nila
page9.description: A young man meets his childhood love one rainy night in the city of dreams. When they both realise that the desire for more can ruin what is special between them do they listen to their head or their heart?

page9.title: Revelations
page9.description: After four years together, a husband and wife become entangled in secret, sexually charged relationships that threaten to unravel their marriage. The only Tamil movie selected in Busan International film festival.

page9.title: Manusana Nee
page9.description: A lot of youth had been missing in the city and the police have started investigating. At the same time, Aadarsh, who got injured during a fight, was admitted to a hospital. Is there any link between Aadarsh’s treatment and the missing youngsters?

page9.title: Irumbu Thirai
page9.description: The story deals with hacking and the leak of information, how in the days of interconnections, the privacy of a person doesn't hold power, as anyone can be hacked and their personal information stolen from them. A techno-thriller!!

page9.title: Sema
page9.description: A vegetable vendor marries a girl against her father's wish. The couple, with the help of their respective mothers, manage to hide it from the girl's father till she gives birth to a child.

page9.title: Kaala Koothu
page9.description: Two school boys become thick friends after a shared life experience. They grow up and fall in love with two young women. Just when things finally seem to be going their way, tragedy strikes.

page10.title: Kalki
page10.description: A scientist trying to solve one of the universe's greatest puzzles begins a romance with a much younger colleague that's haunted by a dark secret. A sci-fi short film!!

page10.title: Aandavar
page10.description: Amuthan an engineering unemployed guy whose is also a meme creator stumbles upon a unique scientific device and that changes his life forever. An Award Winning Indian Short Film!!

page10.title: Theru Naaigal
page10.description: The key plot points around corporate interventions and issues that farmers face due to it. An action drama!!

page10.title: Sawaari
page10.description: A harmless driver who is trying to deliver a car on time from Chennai to Nellore ends up getting into a tangle with the police and a psycho killer. An action-thriller!!

page10.title: Radiopetti
page10.description: A story of a 70-year-old man, partially deaf and is extremely fond of the valve radio, a gift from his dad when he was a child and he sees his dad through the radio. First Tamil film to win the Audience Award in Busan International Film Festival 2015.

page10.title: Kaali
page10.description: A successful surgeon who is living the U.S. learns that he was adopted and decides to travel to India to track down his parents.

page11.title: Metro
page11.description: The film is based on the theme of chain snatching in the city of Chennai. The film was remade in Kannada as Siliconn City. An action crime thriller!!

page11.title: Iruttu Araiyil Murattu Kuthu
page11.description: Two couples who are staying at a beachside bungalow are "haunted" by a ghost which has an insatiable sex drive. An adult horror-comedy!!

page11.title: Idam Porul Aavi
page11.description: It is a two-dimensional story, one trying to unveil an age-old unknown mystery, and another experiencing the existence of the unknown. (Dubbed Version of 2016 Kannada Horror movie Karvaa.)

page11.title: Yendha Nerathilum
page11.description: A woman Jennifer along with her daughter and husband shifts to their bungalow in Kothagiri where they lived earlier. All hell breaks loose when Jennifer starts experiencing supernatural things. A horror thriller!!

page11.title: Baaskar Oru Rascal
page11.description: Two children raised by single parents want to enjoy the happiness of a complete family. To achieve this, they try to unite their parents, but end up in trouble.

page11.title: Iravukku Aayiram Kangal
page11.description: Three strangers, who were cheated by a three-member fraud gang, hatch plan to take revenge on their leader, and go to his home around same time. All of them get the shock of their life when they find someone murdered at the home.

page12.title: Mercury
page12.description: Five friends, all affected in some way by a mercury poisoning incident are partying when a freak accident put them on a collision course with an entity that is in no mood to forgive their misgivings. A sound film which lacks dialogues!!

page12.title: Diya
page12.description: After abortion, a woman's life takes an unexpected turn when she is visited by the foetus, who is now grown up and is visible to her.

page12.title: Pakka
page12.description: A heart-broken girl who decides to commit suicide is saved by a person who is a look alike of the former’s lover.

page12.title: Padaiveeran
page12.description: A care-free youngster sets out to become a cop and comes back to his village to control a riot. He realizes that he has to take on people, who are close to him, to manage the situation. Based on a true story!!

page12.title: Aayirathil Oruvan
page12.description: A doctor gets captured as a slave for treating the rebels who are fighting against the king. However, in a turn of events, he saves the life of a pirate, who agrees to help him liberate the slaves. Digital- Color- Version!!

page12.title: Sathya
page12.description: An IT employee, who works in Australia, gets a call from his ex-lover, asking him to help her find her missing daughter.A remake of 2016 Telugu crime-thriller movie Kshanam.

page13.title: Unakkenna Venum Sollu
page13.description: While visiting Chennai to treat their ill son, a couple encounter a paranormal presence. A horror movie!!

page13.title: Ulkuthu
page13.description: A stranger comes to a coastal village and gets into a tiff with the local gangster and his son. An action-comedy-drama!!

page13.title: Yemaali
page13.description: Mali's world is turned upside down when his girlfriend announces her decision to break up with him. Vengeful and embittered, he plots to murder her with the help of his confidant Aravind. A romantic thriller!!

page13.title: Sollividava
page13.description: The battle between two journalists takes a back burner when they are forced to work together while covering the Kargil War. This movie was released in Kannada as Prema Baraha. A bilingual romantic drama!!

page13.title: Karuppan
page13.description: A man wins the hand of a girl after winning in Jallikattu - a traditional event in Tamil Nadu, but her relative, who had hopes of marrying her, tries to cause a permanent rift between the couple. An action-comedy!!

page13.title: Nagesh Thiraiyarangam
page13.description: A real estate dealer, who sets out to sell his father’s old property, a movie theatre, finds that the building is possessed by a ghost. A horror cinema!!

page14.title: Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru
page14.description: A former cop looks back on the case which left him disabled and forced him to quit the force. A neo-noir crime thriller film!!

page14.title: Ethirmarai
page14.description: A detective is investigating a murder series, and he is torn between the case and family problems. A crime thriller!!

page14.title: Puthiya Paravai
page14.description: The plot revolves around Gopal, a businessman who falls in love with a woman named Latha but is haunted by the death of his wife Chitra.A remake of the Bengali film Sesh Anka (1963). A romantic thriller!!

page14.title: Veera
page14.description: Two friends, who aspire to take control of things in their locality, face a series of issues when they take up an assignment involving kidnapping a politician’s daughter.

page14.title: Kaathadi
page14.description: A story of two petty thieves Sakthi and Thuppakki who plan on kidnapping a kid and hold her for ransom.But things don't go as per plan. A comedy-drama!!

page14.title: Yenda Thalaiyila Yenna Vekkala
page14.description: A young engineering graduate is trying to settle down in life. Just as everything seems to be going fine for him, in an unfortunate incident he gets picked up by a mystical force and is forced to finish certain anonymous tasks or face death.

page15.title: Veeraiyan
page15.description: A teenage student, who fails to live up to the expectations of his doting father, seeks the help of a few anti-social people to continue his education.

page15.title: Imai
page15.description: Imai is based on the love story of a ruffian and an intelligent girl. The movie is inspired by a real story, which was narrated to the director by a co-passenger during one of his train journeys.

page15.title: 6 Athiyayam
page15.description: 6 Athiyayam is an anthology that has 6 stories helmed by 6 different directors.The stories are correlated and the climax of each story is revealed only in the finale that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

page15.title: Padmaavat
page15.description: Padmaavat is a 2018 Indian epic period drama film directed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Loosely based on the epic poem Padmavat by Malik Muhammad Jayasi, it is one of the most expensive Indian films ever made.

page15.title: Solo
page15.description: Solo tells the story of four different people, each story revolving around four different elements: Earth, Fire, Wind and Water, each with the different facets of Lord Shiva.A 2017 bilingual experimental anthology art film !!

page15.title: Dangal
page15.description: Dangal is an extraordinary true story based on the life of Mahavir Singh and his two daughters, Geeta and Babita Phogat. The film traces the inspirational journey of a father who trains his daughters to become world class wrestlers.

page16.title: Adhe Kangal
page16.description: A visually impaired chef (Kalaiyarasan) falls hard for a woman (Shivada Nair) he barely knows. A romantic action thriller film !!

page16.title: Kanavu Variyam
page16.description: The film revolves around power cuts and electricity deficit in the villages of Tamil Nadu, India.This film was screened at several international film festivals and received a number of awards and recognition.

page16.title: Thaanaa Serndha Koottam
page16.description: Inspired by a real-life incident in 1987 when a group posing as CBI raided a jewelry showroom in Mumbai and robbed money from there. The film is an adaptation of the 2013 Hindi film Special 26.

page16.title: Ivan Yarendru Therikiratha
page16.description: Ivan Yarendru Therikiratha is a rom-com about a young man who is born on Valentine's Day and yet, he has not been lucky when it comes to relationships.

page16.title: Naachiyaar
page16.description: The film tells the tale of the police working to uncover the truth after a young man is accused of assaulting his girlfriend.

page16.title: Aranmanai 2
page16.description: Murali returns to his ancestral palace along with his fiancée as his father lands in a coma under mysterious circumstances. However, his life takes a turn when he uncovers dark secrets of his family.

page17.title: Kalakalappu 2
page17.description: An ex-minister tries to get back a laptop containing the details about his corrupt wealth, but his auditor blackmails him for money. Meanwhile, three young men, with their own problems, get involved in this.

page17.title: Oru Nalla Naal Paathu Solren
page17.description: The film depicts the life of Yaman, while he goes to the city and also lives in the forest with his tribal community who follow a distinct set of rules.

page17.title: Nimir
page17.description: An amiable photographer in a small-town, who is nursing a breakup, unwittingly becomes embroiled in a street brawl that turns him into a man obsessed with revenge.A remake of the 2016 Malayalam film Maheshinte Prathikaaram.

page17.title: Marudhu
page17.description: In an effort to please his grandmother, a man rescues a young woman and her father, who find themselves in trouble with a local thug.

page17.title: Gulaebaghavali
page17.description: A don sends three petty criminals to recover a treasure that was buried by his grandfather in the village of Gulaebaghavali.

page17.title: Sketch
page17.description: A man who repossesses cars for a local loan shark makes the mistake of seizing a crazed gangster's prized possession, a vintage Fiat.

page18.title: Mannar Vagaiyara
page18.description: A care-free youngster lands in trouble when he helps his brother to win the lady of his life. An action comedy !!

page18.title: Kalavaadiya Pozhuthugal
page18.description: The unexpected meeting of two ex-lovers after a long time affect the equation of their respective families.

page18.title: Balloon
page18.description: A filmmaker goes to check out a haunted house in Ooty to seek inspiration for a horror film, not realizing that the place has a connection with his past.

page18.title: Dhilluku Dhuddu
page18.description: A man (Santhanam) battles his prospective father-in-law (Saurabh Shukla) and several vengeful ghosts at a remote mansion.

page18.title: Velaikkaran
page18.description: A youth from the slums fights to end food adulteration that is being committed by large manufacturing companies.

page18.title: Aruvi
page18.description: Twenty-four-year-old Aruvi is held by the cops for holding a TV studio under siege. Who is she and how did she end up in this situation?

page19.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
page19.description: The film which literally means Five Five Five is a thriller which revolves around the psyche of people and the action-reactions owing to the mind games.

page19.title: Annadurai
page19.description: The lives of twin brothers Annadurai and Thambidurai change radically following a murder that the former commits. How does he ensure that his sibling regains his old life?

page19.title: Maayavan
page19.description: This is a thriller story about how police work, struggle and fight to catch the real criminals. A mystery thriller!!

page19.title: Kodiveeran
page19.description: To protect his sister and her husband, a man who is revered as God by his villagers takes on the evil men who are hell-bent on destroying their lives.

page19.title: Richie
page19.description: A journalist tries to find the real virtue of a man called Richie from people who had known him.A remake of the 2014 Kannada film Ulidavaru Kandanthe.

page19.title: Uruthikol
page19.description: A school dropout tries to track down the men who might have kidnapped his sister.

page20.title: Thiruttu Payale 2
page20.description: A police inspector attempts to track down a man who uses Facebook to prey on innocent women.

page20.title: En Aaloda Seruppa Kaanom
page20.description: The adventures of a young man who tries to trace the missing slipper of the girl he is in love with.

An ardent Rajinikanth fan tries every trick in the book to escape prison in a bid to watch his idol's latest film. 12-12-1950 is a comedy-thriller that's in equal parts a fun-filled romp and a tribute to the legendary actor.

page20.title: Enbathettu (88)
page20.description: A family-oriented man is caught off-guard when his number is misused by a bunch of gangsters. He then tries to find a way out this trouble, highlighting how people, especially the youth, should use technology wisely and be wary of being too exposed to it.

page20.title: Indrajith
page20.description: An adventurous youngster sets out in search of a precious stone, somewhere in the forests of north east, accompanied by an archaeological survey team.

page20.title: Theeran Adhigaaram Ondru
page20.description: Theeran, a police officer, tries to decode a series of cold blood events based on same pattern. The story is based on true events operation Bawaria Case.

page21.title: Thupparivaalan
page21.description: While investigating the killing of a dog, a detective uncovers a series of bizarre and seemingly unrelated crimes.

page21.title: Aval
page21.description: Two families have a tough time dealing with a revenge-seeking spirit, which is strangely connected with one of its members.

page21.title: Kadaisi Bench Karthi
page21.description: Kadaisi Bench Karthi is a comedy movie that highlights the ill effects that a smartphone can have in romantic relationships. An Adult Entertainer!!

page21.title: Chennaiyil Oru Naal 2
page21.description: The story revolves around two bad guys who struggle with forces of good and evil while exploring the psychological secret that people tend to bury deep within their minds.

page21.title: Mersal
page21.description: An Indian doctor living in Europe comes back home to solve a healthcare threat that is looming over the country, and in the process,he unravels the mystery surrounding his father's death.

page21.title: Spyder
page21.description: A surveillance expert who wants to help people comes across a foe who is the very definition of evil. Can he stop the man before he destroys everything?

page22.title: Hara Hara Mahadevaki
page22.description: A coming-of-age film that centres on a loving couple. The film follows the couple's romantic relationship and eventually, their breakup with each other. An Adult entertainer!!

page22.title: Aayirathil Iruvar
page22.description: Twin brothers who have been cat-and-mouse right from inside their mother's womb get separated when they are young. What happens to their enmity once they meet again?

page22.title: Magalir Mattum
page22.description: A progressive-minded documentary filmmaker reunites three older women who have been separated since college and takes them on a trip.

page22.title: Vivegam
page22.description: When the former head of an elite counter-terrorism squad goes rogue, a group of agents are assembled in a bid to bring him down. But is there more to the enigma surrounding him than meets the eye?

page22.title: Puriyatha Puthir
page22.description: A man's tentative romance with a music teacher hits a sour note when he begins receiving compromising videos of her from an anonymous sender.

page22.title: Chennai Express (Tamil)
page22.description: A man's (Shahrukh Khan) trip to fulfill his late grandfather's last wish turns into an unexpected adventure when he meets a unique young woman (Deepika Padukone) from southern India. (Tamil Dubbed)

page23.title: Marupakkam
page23.description: Marupakkam is a 1991 award-winning drama feature film directed by K.S. Sethu Madhavan. The film is in Tamil with English subtitles. The film is based on Tamil novel, Uchi Veyyil written by Indira Parthasarathy.

page23.title: Nadhi Karaiyinile
page23.description: Nadhi Karaiyinile is a 2003 Tamil drama film, written and directed by Ponvannan. The movie won three State film awards including the recognition as Best Film portraying Women in Good Light.

page23.title: Gandhi
page23.description: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.(Tamil Dubbed)

page23.title: Adigaram 79
page23.description: An amnesiac and a notorious assassin once shared their childhood, and the knowledge of an ancient Indian martial art. A contemporary action-drama set against the backdrop of ancient Indian martial arts.

page23.title: Thaandavam
page23.description: A special agent (Vikram) must prove his innocence after militants frame him and make him appear to be a traitor to India.

page23.title: Velaiilla Pattadhari 2
page23.description: When a jobless graduate flounders around trying to find work, he loses respect from his wife, family and friends. But when he gets involved with a powerful woman in the corporate world, his life turns around and he becomes a powerful man himself.

page24.title: Kootathil Oruthan
page24.description: Arvind, an ordinary Joe who is not noticed by any, be it at home, school or among friends falls in love with Janani, a class topper and an all-rounder who excels in sports and extra-curricular activities.

page24.title: Nibunan
page24.description: A daring Deputy Superintendent of Police and his two charismatic subordinates are set to hunt down a meticulous serial killer.As the police trio is drawn further into the dark tunnels of the case, a haunting secret unfolds.

page24.title: Vikram Vedha
page24.description: A team lead by Vikram, a ruthless, no-nonsense encounter cop, is on the hunt to capture or kill Vedha, a dreaded gangster. A neo-noir crime thriller film!!

page24.title: Meesaya Murukku
page24.description: The film follows a semi-autobiographical plot depicting Adhithya Ramachandran alias Adhi (Adhi) in his journey from a middle-class youth in Coimbatore to a leading Tamil hip-hop musician.

page24.title: Pandigai
page24.description: A low-level hotel worker gets involved in a street fighting racket on the advice of a compulsive gambler. When the duo realise they have been duped by the gangster controlling the racket, they decided to rob him…

page24.title: Gemini Ganeshanum Suruli Raajanum
page24.description: A romantic youngster, who manages to have several relationships with pretty girls, realises his mistakes and finally decides to settle down in life by marrying one among them.

page25.title: Yevanavan
page25.description: Yevanan is a Tamil movie starring Sonia Agarwal and Vincent Ashokan in prominent roles. The movie also stars Delhi Ganesh. It is an action-crime- drama directed by Natty Kumar.

page25.title: Ivan Thanthiran
page25.description: Two engineering college dropouts find and expose the wrong doings of the education minister in the social medias. Now the minister has to prove himself that he's innocent and he's looking for the guys who did this to him.

page25.title: Vanamagan
page25.description: A jungle-dweller who is injured and has no memory of his past winds up in the care of a spoiled, rich girl.

page25.title: Anbanavan Asaradhavan Adangadhavan
page25.description: A local gangster in Madurai bids adeiu to his past life. Years later in his late 50's, he falls in love with a girl which changes his life.

page25.title: Rangoon
page25.description: A thrilling action-drama about three friends who are betrayed during a high-value gold deal in Burma. The film is set against the never-before-explored Burmese community in North Chennai.

page25.title: Sathriyan
page25.description: A young and steadily rising rowdy Guna falls in love with the daughter of a deceased don Samuthiram. Can he defeat all opposition and marry her?

page26.title: Maragadha Naanayam
page26.description: Two friends who are in part of a smuggling group plan to steal a emerald stone, said to be protected by the ghost of King Irumborai of the Pallava dynasty. They get help of other ghosts who were killed by the king's ghost for accomplishing the task.

page26.title: Bongu
page26.description: Three hi-tech burglars, who lose their jobs because of a business tycoon, set out to take revenge against him.

page26.title: Thayagam
page26.description: Three death row prisoners escape from the jail and hijack a plane where Abdul Salim, a scientist, owns a miracle drug. The pilot, instead of listening to the hijackers, manages to land in a Kashmir mountain.

page26.title: Rajadurai
page26.description: Rajadurai is a 1993  Tamil film, directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar and produced by A. S. Ibrahim Ravuthar. The film stars Vijayakanth, Jayasudha, Sivaranjani and R. Sundarrajan in lead roles. The film had musical score by Deva.

page26.title: Sangili Bungili Kadhava Thorae
page26.description: A young man who wants to own a house buys a mansion and moves into it with his extended family not knowing that there is a ghost in the place.

page26.title: Yaamirukka Bayamey
page26.description: Yaamirukka Bayamey is a story of a conman, who gets into trouble while enjoying his bounty. Touted to be a spooky horror-comedy, the film revolves around four characters who compete with one another for survival.

page27.title: Whistle
page27.description: Whistle is a 2003 Tamil slasher film which is a remake of the English slasher film Urban Legend. The film starts with a series of murders on a college campus. A woman dressed in black and silver, similar to Ghostface, is responsible for the killings.

page27.title: Thondan
page27.description: A righteous ambulance driver rubs a politician on the wrong side, and the latter decides to teach him a lesson.

page27.title: Lens
page27.description: A porn addict is threatened by a hacker, who orders the guy to witness him commit suicide online.Lens is a bilingual hostage drama written and directed by Jayaprakash Radhakrishnan made simultaneously in Malayalam and Tamil.(Adult Content)

page27.title: Saravanan Irukka Bayamaen
page27.description: Saravanan (Udhayanidhi), a young guy leading a directionless life ends up as the local head of a national party by mistake. His uncle, who wanted that post now tries to teach a lesson to Saravanan.

page27.title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
page27.description: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

page27.title: Kadugu
page27.description: A man goes up against corrupt and powerful people to avenge the crime committed against a child. A critically acclaimed drama directed by Vijay Milton

page28.title: Maanagaram
page28.description: A handful of diverse characters finds themselves in extraordinary situations that are interlinked with one another. An action dramatic thriller!!

page28.title: Pa Paandi
page28.description: A 65 years old man starting a journey to find his first love who broke up 40 years ago. This film was written and directed by Dhanush in his directorial debut.

page28.title: Shivalinga
page28.description: A remake of 2016 Kannada film of the same name.A detective with some unusual qualities investigates a murder.

page28.title: Kaatru Veliyidai
page28.description: An air force pilot and a doctor fall in love, but their contrasting personalities, especially his self-centredness, keep their relationship tense.

page28.title: Kadamban
page28.description: Tribals leading a happy life inside a forest face a series of horrific attacks by those with selfish interests. An action-adventure thriller!!

page28.title: Vettai
page28.description: The film revolves around two brothers, the elder being sensitive to violence and the younger being a jobless rogue, settled in Thoothukudi. After the death of their father, a police officer, the elder brother takes on the same job by request of the younger.

page29.title: Vizha
page29.description: The film, based on the award-winning short film Uthiri, portrays the love story of Sundaram (Mahendran), who plays the thappu instrument at death functions, and Rakkamma (Malavika), an oppari singer.

page29.title: Ya Ya
page29.description: The film is a romcom starring Siva and Santhanam who are named as Dhoni and Sehwag respectively. The names of the two create a huge goof up which forms crux of the film's story.

page29.title: All in All Azhagu Raja
page29.description: Azhaguraja and his friend run an unknown TV channel. When he sees a rich businessman's daughter, he falls head over heels and does everything he can to win her over.

page29.title: Thagaraaru
page29.description: The protagonist and his 3 friends are a gang of notorious robbers who make merry in Madurai. Their way of life earns them a handful of formidable rivals. An intense depiction of friendship and love marred by rivalry and vengeance ensues.

page29.title: Pathala Bhairavi
page29.description: A poor man, in love with a princess, is persuaded by an evil sorcerer to help him get the blessing of a Goddess.

page29.title: Karungali
page29.description: Kanimozhi marries Ravi, a man with a dark past and intense sexual drive. When he meets one of Kanimozhi's patients who cannot conceive, he makes plans to seduce her.

page30.title: Bramman
page30.description: Siva is fascinated by cinema and runs a rundown movie theater. With his theater in financial trouble, he goes to Chennai to meet his childhood friend Madankumar, who is now a film director, and seek his help.

page30.title: Inimey Ippadithan
page30.description: Santhanam plays the role of a jobless youth whose only ambition in life is to marry a beautiful girl. The rest of the story shows how he achieves this with the help of a love guru played by VTV Ganesh.

page30.title: Irudhi Suttru
page30.description: Irudhi Suttru is a battle of wills between a reluctant girl who has all the talent and is least interested in promoting it and a man who sees in her the capacity to achieve what he never could.

page30.title: Padagotti
page30.description: Manickam is the leader of a small fishing community. In the same area, Alaiyappan is the leader of an opposing fishing community.The enmity between the two groups goes way beyond competition.

page30.title: Vallavanukku Pullum Aayudham
page30.description: A remake of the Telugu film Maryada Ramanna.Santhanam plays the lead role of an innocent guy who decides to go to a village to make a living. On the way, he meets a young girl who takes him to her home.

page30.title: Madurai Veeran
page30.description: Madurai Veeran is a 1956 Indian Tamil-language film directed by D. Yoganand, starring M. G. Ramachandran, Bhanumathi Ramakrishna and Padmini

page31.title: Dora
page31.description: The story is about Nayanthara, who plays an innocent girl Pavalakodi. Her attitude changes and she becomes a rebel when she gets her hands on a vintage Austin Cambridge car called Dora, which is possessed.

page31.title: Kavan
page31.description: A TV Reporter rebels against the corrupt practices of his channel boss and tries to get justice for a couple of youngsters who are fighting against a chemical plant.An action dramatic thriller film directed by K. V. Anand.

page31.title: Naiyaandi
page31.description: Danush, a young man living with his brothers, falls love with Nazriya, and they elope to save her from an arranged marriage. Danush disguises her as an orphan in the house, and his brothers have no idea who she really is.

page31.title: Karnan
page31.description: The film is based on the story of Karna, a character from the Hindu epic Mahabharata. He is born to an unmarried mother Kunti who abandons him in the Ganges to avoid embarrassment. The child is discovered and adopted by a charioteer.

page31.title: Anbulla Rajinikanth
page31.description: A bitter cancer patient, Rosy (Meena) meets an actor (Rajinikanth), and both their lives and perspectives change forever.

page31.title: Paambhu Sattai
page31.description: A young man in need of cash to solve his personal problems gets into a tangle with a counterfeit money laundering racket.

page32.title: Inga Enna Solluthu
page32.description: A middle-aged married man narrates the mistakes of his past to a driver while traveling to Chennai on account of an emergency.

page32.title: Dharma Durai
page32.description: The film is about an alcoholic doctor who is a source of shame to his family. He has three brothers who are trying to get rid of him. How did Dharma become an alcoholic? What is the reason behind his rivalry with his brothers?

page32.title: Thaali Bhagyam
page32.description: Nallasivam's & Murugan's family are very close to each other. Nalasivam's desire is to get his daughter Valli married to Murugan. One day Murugan along with Nalasivam goes to see a bride for Nallasivam.Things take a turn from there.

page32.title: Motta Siva Ketta Siva
page32.description: A remake of the 2015 Telugu film Pataas, is a Tamil action thriller about a policeman who battles corruption.Corruption escalates into a conflagration in this story of policemen gone wild.

page32.title: Kuttram 23
page32.description: An Assistant Commissioner of Police (Arun Vijay) investigates the murder of a Church Father and a woman's disappearance.

page32.title: Bruce Lee
page32.description: A cowardly youngster and his friend run for their lives with their lovers as they are being chased by a dreaded don.

page33.title: Yaman
page33.description: Yaman is the story of a common man who is need of money and goes to jail in place of someone else. There, he gets embroiled in a political web, and the rest of the story is how he emerges as the victor.

page33.title: Thiruvilaiyadal
page33.description: The story was inspired by the Thiruvilaiyadal Puranam, a collection of 64 epic stories written in the 16th century by the saint, Paranjothi Munivar, which record the antics of Lord Shiva appearing on Earth in various disguises to test his devotees.

page33.title: Thalaivaa
page33.description: The film is a story of a soft-spoken boy with a keen interest in dance but rises to power and takes the position of a leader. A gangster action thriller film, written and directed by A. L. Vijay!!

page33.title: Selvandhan
page33.description: Harsha, a multi-millionaire who has everything, still feels that there is something missing in his life. In an attempt to fill the void, he adopts a village to bring change in the people.(Tamil Dubbed Version of 2015 Telugu Movie Srimanthudu)

page33.title: Ennodu Vilayadu
page33.description: The film is set against the backdrop of horse racing and betting. The story is about an accountant who steals money from his office to pay his gambling debts. What happens next?

page33.title: Singam 3
page33.description: A reputed cop from Tamil Nadu takes charge in Andhra Pradesh to solve the mysterious murder of a top police officer, and takes on local thugs and criminals during the course of his mission.

page34.title: Bogan
page34.description: A police officer (Jayam Ravi) who is working on a bank robbery case arrests a man (Arvind Swamy) who is harboring a supernatural secret.

page34.title: Karma
page34.description: A popular crime novelist's wife is murdered and he is been interrogated by the Crime Branch special investigation officer. The interrogation leads to various suspects who could have possibly killed the novelist's wife.

page34.title: Thenkasi Pattanam
page34.description: Two friends think they have set each other with the right women.But things are not as it seems.

page34.title: ABCD
page34.description: A chartered accountant has a hard time finding a job but finds many potential love interests as he searches

page34.title: Aai
page34.description: Velu (R. Sarathkumar) living happily with his sister and friends in Palani. Velu stays away from all wanted trouble and is forced to resort to fighting to defend his sister from the local rowdy (Vincent Asokan).

page34.title: Three Roses
page34.description: Three women (Rambha, Jyothika, Laila) spring into action after the arrest of their friend.

page35.title: Thirisoolam
page35.description: It has Sivaji Ganesan playing three different roles. The film was Sivaji's last all-time blockbuster and completed a 200-days run at the box office.

page35.title: Puthiya Vaanam
page35.description: Jeevadurai (Jaiganesh), an honest police officer, was killed by Govindan (Vijayakumar). Thereafter, Rajaratnam (Sathyaraj), Jeevadurai's son, was brought by D.I.G Pandidurai (Sivaji Ganesan) and becomes a police officer.

page35.title: Thodarum
page35.description: A jealous woman wants her husband to marry a new bride after she learns she has a serious heart condition.

page35.title: Thirumathi Oru Vegumathi
page35.description: Uma (Kalpana) struggles hard to make both ends meet for her and her two younger brothers, so when her office colleague Namachivayam proposes to her she declines him saying that she has her brothers' responsibility so she cannot get married.

page35.title: Thendrale Ennai Thodu
page35.description: A Romantic Comedy of mistaken identity.Thendrale Ennai Thodu is a 1985 Tamil romance film written and directed by C. V. Sridhar. The film stars Mohan and debutante Jayashree in lead roles.

page35.title: Rettai Vaal Kuruvi
page35.description: A romantical comedy where a married man falls in love with another lady. He eventually marries her and neither of them knows about their husband's second relationship. Soon things go haywire. How long will he escape the inevitable?

page36.title: Pudhu Manithan
page36.description: Kabali (Sathyaraj) is the slum's rowdy but he has a heart of gold. He has gone to jail many times only because he fought against injustice.

page36.title: Ponmanam
page36.description: A man lives with his wife and kid in a small colony and all is well until a new woman moves in next to his house and falls in love with him.

page36.title: Pagal Nilavu
page36.description: An aimless youth joins a gang out of a sense of gratitude, but complications arise when he falls in love with the sister of the new police officer in town.

page36.title: Paadum Vaanampaadi
page36.description: The film tells the rags-to-riches story of a young street performer. A remake of 1982 Blockbuster movie Disco Dancer.

page36.title: Oru Odai Nadhiyagirathu
page36.description: Raghuvaran visits his friend's place on a tour and one night he happens to see a woman while he was returning from a party. On that rainy night, he rapes her and leaves. Haunted by guilty feelings Raghuvaran search for her later, but unable to find her.

page36.title: Neela Malargal
page36.description: A blind sculptor stays in an ashram and makes friends with a small boy who is suffering from cancer. She falls in love with a guy. That guy asks his parents to permit him to marry her,but his father refuses under the present condition.

page37.title: Nallathoru Kudumbam
page37.description: Nallathoru Kudumbam is the story of Sivaji Ganesan and Vanisri who gets married as per the wish of Sivaji's Grandfather V. K. Ramasamy. Their marital life gets affected as Sivaji continues his close relationship with Vijayalalitha, his girl friend.

page37.title: Naan Yen Pirandhen
page37.description: A man, desperate to earn money, lies to his wealthy employer that he is not married. His boss' daughter, who was unwell, gets better and eventually falls in love with him. Trouble begins when the wife and kids arrive at the village.

page37.title: Naan Vazhavaippen
page37.description: A dying travel agent confesses to a murder he did not commit.

page37.title: Mouna Geethangal
page37.description: The story of a divorced husband eager to reunite with his ex-wife and son.

page37.title: Kizhakke Pogum Rail
page37.description: An aspiring writer is ostracized by the members of his village because he is unconventional. When he falls for a girl who lives in the village, he is forced to fight the system in order to be with her.

page37.title: Kalthoon
page37.description: Kalthoon is a 1981 Indian Tamil film, directed by Major Sundarrajan and produced by S. S. Karuppa Sami. The film stars Sivaji Ganesan, K. R. Vijaya, Major Sundarrajan and Nagesh in lead roles.

page38.title: Iru Medhaigal
page38.description: Iru Medhaigal is a 1984 Indian Tamil film, directed by Muktha Srinivasan and produced by Muktha Ramasami. The film stars Sivaji Ganesan, Saritha, Prabhu and Radha in lead roles.

page38.title: En Annan
page38.description: En Annan, is a 1970 Indian Tamil thriller film directed by Pa.Neelakandhan, starring M. G. Ramachandran in the lead role and J. Jayalalitha, M. N. Nambiar, S. A. Ashokan, Cho Ramaswamy among others

page38.title: Dharma Seelan
page38.description: Thamizh Selvan , an orphan who works in a hospital, tries to discover the truth of his parentage. Though the head of his orphanage claims that a recently deceased nun was his mother, others deny it. So Thamizh teams up with a reporter Durga , he meets at the nun's wake, and the two work to unearth the facts.

page38.title: Bharathan
page38.description: Is a story about a small family consisting of an elder brother Ram Kumar, Younger brother Bharath and Sister in law Sulochana. Ram Kumar one day disappeared and Bharath decides to go and search for him How does Bharath find his brother?

page38.title: Bairavaa
page38.description: Bairavaa (Vijay) is a collection officer who meets and falls in love with Malarvizhi, a medical college student trying to take on the education mafia. It's time for the collection officer to up his game and help take on the mafia. An action packed thriller!

page38.title: Achamindri
page38.description: A pickpocket, his girlfriend and a cop become the targets of an education racket. ​

page39.title: Mo
page39.description: Three conmen who become fake shamans to earn their living get the shock of their life when they encounter an unknown spirit.

page39.title: Veera Sivaji
page39.description: A taxi driver has a series of adventures on the journey from Puducherry to Kanyakumari.

page39.title: Maaveeran Kittu
page39.description: The film talks about caste discrimination set in the 1980s backdrop. An unexpected murder happens in a village, and Vishnu becomes the accused, unfortunately. Did Vishnu really execute the murder? Or is he falsely accused?

page39.title: Kaashmora
page39.description: Kaashmora, a present era black magic specialist; Rajnayak, an ancient era warlord and Ratnamahadevi is his queen. How are the three connected? What are the issues that arise?

page39.title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story (Tamil)
page39.description: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.(Tamil Dubbed Version)

page39.title: Achcham Yenbadhu Madamaiyada
page39.description: This story revolves around a happy-go-lucky young man who is in love. However, in an unexpected turn of events, he and his loved ones are embroiled in a high-risk situation, which demands that he rise to the occasion and stand his ground against the odds.

page40.title: Kadhal Sugamanathu
page40.description: A Tamil Dubbed Versio of 2001 Telugu film Priyamaina Neeku.Ganesh is a carefree college youth whose life revolves around friends and doing good deeds for them and upsetting his father. One day he fumbles upon a Red diary.

page40.title: Pattaya Kelappanum Pandiya
page40.description: The plot revolves around a mini bus driver Velpandiyan (Vidharth) and a conductor Muthupandi (Soori) and how romance evolves with Kanmani (Manisha Yadav) in the bus.

page40.title: Anjaan
page40.description: Raju Bhai and Chandran head a thriving gang dismantling everyone coming their way. However when their success reaches the dreaded Imran, they face the inevitable. It is now up to Krishnan, Raju Bhai's brother, to take revenge.

page40.title: Ivan Veramathiri
page40.description: An unemployed young man kidnaps and holds captive a criminal who is also the brother of a powerful minister. A romantic action movie!!

page40.title: Endrendrum Punnagai
page40.description: Three friends make a pact to stay single all their lives  But two of them are unable to stick to the promise and friendship sours.

page40.title: Vanavarayan Vallavarayan
page40.description: Vanavarayan (Krishna) and Vallavarayan (Makapa Anand) are siblings and their unity seems to end with the same family that they belong to, and come across as arch rivals who bring the roof down in their fight.

page41.title: Sigaram Thodu
page41.description: Chellapa wants his son Murali to become a police officer like him but Murali's dream is a 'safe' bank job. However, a series of events changes the course of Murali's life.

page41.title: Nankam Pirai
page41.description: The film is a horror film which is based on Bram Stoker's famous novel Dracula. Set in South India, the film shows the arrival of Dracula and the series of deaths thereafter.(Tamil Dubbed Version)

page41.title: Nedunchalai
page41.description: The story is set in the late 1980s around people living by the highway in India. It is about their life and a hand-to-mouth existence. As we often go past highways, we don`t take notice of the innumerable stories that break around us.

page41.title: Nee Enge En Anbe
page41.description: Anaamika, a Tamilian Brahmin desperately meandering through the busy streets of Hyderabad in search for her husband. Saarthi, a confident and supportive cop helps Anaamika reach her goals.

page41.title: Vairam
page41.description: Numerous plot lines intersect in this comedic romp about a female Victoria-carriage driver who disguises herself as a boy, and the hunt for the stash of diamonds hidden in her Victoria.

page41.title: Sabari
page41.description: The film tells the story of Dr. Sabarivasan who goes on a revenge spree against rowdy elements who are disturbing peace and tranquility in the city.

page42.title: A Aa E Ee (Tamil)
page42.description: Subramaniam, an Ayurvedic physician is a much-respected man in his village. His only daughter Anita returns home from Chennai after completing a course in fashion designing.Anita’s marriage is fixed with Ilango.

page42.title: Thodari
page42.description: A cafeteria worker, a lovely young girl, and a gang of hijackers converge aboard a train.

page42.title: Remo
page42.description: All's fair in love, even Arun, the protagonist, who in this gender-bender of a role masquerades as a woman to nurse his relationship with a lovely young doctor.

page42.title: Rekka
page42.description: Rekka stars Vijay Sethupathi in the role of an advocate for the first time. The plot revolves around the unforeseen circumstances he is pushed into which ultimately leads him to kidnapping a girl.

page42.title: Uchathula Shiva
page42.description: The film is a light-hearted entertainer about a young man named Shiva, who does not take life seriously and jokes in when he gets into tough situations. He gets entangled in a situation, and how he comes out it forms the story.

page42.title: Theeya Velai Seiyyanum Kumaru
page42.description: A shy, introvert tries to impress a girl with the help of a love guru. Ganesh Venkatraman acts as a love guru to Siddharth and dispenses love advice so that Siddharth wins the heart of his love interest played by Hansika.

page43.title: Kamaraj
page43.description: The life story of beloved Indian politician K. Kamaraj (Richard Madhuram), popularly known as the Kingmaker.

page43.title: Kalakalappu
page43.description: Kalakalappu is a story of two brothers and their quest to save their café. Cheenu manages the café while Raghu is in prison. The rest of the story is about how Cheenu & Raghu manage to get their café back.

page43.title: Pagiri
page43.description: Pagiri is a unique film which is based on today`s youth and their use of digital media, and how all their interactions are taking place through these channels.

page43.title: Kutrame Thandanai
page43.description: A man is slowly going blind and cannot afford the surgery to fix his eyes. When he witnesses a young woman's murder, the killers offer him a large sum of money to remain quiet.

page43.title: Enakku Veru Engum Kilaigal Kidayathu
page43.description: The film is about a 50-year-old vanity van owner, Caravan Krishnan, who goes out of his way to help those in inter-caste relationships sort out their issues, and makes a point against caste and religion-based division.

page43.title: Nambiyaar
page43.description: The protagonist, like most people, has positive and negative thoughts; however, in his case, the negative thoughts take on a life of their own.

page44.title: Enakku Innoru Per Irukku
page44.description: The film is an action entertainer where G V Prakash will be seen in the role of an auto rickshaw driver named Johnny.

page44.title: Kabali
page44.description: Kabali is a gangster film starring Rajinikanth and Radhika Apte in the lead. This crime action film depicts the eternal victory of good over evil. The protagonist fights to bring justice to the people who suffer.

page44.title: Aarathu Sinam
page44.description: An alcoholic cop accepts to investigate a case involving a couple of gruesome murders. Will the case be the redemption that he was waiting for? A remake of Jeethu Joseph's Malayalam film Memories (2013).

page44.title: Thirunaal
page44.description: A local rural thug who works for politicians, falls for a girl's love

page44.title: Vellikizhamai 13Am Thethi
page44.description: This movie revolves around the 13 ghosts who try to stop the lead actor`s marriage on a Friday the 13th. Watch this movie to find out what the Ghosts want.

page44.title: Arthanari
page44.description: Cinema story revolves around a lady cop called Arundathi. The film tells about how she fights against people who supports odd works with the help of Nassar and Ramkumar. In this actress, Arundathi played hidden police officer role.

page45.title: Jambulingam 3D
page45.description: It's a story about an Indian village guy, Jumbulingam, who travels to Japan for a show to assist an International magician Vittal.

page45.title: Oru Melliya Kodu
page45.description: A murder, a case of driving under the influence of alcohol, a hit-and-run, and an investigation which links the incidents together. A film about how a family suffers due to drunken driving.

page45.title: Angali Pangali
page45.description: Angali Pangali is an Indian Tamil romantic comedy film directed by S. Balamurugan. The film stars Vishnupriyan, Sanyathara and Soori in the lead roles.

page45.title: Appa
page45.description: A father who nurtures his son and makes him a good man in this society. This film shows about friendship, education, infatuation, love and family sentiments. This is another film which tears the face of the educational system.

page45.title: Ka Ka Ka Po
page45.description: The film revolves around a central character, and explores the nuances of a first kiss and the conflicts in a marital relationship. These factors become the front runner with a comical chaos in the backdrop.

page45.title: Amma Kanakku
page45.description: A Class 10 student is giving up on studies because she knows her mother, a house-help, will not be able to provide for her higher studies.

page46.title: Adra Machan Visilu
page46.description: The plot revolves around Shekhar (Shiva) from Madurai who is ardent fan of powerstar, the superstar. it depicts the extent to which fans can go in their adulation. Shekhars longtime girlfriend Devi (Naina sarwar) caters to his financial needs.

page46.title: Udhayan
page46.description: Udhayan works as an assistant manager in a bank and falls in love with a young lady.The interesting first half is well split between romance, action, comedy and suspense. Santhanam helps with his hilarious comedy.

page46.title: Mundaasupatti
page46.description: Set in the 1980s in a village named Mundasupatti, the story revolves around the natives and their fear of getting a portrait taken. They believed that posing for a photograph would shorten their lifespan.

page46.title: Thaka Thimi Tha
page46.description: Two college students fall in love with each other, but they break up after a misunderstanding. Their families intervene and work together to get them back together.

page46.title: Biriyani
page46.description: Sugan and his friend Parasu go after Maya, a sexy woman they encounter at a biriyani eatery. They get drunk and pass out, once wake up, police start blaming them for the disappearance of business magnate Varadarajan.

page46.title: Ayudha Poojai
page46.description: Krishnasamy, a respected man, and Samiyappan are in a feud for several years. Amudha, Krishnasamy's daughter, hates her father because she thinks that he is a killer.

page47.title: Kanchana 2

page48.description: Maalai Nerathu Mayakkam is about the relationship between a husband and wife. The film shows the hard-hitting reality of a dysfunctional marriage.

page48.title: Thozha

page49.title: Kadhalum Kadanthu Pogum

page50.title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo (Tamil)

page56.title: Lovely (Tamil)

page57.title: Paayum Puli
page57.description: A cop mistakenly believes that taking out three thugs will end Madurai's crime wave.

page57.title: Anbe Anbe
page57.description: Anbe Anbe is a South Indian Tamil film released in 2003

page57.title: Naanum Rowdy Dhaan
page57.description: A wannabe rowdy who falls for a hearing-impaired girl faces a dilemma when the girl makes a shocking request.

page63.title: Chokka Thangam

page63.title: Enakkul Oruvan

page64.description: The film is about a television show host, played by Deepak Dinkar, who has to deal with failures all his life. However, he is invited to a night party where his life completely changes.

page64.title: Sandamarutham
page64.description: An undercover cop tries to foil the plans of an unrepentant criminal, who tries to supply an extremely dangerous chemical to terrorists for money.

page64.title: Kaaki Sattai
page64.description: A young cop needs to show his true potential to catch a gangster and to win his love.

page64.title: Poo
page64.description: A girl makes the ultimate sacrifice for the man she loves but is unable to win his happiness.Based on the short story Veyilodu Poi written by Thamizh Selvan.

page64.title: Aranmanai Kaavalan

page64.title: Annaiyum Pithavum
page64.description: A 1969 Tamil Movie starring AVM Rajan, Vanisri, SivaKumar, VK Ramasamy, Cho Ramasamy, V.Nagaiah, Lakshmi, Gopalakrishnan.

page65.title: Vasanthakala Paravai
page65.description: Vasanthakala Paravai is a 1991 Tamil language drama film directed by Pavithran. The film features Ramesh Aravind, Shali and Sarath Kumar in lead roles. The film, produced by K. T.

page65.title: Punnagai Mannan

page65.title: Kattabomman
page65.description: The village chairman Kalingarayan and his son spread terror among the villagers. Kattabomman is an angry man who cannot tolerate injustice.He falls in love with Kalingarayan's daughter Priya and gets married to her without their family's wishes.

page65.title: Ulagam Sutrum Valiban
page65.description: Murugan (MGR) is an Indian scientist who has recently discovered how to store a part of the energy unleashed from lightning.He subsequently announces that he wouldn't reveal his discovery since the world is at the brink of World War III.

page65.title: Anegan
page65.description: What would you do to be with your soulmate in every lifetime of yours? To know more, watch Anegan - a story about Love that travels across eras.

page65.title: Jk Enum Nanbanin Vaazhkkai
page65.description: A young man finds himself in a dilemma when he has to choose between his ambitions and his family's concerns.

page66.title: Isai
page66.description: A maestro decides to snuff out his subordinate after the latter subdued all his fame.

page66.title: Tamizhuku En Ondrai Azhuthavum
page66.description: A computer geek is on a mission to activate a dead mobile network to call a cab driver, but the cab has a bomb planted in it, which will go off once the mobile network resumes.

page66.title: Yennai Arindhaal
page66.description: A police officer walks a thin line to catch a gangster and protect his family from danger.

page66.title: Darling (2015)
page66.description: Three friends and a stranger go to a house and plan to commit suicide. But later they realize the house is haunted.A remake of the 2013 Telugu film Prema Katha Chitram.

page66.title: I
page66.description: A bodybuilder (Vikram) plans revenge after his various enemies inject him with a substance that deforms his body.

page66.title: Kappal

page67.description: Murugan falls in love with Yamuna and with the help of his friend Paandi, he saves Yamuna from a marriage with a notorious money lender.

page67.title: Pisaasu
page67.description: A violinist experiences paranormal experience in his flat after a death of a girl who he tries to save due to accident. Later he realises that actually the spirit is helping him and he tries to find out who killed the girl by accident.

page68.title: Kaaviya Thalaivan

page68.title: Happy New Year (Tamil)

page69.title: Aaaah

page70.title: Sathuranga Vettai

page70.title: Un Samayal Arayil

page71.title: Nimirndhu Nil

page71.title: Ithu Kathirvelan Kadhal
page71.description: Kathirvelan falls in love with Pavithra but there are quite a few obstacles that he has to cross before he can marry her...

page71.title: Manjapai
page71.description: A boy is raised by his grandfather as his parents commit suicide; years later, the boy is working in an IT company and living a lavish life. He brings his grandfather from the village to the city, but he is embarrassed by him.

page71.title: Maan Karate
page71.description: A fortune teller reveals that Peter will win a boxing match and share his winnings with his friends. As he prepares for the fight, he meets Yazhini and learns that the seer had the right name but the wrong person.

page71.title: Cuckoo
page71.description: Visually-challenged Tamizh and Suthanthirakodi fall in love with each other, but her self-centred brother wants to marry her off to his friend, which leads to the lovers' separation. Can their love help them find each other?

page72.title: Jeeva (2014)
page72.description: A gifted cricketer dreams of finding a place in the state Ranji team but romance and politics in the sporting body threaten to dash his hopes.

page72.title: Arima Nambi
page72.description: When Anamika, the girl who he is on a date with, is kidnapped, Arjun goes to the police for help and gets into a dangerous situation from where there is no escape.

page72.title: Madras
page72.description: A wall is a source of discontent between two political rivals. Kaali and his friend Anbu, who is a party worker, get embroiled in this clash.

page72.title: Aranmanai
page72.description: A large family returns to an ancestral property (palace) to sell it off. Meanwhile they discover some supernatural elements in the palace.

page72.title: Amara Kaaviyam
page72.description: The movie is an emotional journey everyone can relate to. Set in the `80s, the film revolves around two, school-going adolescents who fall in love.

page72.title: Kaththi
page72.description: A criminal finds his conscience when faced with the plight of farmers. An action entertainer directed by A.R. Murugadoss and stars Vijay in a double role!!

page73.title: Salim
page73.description: The socially responsible Dr.Salim faces criticism and seclusion at work due to his upright nature. In addition to this, when his relationship with Nisha falls apart, he is driven to do something he wouldn't normally do.

page73.title: Irumbu Kuthirai
page73.description: Prithvi's life is scarred by a bike accident where he loses his dad. Accidentally, he meets and falls for the stunning Samyuktha who makes him get a Ducati. But that very bike brings danger to Prithvi due to a shocking past.

page73.title: Yaan
page73.description: To prove himself to his girlfriend Sreela's father, Chandru accepts a job in a foreign country only to get imprisoned there on arrival for carrying drugs. Facing a death sentence, can he clear his name and find the person who landed him in such a predicament?

page73.title: Tenaliraman
page73.description: In the fictional princely state of Vigada Nagar, the king's corrupt ministers strike a deal with the Chinese, giving them unrestricted access to trade in the kingdom. Tenaliraman, minister to the king, seems to have a plan of his own.

page73.title: Nagaram
page73.description: The story is about Gate Selvam who comes out of jail and wants to turn a new leaf. However, Chakkara Pandi, his close friend in the police department, deceives him and puts him back into the criminal track.

page73.title: Ninaive Oru Sangeetham
page73.description: Ninaive Oru Sangeetham is a 1987 Indian Tamil film, directed by K. Rangaraaj and produced by S. Greeta. The film stars Vijayakanth, Radha, Srividya and Rekha in lead roles.

page74.title: Kavithai Paadum Alaigal
page74.description: Kavithai Paadum Alaigal is a 1990 Tamil language movie with melodious music composed by Maestro Ilayaraja.

page74.title: Aindhaam Thalaimurai Sidha Vaidhiya Sigamani
page74.description: An uneducated and naive young man from a family of Siddha doctors wants to marry an educated woman so that he won't be cheated in life. He marries a girl lying that he is a doctor but the girl has her own secrets...

page74.title: Nanga Ellam Appavae Appadi
page74.description: Tamil Dubbed Version of Denikaina Ready 2012 Telugu action comedy film.This film is a remake of the Malayalam film Udayapuram Sulthan.

page74.title: Netru Indru
page74.description: A team of cops is sent to the forest to capture/kill a police officer who has gone rogue.A true suspense thriller taking place in a forest.

page74.title: En Swasa Kaatre
page74.description: A young computer hacker wants to turn over a new leaf after falling in love with a girl. But the path to redemption might be harder than he imagined it to be.

page74.title: Nethiyadi
page74.description: Nethiyadi is a 1989 Tamil Comedy Movie directed by R.Pandiaraajan.

page75.title: Onna Irukka Kathukanum
page75.description: The story begins with a group of government officers who come to list the number of devastated houses. The officers promised them to give a big amount to build their house but in exchange for a little amount to register their name.

page75.title: Mella Thirandhathu Kadhavu
page75.description: A village girl loves her distant cousin, but he loves someone else and rejects her marriage proposal. When an accident kills the girl he loves, he is forced to reconsider his decision.

page75.title: Kochadaiiyaan
page75.description: Rana, a ruthless warrior, returns to his homeland to avenge the death of his father, who was unjustly put to death by the reigning king of Kotaipattinam. An epic historical animated fiction film!!

page75.title: Poonthotta Kavalkaran
page75.description: Like a gardener with all his tenderness for his flowers, some old kind of vigilante takes his wing a young couple of runaway lover. He lavishes them love and safety.

page75.title: Naina (Tamil)
page75.description: The film begins with Annamalai (Jayaram) who is a ghost trying to talk to his son Pasupathy (Jayaram) but nobody has been able to see or hear him since his death. Pasupathy is a taxi driver and he is in love with the lawyer Vaanathi (Manya).

page75.title: Iniyellam Sugame
page75.description: Aravind comes to Chennai to participate in a singing competition. During the competition, Aravind falls in love at first sight with the female spectator Nandhini so does she. Aravind and Nandhini want to meet and express their feelings.

page76.title: Veedu
page76.description: Veedu is a 1988 Tamil film directed by Balu Mahendra. Starring Archana as the central character, it depicts the difficulties faced by a middle-class family in building a house.

page76.title: Chinna Thambi
page76.description: A rich girl is guarded by her possessive brothers due to an astrologer's prediction, that she will marry a man from a lower caste, against their wishes. Can they stop the wheels of fate?

page76.title: Azhagiya Kanne
page76.description: Azhagiya Kanne is a 1982 Tamil movie directed by Mahendran, starring Sarathbabu, Suhasini and Sumalatha in the lead.

page76.title: Agni Sakshi
page76.description: Agni Sakshi is a Tamil language film directed by K. Balachander, starring Sivakumar and Saritha in the lead roles. Rajinikanth and Kamal Haasan play a short cameo as themselves. Saritha was portrayed as a Schizophrenia patient in this film.

page76.title: Super
page76.description: Akhil (Nagarjuna Akkineni) owns a call cab service. He falls in love with a doctor, Siri Valli (Ayesha Takia). Soon Siri Valli falls in love with Akhil as well. There is a hi-tech robber called Sonu who steals money in a big way.(Telugu Dubbed Version)

page76.title: En Kadhal Pudhithu
page76.description: A romantic-comedy, fun-filled film that has a realistic approach set on the college campus. There is a group of friends and romance occurs between a tow. There are people who try to spoil it. Did the couple unite against all odds?

page77.title: Ennamo Nadakkudhu
page77.description: A small-time guy is entangled in a battle between two powerful men.A man caught between a rock and a hard place!!

page77.title: Sooriyanagaram
page77.description: A caste-crazy leader Kathirvel opposes his daughter Tamilselvi's love for Vetrivel, a mechanic who works in a workshop opposite his home. His young son Senthil, who does not believe in caste, supports his sister's love.

page77.title: Sattam Oru Iruttarai
page77.description: Sattam Oru Iruttarai is a remake of the 1981 film of the same name by S. A. Chandrasekhar.The film is about a hero who wishes to avenge the killers of his parents.

page77.title: Neeyum Naanum
page77.description: Neeyum Naanum is a romantic film written and directed by S V Solairaja.Neeyum Naanum Stars Kulir 100' fame Sanjeev and Sethna as the lead romantic pair.Sriram Vijay has scored music for this movie.

page77.title: Sahara Pookkal
page77.description: Sahara Pookkal shows the emotional and physical struggles endured in re-marriages. Step-parents clash with step-children. Yet, there is hope for Oviya and hopeless romantic Sangeeth but even love can be threatened by family ties.

page77.title: Minsaram
page77.description: Minsaram is a Tamil drama movie, directed by N.Selvakumaran. The cast of Minsaram includes Thol.Thirumavalavan,Yuvaraj.

page78.title: Apple Penne
page78.description: Komalavalli, a young girl, runs away from her caring mother Hamsavalli, believing her to be a promiscuous woman. She ends up in the hands of the scheming constable Arumugam who has an axe to grind with mother and daughter.

page78.title: Oru Oorla
page78.description: Theri, an alcoholic, after his mother's death undergoes a change as his sister-in-law delivers a girl. He believes that his mother has reborn as his niece. He takes the responsibility of protecting her, but his brother's fight with a sex worker brings tragedy to all.

page78.title: Chandra
page78.description: Starring Shriya Saran and Prem Kumar the film depicts a love story of a last generation princess. It highlights the life of this princess.

page78.title: Arya Surya
page78.description: Aaryananda and Suryananda, who aspire to enter the film industry, put a pair of smugglers behind bars. Surya is approached by the rich Chandralekha to spy on her flirtatious husband Kamalasekaran.

page78.title: Punnagai Desam
page78.description: A man who goes to the city to marry his childhood sweetheart is rejected by her family; he meets 3 ambitious men who are down on luck and becomes their friend.

page78.title: Mugam
page78.description: Rangan is a very ugly man and therefore lives a tough life. He is kicked out of jobs, ill-treated constantly, and the girl he loves hates him. Then one day, Rangan goes to the house of his make-up artist friend and finds a strange mask.

page79.title: Kottai Mariamman
page79.description: Kottai Mariamman is a 2001 Tamil devotional film written and directed by Rama Narayanan. The film featured Roja in the title role alongside Karan and Devayani.

page79.title: Eazhaiyin Sirippil
page79.description: Ganesh (Prabhu Deva) has the job of collecting travelers for the lone bus run by Padmavathi Bus Service, in Cuddalore town. His high-energy people-gathering tactics are considered the reason for the crowds on the bus.

page79.title: Bharathi
page79.description: Bharathi is a 2000 Indian Tamil-language biographical film starring Sayaji Shinde, Devayani and Nizhalgal Ravi. It is a biographical film based on the life of Subramania Bharati.

page79.title: Per Sollum Pillai
page79.description: A rich family adopts a young boy, but others conspire to have him thrown out, for their personal gain.

page79.title: Raja Raja Cholan
page79.description: Rajaraja Cholan is a 1973 Tamil film about the life of the Chola king Rajaraja Chola. The film has Sivaji Ganesan playing the title role.

page79.title: Pulivaal
page79.description: A lost cell phone connects two men from the two extremes of the society and affects their life beyond which they could have imagined.A Remake of Malayalam movie Chaappa Kurish (2011).

page80.title: Pannaiyarum Padminiyum
page80.description: A car is left in the care of a genial landlord, who along with his wife, driver and villagers, gets very attached to it. Will they be able to handle it when the car is taken from them?

page80.title: Ninaithathu Yaaro
page80.description: A director changes the perception of love for a group of youngsters by narrating how he reclaimed his life because of his now-married lover and her understanding husband.

page80.title: Goli Soda
page80.description: A group of four young men work as laborers and carry vegetable loads to shops in a market. A woman in one such shop treats them like her children and inspires them to do something to earn respect. The boys decide to start a small restaurant.

page80.title: Malini 22 Palayamkottai
page80.description: A nurse from a small town dreams of going to Canada to make it big, but she gets romantically involved with a man which changes the course of her life.A remake of the Malayalam film 22 Female Kottayam (2012).

page80.title: Mun Anthi Charal
page80.description: Mum Anthi Saaral is a romantic movie starring Ansar and Nakshthra

page80.title: Jilla
page80.description: Sakthi is a police officer and the adopted son of a local crime boss; after a horrific incident, he takes his police job seriously while trying to reform his criminal father. A masala-entertainer. Worth a watch!

page81.title: Ego
page81.description: What stems from beautiful lies and unexpected events can usually be a relationship as beautiful as friendship and love. Sometimes it may also lead to hate and ego hassles which can change the lives of the people.

page81.title: Jannal Oram
page81.description: Circumstances push a bus conductor behind the wheel and what follows is death and chaos. A remake of the 2012 Malayalam film, Ordinary.

page81.title: Chithirayil Nilachoru
page81.description: A young woman gets into a conflict with an auto driver after he unintentionally disrupts the very purpose of her purpose visit. She decides to wreck his life in turn but, then, learns of his past and falls in love with him.

page81.title: Nirnayam
