page81.description: A father and his daughter are forced to make a stop at a remote village. Where are they going, and what is the secret behind the father's brooding?

page81.title: Pizza II: Villa
page81.description: A debutant English crime novel writer Jebin M. Jose discovers that his deceased father had run bankrupt with an unlisted property in Pondicherry. To pay off the debts, he makes a visit to the villa for valuation.

page81.title: Vidiyum Munn
page81.description: It's about Four Formidable Men, who, for Three Different Reasons are chasing after Two Women in One Day. Who are these men? How are they connected to each other?

page82.title: Irandaam Ulagam
page82.description: A young man's lover dies in a freak accident; saddened by this, he tries to kill himself by driving his car over a cliff. A portal opens to an alternate universe, and rescued by his look-alike, he finally meets his lover.

page82.title: Kicha Vayasu 16
page82.description: This film centers around the pranks of teenagers. Jai Akash comes to Nagerkoil as the Collector. His reminiscences of his school days in Nagerkoil forms the main theme of the film.

page82.title: Kanadi Pookal
page82.description: It is a story of a boy who kills his sibling born to his mother because he thinks that his mother shows the love only to that baby and not to him.

page82.title: Kadhal FM
page82.description: Kadhal FM is a 2005 Tamil film directed by Jayaprakash starring Manikandan, Shivani Singh and Aravind Akash.

page82.title: Junior Senior
page82.description: Junior Senior is a 2002 Indian Tamil film, directed by J. Suresh starring Mammootty, Hamsavardhan and former Miss Malaysia Leena in lead roles.

page82.title: Joot
page82.description: A young man leaves his village to the city with his father seeking medical help for an ailment. In the city, they stay with his brother who is embroiled in a corruption scam involving a con.

page83.title: Jaisurya
page83.description: A con-man based in Kancheepuram decides to save the district collector from a contract killer. An action-masala entertainer!!

page83.title: I Love You Da
page83.description: Raghuvaran pays cricket players to lose matches until an Indian player kills him.

page83.title: Arrambam
page83.description: A mysterious man along with a young computer hacker tries to unveil a major government conspiracy which resulted in several bloody deaths.

page83.title: Sathiram Perunthu Nilayam
page83.description: The movie begins at Sathiram Perunthu Nilayam in Tiruchi and revolves around a youth, who has had a bad past. What happens when a girl falls for him forms the crux.

page83.title: Chuda Chuda
page83.description: A psychopathic killer chats up Tina, a school girl, on the Internet and invites her to his house with the intention of raping her and murdering her only to find the tables turned on him.

page84.description: A Tamil Canadian film based upon the Toronto Tamil community during the 1990s.

page84.title: Jithan
page84.description: A girl breaks up with her lover after a rich guy proposes marriage to her. The lover gets the power of invisibility due to an accident; he uses this to hurt his rival, play tricks on people and even commit crime.

page84.title: Girivalam
page84.description: Girivalam is a 2005 Indian Tamil drama film directed by Shivraj. It is a remake of the Hindi film Humraaz.

page84.title: Enge Enathu Kavithai
page84.description: Enge Enadhu Kavithai (English: Where is my Poem?) is a 2002 Indian Tamil romantic drama film directed by Aravind.

page84.title: Sinthamal Sitharamal
page84.description: Sinthamal Sitharamal is a 2004 tamil movie.

page84.title: Chocklet
page84.description: Aravind meets Anjali and falls in love at first sight. Anjali offers Aravind a trial romance for one week, and he works hard to get her to commit to something deeper

page85.title: Sutta Kadhai
page85.description: The film is a suspense thriller which follows a story after a murder and the enquiries that take place. The film has rip-roaring incidences that happen and factors that are spine-chilling.

page85.title: Idharkuthane Aasaipattai Balakumara
page85.description: The film is touted to be a laugh riot and is a story that revolves around five characters who meet each other in a liquor joint and what follows is the series of events that take place thereafter. The film addresses a much-known issue of drinking.

page85.title: Ragalaipuram
page85.description: The movie is about an average police officer who mistakenly believes he has a fatal disease and is about to die soon.A remake of the 1991 Malayalam film Aanaval Mothiram.

page85.title: Chennai Kadhal
page85.description: Gautham, a college drop-out and a good-for-nothing guy, falls in love with Narmada, daughter of a local don, Sakthivel. She lives in a hostel after learning that her dad is a criminal who now wants her to marry his partner Sardar’s brother.

page85.title: Chatrapathy
page85.description: A bus driver and care taker at an orphanage is found to be responsible for the deaths of several anti-social elements. A politician who loses one of his men at the hands of the driver realizes that this man is a former army major.

page85.title: Arasatchi
page85.description: A law-abiding man goes behind bars when he beats up the crook who tries to rape his sister. While he is in prison, his parents are killed and his sister is abducted. He gets out of the prison to avenge his parents and find his sister.

page86.title: Aayudham
page86.description: Aayudham is a 2005 Tamil action film directed by Murugesh. It features Prashanth and Sneha in the lead roles, while Vadivelu and Subbaraju amongst others played supporting roles

page86.title: Vanakkam Chennai
page86.description: Welcome to the crazy world of Ajay and Anjali and be a part of their romance, arguments, differences, trust, care and madness. Ajay and Anjali are swindled by a house agent and end up renting the same house.

page86.title: 6 Foot 2 Inches
page86.description: James (Sathyaraj) and Mr. White (Vadivelu) work in a call centre in Chennai. James witnesses the murder of Krishnamurthy (Ajay Rathnam), a labor union leader. He promises the police to identify the murderer.

page86.title: Thanga Meenkal
page86.description: A poor laborer (Ram) is devoted to his young daughter (Sadhana), but the child has problems at school with her studies, classmates, and teachers.  A heartwarming story told brilliantly with a simplicity and honesty !!

page86.title: Kadhaal Solla Vandhen
page86.description: The story's set in Trichy, and you have flaky, fun-loving youngster Nanu Prabhu (Balaji), stepping into college from school with his friend Petha Perumal (Sabesh Karthik), and the freedom of it all blows him away.

page86.title: Mathapoo
page86.description: The film is a heart-warming love story of a guy who loves a girl. The girl also loves the guy but refuses to accept her feelings for him. The film has heartbreak, action, and tragedy which makes this story a beautiful love story.

page87.title: Raja Rani
page87.description: A newlywed couple is forced to get married against their past romances respectively which ended up as failures for them. Even though they are failures they remain to be memories which is the main reason for their hatred towards each other.

page87.title: Moodar Koodam
page87.description: Four penniless, down-and-out youngsters plan to rob the house of a wealthy businessman believing that the family is out on a pilgrimage.

page87.title: Ponmaalai Pozhudhu
page87.description: Classmates Arjun and Divya fall in love out of defiance to her father's handling of their friendship. With fathers who are polar opposites, will this romance end in smiles or tears?

page87.title: Summa Nachunu Iruku
page87.description: An auto driver, who has a lot of debt, takes a wealthy man's daughter to the hospital where she is declared to be in the coma. Everyone in the girl's family thinks the auto driver is her husband and he plays along to gain some money.

page87.title: Vishwa Thulasi
page87.description: The film, set in the 1940s and moving to the 1960s, revolves around the emotional story of Thulasi (Nandita Das) returning to her village to become a dance teacher.

page87.title: Velli Vizha
page87.description: Velli Vizha is a 1972 Indian Tamil film, directed by K. Balachander and produced by B. Duraisami. The film stars Gemini Ganesan, Jayanthi, Vanisri and S. Varalakshmi in lead roles. The film had musical score by V. Kumar.

page88.title: Swarnamukhi
page88.description: Vanaja is full of gratitude when Varadarajan, a scheming politician, generously helps her daughter Swarnamukhi, but she does not know the man she is being grateful to, and is forced to become his mistress to safeguard her daughter’s future.

page88.title: Varuthapadatha Valibar Sangam
page88.description: The film`s title which literally means club of unworried youngsters traces the story of a few youngsters who are happy go lucky. The live a responsible yet carefree life. An aimless youth falls for a girl with a trigger-happy father.

page88.title: Desingu Raja
page88.description: The film is a film outlining a story of two villages. These two villages are perpetually in conflict with each other which creates comedy in the film. Will this conflict ever be resolved?

page88.title: Sorkam
page88.description: Sorgam is a 1974 Tamil film starring Sivaji Ganesan, Manohar, K. R. Vijaya, Rajasree, Venniradai Nirmala, Nagesh and Balaji in the lead roles. The film was written by Sakthi T. K. Krishnasamy and directed by T. R. Ramanna.

page88.title: Rishi
page88.description: A professional thief works for an established criminal; he witnesses the murder of a TV reporter at the hands of a minister and get a floppy from her before her death exposing the minister. But, the thief's look alike gets into trouble.

page88.title: Rajapart Rangadurai
page88.description: It is a film on theatre artists who in time have been ignored, they play all roles from mythology characters to patriotic people but fail to appeal a modern genre of viewers who part their ways to more glamour and glitter.

page89.title: Paarai
page89.description: Durai is a lorry driver who is tough as a nail. He had a bitter childhood and has no relatives or friends and his only solace is Jayaram, his cleaner who is just the opposite of him. Durai and Jayaram share a special bond, as they understand each other well.

page89.title: Neranja Manasu
page89.description: Neranja Manasu is a 2004 Tamil action drama film written and directed by Samuthirakani.

page89.title: Namma Veetu Kalyanam
page89.description: Meena and Sitha, who fall in love with two guys who apparently are college professors. The girls' brother Krishnamurthy, an MLA, abandons the plan to get them married to a minister's sons, and reluctantly accedes to their wish.

page89.title: Mugamoodi
page89.description: His friends call him Bruce Lee because Anand (Jiiva) has only one interest - kung fu. To clear his name and avenge his friend who is killed by the goons, he is forced to don the persona of a superhero 'Mugamoodi' (The mask).

page89.title: Major Chandrakanth
page89.description: A man is on the run from the law for committing a murder. He is solaced by retired army major who is unaware that the fugitive has killed his own son.

page89.title: Maanasthan
page89.description: Manasthan is a 2004 Tamil language film directed by Bharathy. The film features Sarathkumar and Sakshi Sivanand in lead roles, and Vijayakumar, Abbas and Sujatha play supporting roles.

page90.title: Karagattakaran
page90.description: Its story is about a male Karagattam dancer who falls in love with a female Karagattam dancer who reciprocates his feelings, but unfortunate circumstances and their egoistic nature prevent them from confessing their love for one another.

page90.title: Kangalal Kaidhu Sei
page90.description: Vasee, the fifth richest man in India, struggles with several emotional and mental problems. He grows close to Vidhya after he steals a diamond from under her nose, and the romance ends in tragedy.

page90.title: Kadhal Kirukkan
page90.description: A man is so deeply in love with his childhood friend that he is willing to go to any lengths to protect her, even commit murder.

page90.title: Kaadhalikka Neramillai
page90.description: Complications arise when two friends fall in love with two wealthy sisters.Its success led to a Telugu remake Preminchi Choodu (1965) and a Hindi remake Pyar Kiye Jaa (1966).

page90.title: Jambhavan
page90.description: A man, who is very responsible son, is shocked when he finds out that he was adopted and his real family was killed by a gangster. He sets out to find that gangster and avenge his parents' death.

page90.title: Iru Kodugal
page90.description: A man's new family deals with his secret past when his previous wife is assigned to work with him in the same collector's office.

page91.title: Gajendraa
page91.description: Gajendra (Vijayakanth), an orphan, is adopted and grows up under Azhagarsamy's (Sarath Babu) family care. Azhagarsamy considers him like his own son. Kasthuri (Flora), Azhagarsamy's granddaughter, falls in love with Gajendra.

page91.title: Englishkaran
page91.description: A Tamil reformist goes to a village to help unite a couple and also rescue an aspiring singer from her cruel father.

page91.title: Engal Anna
page91.description: A remake of the Malayalam film Chronic Bachelor.A bachelor (Vijayakanth) must deal with various problems related to family.

page91.title: Devan
page91.description: When the movie opens, Devan is seen murdering photographer Jeeva in cold blood in his house. Jeeva strategically positions a video camera to capture the impending murder, but Devan never shows his face to it.

page91.title: Bama Vijayam
page91.description: The story revolves around an urban South Indian joint family composed of brothers, their wives and children and parent/s. It is the ideal household with every one getting along well until a glamorous actress moves in next door.

page91.title: Attahasam
page91.description: The movie begins with Jeeva (Ajith Kumar), a driving instructor, leading a happy life with his mother (Sujatha). He also fell in love with Swapna (Pooja Umashankar) after several mishaps.

page92.title: Arasu Darbar
page92.description: The film opens with Arasu (Sarath Kumar) murdering a person in Mumbai. Later the story shifts to Kumbakonam where he is an assistant to a temple priest (Delhi Ganesh). Soon the priest’s daughter Meera (Simran) falls in love with Arasu.

page92.title: Anbe Vaa
page92.description: A rich industrialist finds romance in comic mix-up at a hill station.Anbe Vaa is a 1966 Indian Tamil-language romantic comedy film written and directed by A. C. Tirulokchandar. The film features M. G. Ramachandran and B. Saroja Devi in the lead roles.

page92.title: Vikadan
page92.description: Rammohan, after five long years of saying 'no' to getting married, agrees to wed Gowri after seeing her picture. But he gets a shock on his wedding night when Gowri turns out to be the exact opposite of what he has imagined her to be.

page92.title: Tik Tik Tik
page92.description: A fashion photographer gets embroiled in a series of grisly murders.The film was remade in Hindi as Karishma in 1984, with Kamal Haasan repeating the same role and Reena Roy replacing Madhavi.

page92.title: Thithikudhe
page92.description: A remake of the Telugu movie manasantha nuvve (2001).Chinnu and Anu are childhood friends who live in a village. Anu’s father  gets transferred and relocates to another place with his family which makes Anu lose contact with Chinnu.

page92.title: Selvam
page92.description: Selvam suffers a head injury, loses his memory, and falls in love with a doctor. When his memories come back, he returns to his village and has to figure out who to marry, the doctor he fell in love with or his first fiancee.

page93.title: Sakalakala Vallavan
page93.description: The film revolves around Velu, a villager who takes revenge against Geetha and Palani for molesting his sister.The film's score and soundtrack was composed by Ilaiyaraaja with songs like "Ilamai Idho" and "Nethu Raatri" remaining popular in Tamil Nadu.

page93.title: Parasuram
page93.description: An underground terror group led by a mysterious proxy Akash recruits unemployed youth and turns them into suicide bombers. Asst. Commissioner of Police Parashuram decides to take the case into his own hands in a fit of patriotic fervor.

page93.title: Ottran
page93.description: Ottran is a 2003 Tamil film starring Arjun, Simran, Manorama, Vadivelu, Tejashree, Sarath Babu and directed by Ilankannan.

page93.title: Oru Naal Oru Kanavu
page93.description: The story revolves around Maya, a college student, who always wants to triumphs in all her endeavors. She comes across a middle-class youth, Cheenu, a happy-go-lucky-youngster, who strives to work hard to get his sisters married well.

page93.title: Nizhal Nijamagiradhu
page93.description: Nizhal Nijamagiradhu is a 1978 Tamil Indian feature film directed by K. Balachander, starring Kamal Haasan, Sarath Babu, Sumithra, Hanumanthu in lead roles and introduced Sobha. It was a remake of Malayalam film Adimakal directed by K. S.

page93.title: Nee Pathi Naan Pathi
page93.description: A woman's illegitimate father tries to gain the approval of her new family. It is a 1991 Tamil romantic drama film directed by Vasanth and produced by Kavithalayaa Productions

page94.title: Manin Mainthan
page94.description: Bhairavamurthy and Gajapathy are two landlords in a village who fight with each other. Bhairavamurthy's wife and his car driver get killed by Gajapathy's henchmen.Kadhir, the car driver's son, decided to take revenge on Gajapathy one day.

page94.title: Madrasi
page94.description: A man is hunting down his parents' assassins and befriends another convict, who is helping him in this mission. But destiny turns them against each other when they find out that they work for each other's rivals.

page94.title: Maaran
page94.description: Maaran is a clerk in the district collector’s office. His life centers around his loving wife, his son and his daughter.Soft spoken, and a Gandhian to the hilt, Maaran does not stand by any smear on the Mahatma’s name.

page94.title: Kaarmegam
page94.description: Karmegham returns to his village after serving in the army for long. He finds that the villagers still live the shackles of old customs and traditions. They work as slaves to a feudal landlord who exploits them. Maheswari , a doctor, falls in love with Karmegham.

page94.title: Dhaya
page94.description: Dhaya is a hit film which story is about rowdy who hires his services to the highest bidder. Who in the midst of indulging in arson, murder, and poisoning an entire ashram of orphans, also gets to do the song and dance routine.

page95.title: Chinna
page95.description: Chinna is a 2005 love-drama thriller Tamil language movie directed by the Tamil Director Sundar C. It stars Arjun Sarja and Sneha in the lead roles.

page95.title: Sonna Puriyathu
page95.description: Shiva is a dubbing artist and a person who is not happy with love and marriage. His mother forces him to marry and he finally accepts without satisfaction.

page95.title: Pattathu Yaanai
page95.description: Saravanan, a cook falls in love with a girl named Aishwarya, while following his love pursuit comes to know that she might be in danger from the local Rowdies.

page95.title: Maryan
page95.description: A contract worker in Sudan is abducted by mercenaries and his lover in India awaits his return. A romantic thriller not to be missed!!

page95.title: Thulli Vilayadu
page95.description: The film is a fun filled thriller. It revolves around the characters who call themselves as a Businessman, Superstar and Politician and their encounter with the Godfather and Lion of the criminal world.

page95.title: Annakodi
page95.description: The film`s story is set in rural India and spells the struggle of the villagers against the privileged few of the village.

page96.title: Chidhambarathil Oru Appaswamy
page96.description: A remake of Malayalam film Chinthavishtayaya Shyamala.A school teacher abandons his debt-ridden family and job to lead a work-free life in an ashram. He soon finds out that life is not easy and comes back to discover that his family is affluent.

page96.title: Bambhara Kannaley
page96.description: The movie is about Srikanth, a low-class youth who goes to Ooty for a job and comes across Aarthy Agarwal. He falls in love with her. However, her parents arrange for her wedding with  Vikram Adhithya, who happens to be a slimy cookie.

page96.title: Bala
page96.description: Bala, a reckless hit man, falls in love with the daughter of a rival gang's don.

page96.title: Athey Kangal
page96.description: Susi's family is stalked by a vengeful killer. During an attempt to save Susi from this madman, her boyfriend, Baskar, gets a good look at the attacker's eyes. Using this as a clue Baskar attempts to find the person haunting Susi's family.

page96.title: Amuthea
page96.description: A software engineer and her middle-class neighbor fall in love, but their meddling parents decide to force them into arranged marriages with others.

page96.title: Alai
page96.description: Aathi and Meera fall in love after the usual playful tiffs. On a visit to a friend's village for his marriage, the two of them help the friend stand up against his father and wed his sweetheart instead of the girl his father had fixed up his marriage with.

page97.title: Aasai Aasaiyai
page97.description: A man is hired as a detective and asked to keep tabs on a girl to find out if she is having an affair. While doing his job, he ends up falling in love with her; but the girl does in believe in love as her sister had eloped with another man.

page97.title: Arputham
page97.description: A young jobless man falls in love with a beautiful girl and threatens her with suicide if she rejects his love. She promises to marry him if he makes a name for himself.

page97.title: Aanai
page97.description: An honest cop who is kicked out of the force takes a job to be the personal bodyguard of an 8-year-old girl.

page97.title: Singam 2 (Tamil)
page97.description: A tough cop performs an undercover operation and identifies some nefarious activities in the seas around a coastal town.A sequel to the 2010 film Singam.

page97.title: Ambikapathy
page97.description: A small-town boy needs to break through the class divide to gain acceptance from his childhood sweetheart who is in love with big city ideals. (Tamil Dubbed Version)

page97.title: Thillu Mullu (2013)
page97.description: A young man tells number of lies to his boss just to avoid getting fired from his job.

page98.title: Isakki
page98.description: Isakki (Sharran Kumar) goes to Madurai with his employer. Here, he meets Nandini (Aashrita) and falls for her. But when her overprotective father comes to know of it, he makes Isakki's life difficult.

page98.title: Kutti Puli
page98.description: A mother-worshiping thug runs afoul of a really bad man. An action, family entertainer, directed and scripted by Muthaiah.

page98.title: Naan Rajavaaga Pogiren
page98.description: A young man gets sucked into an adventure as he searches for his lookalike.Raja (Nakul) is a kickboxer, a happy-go-lucky guy who falls madly in love with Valli (Chandni) who is a law student.

page98.title: Maranthen Mannithen
page98.description: Gundello Godari / Maranthen Mannithen is a 2013 Telugu – Tamil bilingual film directed by Kumar Nagendra and is about a newlywed couple who are forced to battle it out against a devastating flood of the River Godavari.

page98.title: Masani
page98.description: Masani takes place in a village where various sculptors come to make a statue. The village head and his wife Rajeshwari try to bring in sculptors to complete the statue.However, anyone who comes for the job is driven out of the village by a ghost.

page98.title: Oruvar Meethu Eruvar Sainthu
page98.description: Oruvar Meethu Iruvar Sainthu is Tamil Romantic Movie directed by Balasekaran, the movie starring Lagubaran, Swathe  and Bhagyaraj.

page99.title: Neram
page99.description: A well-qualified Vetri (Nivin) losses his job with US based IT Company, financially penniless. He takes loan from the dubious Vatti Raja (Simha) for his sister’s wedding. Can he escape from the clutches of a loan shark on time?

page99.title: Nagaraja Cholan MA, MLA
page99.description: Directed by Manivannan, the film is a sequel to `Amaithi Padai` which is till date considered one of the best political films Kollywood has churned out.

page99.title: Gouravam
page99.description: `Gouravam` is a bilingual social drama about honor killings which has simultaneously been shot in Tamil and Telugu.The film released with a linear narrative in Tamil and with a non-linear narrative in Telugu.

page99.title: Soodhu Kavvuum
page99.description: A botched kidnapping attempt leads to much confusion. An action thriller worth watching!!

page99.title: Ethir Neechal
page99.description: A young man opts to run a marathon to prove himself. A Tamil comedy drama directed by R. S. Durai Senthilkumar and produced by Dhanush.

page99.title: Yaaruda Mahesh
page99.description: A husband's search for his wife's paramour Mahesh. An adult comedy directed by R.Madhan Kumar.

page100.title: Moondru Per Moondru Kadal
page100.description: Varun and Anjana’s  love story happens in the Ooty mountains, Guna and Mallika’s happens in Tuticorin seashore & Harris and Divya’s story happens in the city. The story revolves around these couples and the trials and tribulations they face.

page100.title: Kanpasum Vaarthaigal
page100.description: Mahesh is a young unemployed man living in Thiruvarur who enjoys hanging out with his friends. His father is unhappy with his son's irresponsible lifestyle and attempts suicide. Mahesh then finds a job in Singapore.

page100.title: Udhayam NH4
page100.description: Prabhu whisks Ritika away after her last exam, and they race against time to get Ritika home before midnight to keep her father happy.

page100.title: Bullet Raja 1000cc
page100.description: In Yamalokam retirement age comes from Senior Yama and he gives charge to his Son. However experienced Chitragupta is retained much to his disappointment.(Tamil Dubbed Version of 2012 Telugu fantasy-action-comedy film.

page100.title: Manthrikan (Tamil)
page100.description: A woman, with no memory of her past, falls in love with an exorcist, but they get separated soon after. Years later, when he is called by a family to exorcise a spirit, he meets her again and she seems to remember him.(Tamil Dubbed Version)

page100.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
page100.description: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics. A good dose of humor and entertainment!!

page101.title: Onbadhula Guru
page101.description: The film is about the adventurous trip that five guys take together, and what happens to them during their expedition.

page101.title: Kandha
page101.description: Kandha movie is an action packed entertainer. The story is about a youth who never forgets his teacher even after reaching big in life.

page101.title: Chennaiyil Oru Naal
page101.description: In Chennai, a brain dead accident victim's organs were rushed by road from Chennai to Vellore (170 km).It is a remake of the 2011 Malayalam film, `Traffic` and has its narrative in a hyperlink format.

page101.title: Sembatti
page101.description: Kayampoo (Srijith) finds it difficult to make a living from his meager earning as fisherman. He also has to take care of his mentally ill brother Sembattai (Dilipan). But when Kayampoo takes on a cartel which denies the community what they deserve, chaos descends.

page101.title: Mathil Mel Poonai
page101.description: Karthik (Vijay) is an out-of-job software engineer. He meets Divya (Viba) after he enrolls as a driving instructor. They get married and on a trip to Divya's native place, her past catches up with her.

page101.title: Vathikuchi
page101.description: A share auto-driver gets entangled in a plot where 3 criminals want him dead.Will he be able to tackle his enemies?

page102.title: Vana Yuddham
page102.description: The movie depicts the rise and fall of forest brigand and dreaded sandalwood smuggler Veerappan, who oversaw a reign of terror in the forests of Tamil Nadu and Karnataka.It is made as a bilingual, being simultaneously shot in Kannada as Attahasa.

page102.title: Paradesi
page102.description: Before India's independence during the 1940's, depicts the lives of poor carefree villagers who are lured to work in Tea plantation farms and how they are forced to live rest of their lives as slaves with no traces of hope and freedom.

page102.title: Aadhi Bhagavan
page102.description: Aadhi is a gangster who plans a hoax raid in one of the politician`s house to loot him.Meanwhile, Aadhi falls for a waitress, Karishma. When he is attacked, it is revealed that she is a part of the gang who is trying to kill Aadhi.

page102.title: Haridas
page102.description: The bonding between a father and his 10-year old autistic son, and the boy and his empathetic school teacher forms the fulcrum of Haridas.

page102.title: Chandamama
page102.description: A comedy movie that features Karunas, Shweta Prasad and Harish Kalyan in the lead roles.

page102.title: Kadal
page102.description: A wrongdoer is caught red-handed and he is not going to forgive the man who exposed him.

page103.title: Perumaan
page103.description: Shakti earns a commission running into crores for illegally bringing into the country money belonging to a gangster. His lifetime dream of earning a huge amount of money done, Shakti must now keep his wits together as he tries to keep the money safe.

page103.title: Aachariyangal
page103.description: The film centers around a young boy who is saturated of his daily mundane life and longs for a more exciting life. A fantasy suspense thriller!!

page103.title: Vishwaroopam
page103.description: Nirupama (Pooja Kumar) marries a dance instructor (Kamal Hassan) and she wants to end the marriage after three years to pursue her higher education.She hires a detective to keep a watch on her husband and then the mystery unfolds.

page103.title: Ram Charan
page103.description: A man, who doesn't believe that love can last a lifetime, pursues an exuberant romantic, but their clashing ideologies keep them apart. (Tamil Dubbed Version of Orange 2010 Telugu movie)

page103.title: Sillunu Oru Sandhippu
page103.description: Ashok and Geetha fall in love and vow to get back together as adults when their parents force them apart. Years later, Ashok becomes engaged to Charu and the wedding plans go smoothly until Geetha suddenly returns to Ashok's life.

page103.title: David (tamil)
page103.description: The plot revolves around the lives of two different men named David, who are about to take a step which is going to change their lives forever. An altered version of the same title featuring a slightly different cast was simultaneously shot in Hindi.

page104.title: Kozhi Koovuthu
page104.description: Kumaresan earns his living by selling chicken in his village.He falls in love with Thulasi (Shija Rose).Can Kumaresan and Thulasi join hands together for a happy life despite all the hindrances?

page104.title: Puthagam
page104.description: A man, who lives with his two friends, borrows a book from his girl where he gets an address to a cemetery and finds a lot of money. He takes that money and gives it to his roommates but later finds out that it was the black money of a politician.

page104.title: Samar
page104.description: A young man is in love with a girl but is too busy at the sandalwood plantations to pay her the needed attention. She forgives him many times, but eventually leaves him as he is uncaring towards her; he leaves for Bangkok to find her.

page104.title: Alex Pandian
page104.description: After the Chief Minister (Visu) turns down their request to sanction the sale of banned medicines, Allwyn Martin (Milind) and GKM (Suman) hire Alex Pandian (Karthi), a small-time criminal to kidnap the CM's daughter (Anushka).

page104.title: Puthumugangal Thevai
page104.description: Assistant director Anand (Shivaji Dev) has a script for his debut flick, but is unable to find a producer. By chance, he happens to meet an eatery owner Mani (Rajesh Yadav), who decides to help him produce the movie.

page104.title: Asthamanam
page104.description: A group of youngsters venture into a forest for a trekking expedition. Deep in the wilderness, their guide turns up dead and as they try to flee, they are trapped in a nightmare from which escape seems impossible.

page105.title: Kanna Laddu Thinna Aasaiya
page105.description: Three funny men use different tactics to impress a next-door girl. A funny romantic comedy entertainer directed by Manikandan

page105.title: Ambuli
page105.description: People in a village believe that a monster resides and creates havoc in the corn fields. Two students who study at a college near the village decide to investigate the matter. They are successful in capturing the monster.

page105.title: Tiger Viswa
page105.description: An Indian engineering student in the U.S. gets in trouble with local gangsters and must resolve his problems to return to his lady-love in India.(Tamil Dubbed Version of 2011 Telugu Movie Dhada)

page105.title: Aaranya Kaandam
page105.description: Aaranya Kaandam is a story about the drug trade and unfolds over a period of 24 hours. A mob boss must deal with a disgruntled mistress and a vanishing bag of cocaine.

page105.title: Neerparavai
page105.description: A skeleton is found at the home of Esther (Nandita Das), whose fisherman husband Arulappasamy (Vishnu) has been missing for the past 25 years.A heartbreaking love story, set amongst the impoverished Catholic fishing community.

page105.title: Murattu Kaalai (1980)
page105.description: Kaaliyan and Jaishankar are like dictators in neighboring villages separately, but in contrast to Kaaliyan, Jaishankar is selfish and bad. Engagement of Jaishankar's sister with Kaaliyan triggers rivalry between the two villages.

page106.title: Podaa Podi
page106.description: An artist marries a dancer but because of his old-school beliefs, he asks her to quit her dancing career. Eventually, to stop her from dancing he impregnates her but later they have misunderstood and their child gets killed in a car accident.

page106.title: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom
page106.description: A young man forgets a few years of his life, even as he is about to get married. A humorous tale about a young man who realizes that he has lost a few days of his life; and that too just before his wedding!

page106.title: Kumki
page106.description: The movie marks Vikram Prabhu`s debut. The story revolves around a mahout (portrayed by Vikram) and his trained `Kumki` elephant, which are used to guide wild elephants to the forest, in order to prevent nearby villages from getting destroyed.

page106.title: Neethaane En Ponvasantham
page106.description: The story revolves through three different life stages of Varun and Nithya's life.This Could Be Your Love Story!

page106.title: Ammavin Kaipesi
page106.description: Annamalai is forced to leave home after being accused of stealing from his own family. He finds a job with Chinnapulla, a genial quarry owner who is being swindled by his own employees.

page106.title: Puthukottai Azhagan
page106.description: The heir of the royal family takes over the legacy and riches after his father's demise, but his uncles are after his money and they plot to get him killed.Tamil Dubbed Version of Telugu King (2008 film).

page107.title: Thuppakki
page107.description: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

page107.title: Puthuvai Managaram
page107.description: A story of two siblings who rescue victims of road accidents. Mammootty plays the role of Giri and Nadia his twin sister Gowri.(Tamil Dubbed Version of 2012 Malayalam Movie Doubles)

page107.title: Aarohanam
page107.description: Aarohanam is based on a series of events that take place on a single day. It narrates the story of a 17-year-old boy and his sister`s search for their missing mother.

page107.title: Yaarukku Theriyum
page107.description: Six men and a woman regain consciousness in a deserted warehouse. They don't remember who they are or how they got there. Can they trust each other and will they get out of the place alive?

page107.title: Sivangi
page107.description: Sivangi is the Tamil dubbed version of Telugu movie Mangala.Mangala is a thriller film shot in the Vikarabad forest.

page107.title: Pizza
page107.description: A pizza delivery boy lands in a mysterious circumstance and it works a dramatic change in his life.

page108.title: English Vinglish
page108.description: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter everyday because of her inability to speak and understand English. (Tamil Dubbed Version)

page108.title: Maatraan
page108.description: Conjoined twins Vimalan and Akhilan involve themselves in a series of deaths involving their father's company. However, the truths that they initially uncover lead to a bigger conspiracy, one that spans across the globe.

page108.title: Thulli Ezhunthathu Kadhal
page108.description: 7 friends, who just passed out of the college, are trying hard to get ahead in their careers. Despite facing hardships related to their lives and relationships, most of them manage to do well in life.(Tamil Dubbed Version of 2010 Telugu film Thakita Thakita)

page108.title: Saattai
page108.description: In `Saattai`, director-actor Samuthirakani plays a strict teacher who is set on disciplining his students as he wants to improve their future. The movie highlights the importance of teaching as a noble profession.

page108.title: Thiruthani
page108.description: After a doctor lies to him and tells him he has but a few months left to live, Bharath decides to kill all the local thugs to make his town safe for his family and friends.

page108.title: Paagan
page108.description: The story revolves around Srikanth and his penchant for finding shortcuts to become rich and successful. After all his plans fail, Srikanth decides to woo Janani who comes from a rich family.

page109.title: Attakathi
page109.description: Attakathi is a realistic, gritty film set in the North Chennai milieu and is directed by Ranjit, a debutant director.Dinakaran (Dinesh) is a roadside Romeo who feels infatuated by girls, who smile at him. The true romance is something that still eludes him.

page109.title: Panithuli
page109.description: Stricken with amnesia, a young man (Ganesh Venkatraman) forgets about his lover (Kalpana Pandit) back in India and falls for another woman (Shobana).

page109.title: Sundarapandian
page109.description: The film seeks to stress that only situations compel people to change and do things that are not in their nature.

page109.title: Mannaru
page109.description: Circumstances force Mannaru (Appukutty), a dimwitted villager, to take his friend's wife to his home. What happens when the villagers believe the two to be man and wife?

page109.title: Gokulam
page109.description: Gokulam is a Tamil drama movie, directed by Chandra Siddardh. The cast of Gokulam includes Padmapriya, Sharwanand. (Tamil Dubbed Version)

page109.title: Sooriya Nagaram
page109.description: A caste-crazy leader Kathirvel opposes his daughter Tamilselvi's love for Vetrivel, a mechanic who works in a workshop opposite his home. His young son Senthil, who does not believe in caste, supports his sister's love.

page110.title: Chaarulatha
page110.description: Chaarulatha is a 2012 Indian horror film made in Kannada and Tamil.A deceased conjoined twin returns to haunt the surviving sister.

page110.title: 18 Vayasu
page110.description: A mentally unstable young man takes on the behaviors of the first animal he sees whenever he becomes depressed.

page110.title: Yugam
page110.description: Shiva (Rahul) and Pooja (Deepti) are newly-weds, who are deeply in love with each other. One day, Pooja receives an anonymous call from which she learns that Shiva is planning to murder her that midnight. Even as she tries to flee, Shiva returns from office.

page110.title: Krishnaveni Panjalai
page110.description: Kadir (Hemachandran) and Poonkothai (Nandana) are cotton mill workers in southern Tamil Nadu. Their affection grows into love but once the mill closes down following a strike, life gets hard for them and everyone working along with them.

page110.title: Etho Seithai Ennai
page110.description: Arjun (Shakkthi) falls for Shalini (Liya) at first sight. Initially, Liya resists his advances, but later falls for his charms. When Liya's uncle Nambi (Anand), a dreaded goon, gets to know about the relationship, he makes life hell for Arjun.

page110.title: Ninaithale Inikkum
page110.description: The film follows lead chandru (Kamal Hassan) who plays a singer and his band on a tour to Singapore. Over there Chandru meets his love interest Sona (Jayaprada), only to find that she is terminally ill. The film ends on a tragic note with the lady's demise.

page111.title: Sindhu Nadhi Poo
page111.description: Sindhu Nathi Poo is a 1994 Tamil drama film directed by Senthamizhan. The film features Ranjith, newcomers Rajakumari, Ravi Shankar and Sanjeev Kumar in lead roles

page111.title: Aan Paavam
page111.description: An error during an arranged marriage pre-meeting triggers a socially-unaccepted romance.This blockbuster movie of 1985 turned as the best comedy movie in the career of actor-director Pandiarajan.

page111.title: Winner
page111.description: A young man moves to his hometown; here he falls in love with the village head's daughter. The village head learns about this and he has the girl abducted; if the young man tries to rescue her, his parent's life will be at stake.

page111.title: Vikramadithan
page111.description: A 1962 Tamil Movie starring MGR and Padmini.

page111.title: Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu
page111.description: It's a village-based theme and revolves around a group of youngsters who want to make it really big in the sport. The events that unfold in their lives form the crux.

page111.title: Vanna Vanna Pookkal
page111.description: A young man saves a girl from committing suicide in the forest, he brings her home and to live with him.He falls in love with her and arranges for them to get married, but she disappears only to be found in a hospital.

page112.title: Uthiripookkal
page112.description: A hedonist/sadist makes life hell for everyone around him.Uthiripookkal is a 1979 Indian Tamil drama film written and directed by J. Mahendran. The script was based on a short story titled Chitrannai by Pudhumaipithan.

page112.title: University
page112.description: This movie is about a socially awkward college student named Gandhi, who cannot seem to have joyful social interactions with people. He greatly differs from his peers he doesn't smoke, drink or participate in any vices.

page112.title: Unakkaga Ellam Unakkaga
page112.description: A spoiled, rich young man is forced into a marriage by his parents, but he is already in love with someone. What he does not realize is that the girl he is engaged to is the same girl with whom he has fallen in love.

page112.title: Udhaya
page112.description: Udhaya is a college student who is doing research on atomic physics. Soon he is selected to study at Cambridge University due to the papers he has submitted on his research. However, he declines and his teacher gives him the job of another teacher who is on leave.

page112.title: Thirumaal Perumai
page112.description: A young devotee, a thief and a dancer experience Lord Vishnu's grace and realize how He can solve their problems.

page112.title: Thanikattu Raja
page112.description: A young mechanic falls in love with a rich girl; her father plots to break their relationship, as a result, the mechanic murders a manager while trying to save the girl's honor.

page113.title: Sundhara Travels
page113.description: A remake of their Malayalam film Ee Parakkum Thalika (2001).Gopikrishna owns an old bus, received as a compensation for his father's road accident, and he is facing lots of consequences due to the pathetic condition of the bus.

page113.title: Solla Marandha Kadhai
page113.description: Solla Marandha Kadhai is a 2002 Tamil film. This film is based on writer Nanjil Nadan's novel Thalaikeezh vigithangal.

page113.title: Sivantha Mann
page113.description: A 1969 Indian Tamil language film directed by C.V. Sridhar that stars Sivaji Ganesan, Kanchana and M. N. Nambiar in the lead role.It is notably the first Tamil film to be shot extensively in locations outside India.

page113.title: Simmarasi
page113.description: A man travels to a village to tackle tough challenges.Simmarasi is a 1998 Tamil language film directed and written by Erode Soundar. The film features Sarathkumar and Kushboo in lead roles whilst Anandaraj, Kanaka and Manivannan play supporting roles.

page113.title: Shock
page113.description: A newly married couple find the perfect apartment in the city, but little do they know about its horrifying past.A remake of Ram Gopal Varma's Hindi film, Bhoot (2003).

page113.title: Sethu
page113.description: A violent youngster and a shy Brahmin girl fall in love but tragedy intervenes when the youngster is brain-damaged following a fight. A classic that should not be missed!!

page114.title: Savalae Samali
page114.description: Savaale Samali is a 1971 Tamil language film starring Sivaji Ganesan in the lead role of a protagonist and it is his 150th movie.

page114.title: Sathi Leelavathi
page114.description: Arun, a married man who hates his wife because she is overweight, has an extramarital affair. When his wife finds out about his infidelity, Arun decides to leave the house for good.

page114.title: Saraswati Sabatham
page114.description: Vidyapati is a mute who lives a poor lifestyle with his widower father. One day Devi Maa Saraswati appears before him, blesses him, gives him intelligence as well as his vocal chords, so that he can sing her praises, as well as spread the word knowledge.

page114.title: Santhosa Vaniley
page114.description: Tamil Dubbed Version of Telugu 2002 Movie Santosham.A rich architect marries the girl he loves against her family's wishes and moves to New Zealand. They have a baby boy and the wife dies in an accident; her family invites him and the child to a wedding in India.

page114.title: Samurai
page114.description: Thiyagu, a Medical College Student, leads a gang of four to abduct corrupt politicians and bureaucrats who use the loophole in the law to enjoy their prison term in hospitals or guest houses.

page114.title: Samsaram Adhu Minsaram
page114.description: Dealing with the day-to-day travesty and triumph in an ordinary joint family in Tamil Nadu, the film features Visu himself along with Lakshmi and Raghuvaran.It won the National Film Award for Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment.

page115.title: Rettai Jadai Vayasu
page115.description: On a visit to his sister, a young man (Ajith) unexpectedly falls in love with a local beauty (Manthra) and makes plans to marry. That is until a few unexpected problems pop up.

page115.title: Renigunta
page115.description: This story dwells on the futility of crime and violence. Sakthi’s life turns upside down when his parents are murdered and he lands up in jail. There, he befriends four criminals and they pull off a prison break.

page115.title: Ratha Kaneer
page115.description: The story revolves around Mohanasundaram, a returned-from-abroad, westernised, rich man who shows arrogance and contempt towards anything part of Indian culture and anyone below his social standards.

page115.title: Ratchagan
page115.description: A girl falls for a violent man, who keeps taking law in his hands and beats people up. She wants to marry to him and eventually even he says yes, but her father has a condition that he should control his anger and work with him in his factory.

page115.title: Ramana
page115.description: After a professor's wife and children are killed in a building collapse, he learns that the person responsible for the building is a corrupt government official.The film was remade in Telugu as Tagore in 2003, and in Hindi as Gabbar Is Back in 2015.

page115.title: Raman Abdullah
page115.description: Raman Abdullah has Karan and Vignesh as friends, one Musilm and the other a Hindu, their misadventures to save their face from a strict Haji, played by Sivakumar.

page116.title: Pudhiya Vaarpugal
page116.description: Shanmugakani (K. Bhagyaraj) arrives in the village of Thaayamangalam as the new school teacher and soon falls in love with a local damsel Jothi (Rati Agnihotri).

page116.title: Porkkaalam
page116.description: The film deals with the social stigma associated with a handicapped girl in a rural milieu.Porkaalam is a 1997 Indian Tamil drama film written and directed by Cheran. The film has Murali, Meena, Sanghavi, Rajeshwari and Vadivelu in key roles.

page116.title: Poove Unakkaga
page116.description: When a man realizes that the Hindu woman he loves is in love with a Christian man, he decides to sacrifice his love and unite their families so as to make the love story a success.

page116.title: Ponnumani
page116.description: Soundarya and Karthick are sweethearts who spend their childhood together in a village. Soundarya goes off to pursue education but she and Karthick remain devoted to each other. Sivakumar, who dotes on Karthick wants to see them happily married.

page116.title: Pistha
page116.description: Dharmaraj, a wealthy businessman, employs Manigandan as a Manager in his office, owing to his good and considerate nature. Dharmaraj's daughter Vennila, a spoilt brat, objects to it. She acts haughty and hates her father as she has doubts on him.

page116.title: Periyar
page116.description: Periyar is a 2007 Tamil biographical film, made about the life of the social reformer and rationalist Periyar E. V. Ramasamy with Sathyaraj who himself is a rationalist in the lead role.

page117.title: Pattinathar
page117.description: Pattinathar is 1962 Tamil biographical film was directed by K. Somu and produced by Film center with distribution by J. R. Productions. The film script was written by Thanjai Ramaiah Doss and Akilan.

page117.title: Pandavar Bhoomi
page117.description: A man returns to his ancestral village after many years only to find his house in a dilapidated state and decides to rebuild it. The engineer he brings in to do the work gets really close to his family members.

page117.title: Padikkatha Methai
page117.description: A wealthy man raises Rangan, an orphan, and treats him as a son. When he loses everything and dies, Rangan cares for his wife and daughter.

page117.title: Paavai Vilakku
page117.description: Paavai Vilakku is a Tamil 1960 film directed by K. Somu. The film features Sivaji Ganesan, Sowcar Janaki, Pandari Bai, M. N. Rajam and Kumari Kamala in lead roles.

page117.title: Oru Thayin Sabatham
page117.description: One Advocate sends an innocent man to the gallows. The innocent man's wife loses her sanity while his two small children are left to fend for themselves. The son grows up to be a lawyer who then beats that advocate in his own game.

page117.title: Oru Thaai Makkal
page117.description: Kannan and Ravi have been friends since childhood, but when they fall in love with the same woman, Ravi makes furious attempts to ruin Kannan's reputation.

page118.title: Netrikkann
page118.description: The film revolves around Chakravarthy, middle-aged businessman who is a womaniser. In the process, he rapes a girl Radha. Rest of the film revolves around Chakravarthy's son and Radha teaching an lesson to his father to mend his ways.

page118.title: Nee Varuvai Ena
page118.description: A man who has big dreams about his marriage is involved in an accident and loses his sight, but in a twist of fate, he gets an eye transplant courtesy of another man who died in the crash.

page118.title: Natpukkaga
page118.description: Chinnaiya is a faithful servant in the house of a rich man. There is no love lost between the rich man and his elder daughter. His second daughter, Prabhavathy, who arrives from a foreign land, falls in love with Chinnaiya.

page118.title: Nala Damayanthi
page118.description: Ramji Iyer, a naive and docile cook, dreams of marrying off his sister Bhagyam to a good family, as they are orphans and it becomes his sole responsibility. As per convention, he has shell out dowry for the marriage and somehow falls short of the agreed sum.

page118.title: Mythili Ennai Kaathali
page118.description: Mythili Ennai Kaathali is a 1986 Indian Tamil film, directed by Vijaya T. Rajendar and produced by Usha Rajendar.

page118.title: Naan Ee
page118.description: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.The narrative of Naan Ee is in the form of a bedtime story told by a father to his daughter. This movie was made simultaneously in Telugu and Tamil.

page119.title: Pandi Oliperukki Nilayam
page119.description: Valarmathi (Sunaina), a girl from a rich family, falls in love with Pandi (Sabarish), who rents out mikes and speakers in Dindigul. When the stage is set for their marriage, an accident affects Pandi's senses.

page119.title: Moondru Deivangal
page119.description: This story is about three good-hearted men - Shiva (Sivaji Ganesan), Muthu (Muthuraman) and Nagu (Nagesh) - who become criminals due to unavoidable circumstances.

page119.title: Moondravathu Kann
page119.description: Priya, a rich girl, is in love with Sundar, a poor youth. Priya tries to elope with him but she fails and her father and her mother lock her in her bedroom. From there, Priya witnesses the murder of Shanthi by her husband Sabapathy in the opposite building.

page119.title: Marupadiyum
page119.description: Marupadiyum is an emotional and psychological drama that focuses on the central female protagonist, a wife caught up in marital discord played by Revathi and her life henceforth.

page119.title: Mahadevi
page119.description: Mahadhevi is a Tamil language film starring M. G. Ramachandran and Savithri in the lead roles. The film was based on novel Punya Prabhav by R. G. Katkari, Kannadasan wrote screenplay and dialogues. The film directed by Sundar Rao Nadkarni.

page119.title: Maha Nadigan
page119.description: It is a satire of Tamil cinema and politics, with Sathyaraj playing a common man who goes to become a cinema superstar and then the chief minister of Tamil Nadu.

page120.title: Madhu
page120.description: A man falls in love with a girl after he sees her rescue a puppy. Soon, he goes to her hostel and expresses his love for her, but she rejects his proposal.

page120.title: Maanagara Kaaval
page120.description: Maanagara Kaaval is a 1991 Tamil-language Indian feature film directed by M. Thiyagarajan. It is loosely based on Mammootty starrer 1 August. Vijayakanth as a super cop to protect the life of Indian Prime Minister (Lakshmi).

page120.title: London
page120.description: An unemployed Indian in London teams up with an aimless man, and circumstances lead them to con a visually impaired elderly couple.

page120.title: Kaadhal Kavithai
page120.description: Vishva spends his time hanging out with Charlie to avoid his mother who always quarrels with his dad. To find peace, he plays tricks on others. Among the victims is Jothi. The story moves to London, where Prasanth leaves a beautiful poem behind.

page120.title: Karpagam
page120.description: A humble villager, who is very wealthy, decides to get his two sons married. The first son marries a caring woman but the second son marries a greedy woman, who wants to take over the property.

page120.title: Karnaa
page120.description: Vijay is sent by his father in Ooty to work and becoming a responsible businessman. There, he falls in love with the college student Anjali. Her brothers are dangerous criminals and they are against their love because Vijay's father is a police officer.

page121.title: Karka Kasadara
page121.description: An NRI is returning to India to meet his grandparents for the first time. During his visit, he saves a girl from committing suicide and ends up falling for her. The girl, however, is expected to get married to another guy.

page121.title: Karakattakaran
page121.description: Its story is about a male Karagattam dancer who falls in love with a female Karagattam dancer who reciprocates his feelings, but unfortunate circumstances and their egoistic nature prevents them from confessing their love for one another.

page121.title: Kalvanin Kadhali
page121.description: Sathya is a casanova by character. He sets his sights on Haritha and manages to woo her. She loves him wholeheartedly and he is not in favor of that. Haritha comes to know about his real character, and she ends their relationship.

page121.title: Kaalai
page121.description: Simbhu shares his name with two other people - one villain and one cop-turned-baddie and the situations arising out of it promise enough curiosity for a while as soon as the movie opens.

page121.title: Kaadhal Sugamanadhu
page121.description: A Tamil Dubbed Versio of 2001 Telugu film Priyamaina Neeku.Ganesh is a carefree college youth whose life revolves around friends and doing good deeds for them and upsetting his father. One day he fumbles upon a Red diary.

page121.title: Iyer IPS
page121.description: Sathyaraj in a dual role. One role is of an IPS officer (Iyer) and the other is of a dada (Venkatachalapathy). The dada throughout the film has a dark skin and sports a bald head.

page122.title: Idhu Namma Aalu
page122.description: The film explores the meaning of being a Brahmin in context of being principled, honest and keeping one's word under any circumstance separating it from rituals.

page122.title: Gopala Gopala
page122.description: Female residents of a city apartment take an immediate liking to the smart cook who moves in, however their husbands cannot stand the very sight of him.

page122.title: Gambeeram
page122.description: After the death of his wife, a police commissioner raises their daughter on his own despite the danger he faces in his daily job.

page122.title: Enakkoru Magan Pirappan
page122.description: A rich lady has many granddaughters, but she expects nothing other than a baby boy when her youngest son's wife is pregnant.

page122.title: Aval Varuvala
page122.description: A young man falls for a girl after catching a glimpse of her at a shopping mall. After finding out where she lives, he proposes to her, but she refuses his offer stating that she does not want to get married.

page122.title: Arumugam
page122.description: Arumugam is a poor guy who helps his father earn money by selling idlies with him at a platform. His friend Karthik, who belongs to a rich family.Karthik's sister and his uncle do not approve their friendship, as it lowers their stature.

page123.title: Arivumani
page123.description: Arivumani is a South Indian Tamil film released in 2004.

page123.title: Arasu
page123.description: The film opens with Arasu (Sarath Kumar) murdering a person in Mumbai. Later the story shifts to Kumbakonam where he is an assistant to a temple priest (Delhi Ganesh). Soon the priest’s daughter Meera (Simran) falls in love with Arasu.

page123.title: Anandha Poongatre
page123.description: A young man falls in love with a widow who has a son. He avoids another woman when she tries to pursue him and tells her about his affection towards the widow. He starts to respect and love her even more after learning of her past.

page123.title: Alibabavum 40 Thirudargalum
page123.description: The film tells the story of Alibaba, a poor woodcutter, who becomes wealthy after finding a secret cave which contains various treasures and antiques. He resolves to keep his source of wealth a secret to lead a peaceful life.

page123.title: Alaigal Oivathillai
page123.description: Vichu and Mary fall in love, but complications arise when they learn they practice different religions.

page123.title: Adimai Penn
page123.description: Adimaippenn is a 1969 Indian Tamil-language peplum film directed by K. Shankar. The film features M. G. Ramachandran and Jayalalithaa.

page124.title: Aahaa
page124.description: The younger son of the family is considered as good for nothing, while the eldest is the ideal son, husband and father. He is rebuked for falling in love with a girl from a different caste; but things change when he guards his brother's secret.

page124.title: Velli Thirai
page124.description: It is a remake of 2005 Malayalam Film "Udayananu Tharam".When Saravanan goes to Hyderabad, Kanniah plagiarizes Saravanan's script and pitches it to a producer, under the condition that he has to play the hero in the film.

page124.title: Vaanmathi
page124.description: A young woman (Swathi) upsets her mother (Vadivukkarasi) by falling in love.This film portrays hatred that slowly transforms to love between two young people who are from very different financial backgrounds.

page124.title: Urimai Kural
page124.description: Urimaikural is a 1974 Indian Tamil-language film, directed by C. V. Sridhar and produced by Y. Kannaiah. The film stars M. G. Ramachandran, Latha, Anjali Devi and V. S. Raghavan in lead roles. The film had musical score by M. S. Viswanathan.

page124.title: Thirumathi Palanisami
page124.description: Palanisamy is an uneducated man who dreams to marry a teacher and lives with his friend Dhandapani. Palanisamy falls in love with Hamsaveni at first sight. First reluctant, she finally agrees to marry him, but only under three conditions.

page124.title: Missiamma
page124.description: A hilarious comedy about two unemployed college graduates from the city, who pretend to be a married couple, in order to find work as school teachers in a small village.

page125.title: Konjum Kili
page125.description: A story of troubled marital life, due to one partner's unnecessary doubt of another, causing mental agony to their children, and bringing tragic ends to their lives. A remake of 1986 Malayalam movie Poomukhappadiyil Ninneyum Kaathu.

page125.title: Andru Peidha Mazhayil
page125.description: The film is the remake of 1987 American psychological thriller Fatal Attraction.The film stars Sarath Babu, Silk Smitha and Saranya in the lead roles.

page125.title: Duet
page125.description: Two musical brothers look for love, only to have their quest end in tragedy for one.The soundtrack of the film by Academy Award winner A. R. Rahman is hailed as a masterpiece.

page125.title: Thillu Mullu
page125.description: To avoid being fired, Ayyampettai concocts an elaborate lie about having a twin. It is a remake of the 1979 Hindi film Gol Maal directed by Hrishikesh Mukherjee.

page125.title: Thangasurangam
page125.description: Shivaji , a CID officer is on a mission to bust a gang that is flooding the market with fake gold bars. The gang which had abducted a brilliant scientist who is an expert in alchemy had not been getting his cooperation to perfect the fake gold bars.

page125.title: Suvarillatha Chithirangal
page125.description: A widow gets into prostitution to take care of her children; her daughter looks down on her for doing this.

page126.title: Diwan
page126.description: A cook falls in love with the daughter of a rich man who does not approve of him and insults him. Angered, he challenges her father that he will get rich in a year.

page126.title: Azhagiya Theeye
page126.description: 4 boys from various parts of Tamil Nadu come together while involved in the making of a movie. The story is about how their lives are transformed when a girl gets involved.

page126.title: Avvaiyar
page126.description: Avvaiyar is a 1953 Indian Tamil-language historical drama film directed by Kothamangalam Subbu, and produced by S. S. Vasan. The film features K. B. Sundarambal and M. K. Radha in the lead roles.

page126.title: Asai Asaiyai
page126.description: A man is hired as a detective and asked to keep tabs on a girl to find out if she is having an affair. While doing his job, he ends up falling in love with her; but the girl does in believe in love as her sister had eloped with another man.

page126.title: Raman Thediya Seethai
page126.description: S.J.Raman (MGR), a very rich industrialist tries to find the soul mate.His future ideal wife has to possess absolutely 6 virtues, which a nice old couple revealed him in the bend of a way.

page126.title: Pudhupettai
page126.description: The story is set in the backdrop of the slums of Pudhupettai in Chennai, where a high school kid Kokki Kumar sees his mom dead after he comes back from watching a film. His father, the murderer is also planning to kill his son Kumar.

page127.title: Pudhu Pudhu Arthangal
page127.description: Bharathi is a famous singer who lives with his extremely possessive wife Gowri. Tensions escalate until Bharathi flees from home and ends up encountering someone else named Jyothi who are also escaping from her life.

page127.title: Kannukkul Nilavu
page127.description: A man with gaps in his memory consults a psychologist, hoping to find a girl he met briefly. A  Tamil psychological thriller film written and directed by Fazil.

page127.title: June R
page127.description: An orphan girl, after craving for mother's love since childhood, starts finding it in an elderly woman, who was abandoned by her own son.

page127.title: Irumbukkottai Murattu Singam
page127.description: A village is ruled by a tyrant and few villagers plan to over-throw him with a help of a man, who looks like a missing marshal. This look-alike comes to the village and tries to bring a change but the tyrant is too powerful for them.

page127.title: Indru Pol Endrum Vaazhga
page127.description: Because it was humbled that by his betrothed, Murugan (MGR) a nice provincial, puts itself to find in the capital, an even more beautiful and more intelligent wife who will be the liked for what he is : A simple man of the campaign.

page127.title: Idhaya Thamarai
page127.description: Vijay was an impulsive angry youth who fall in love with Manju. After an incident, he went to jail and a few years later, he meets Manju who is now married. She is married to her company owner Ranjith in order to be saved from Vijay's enemies.

page128.title: Hey! Nee Romba Azhaga Irukke
page128.description: A man falls in love with his childhood friend who does not seem to share the same feelings for him; meanwhile another woman is crazy about him.

page128.title: Five Star
page128.description: The story focuses on five friends Prabu, Elango, Sundar, Indra and Priya at the Madras Institute of Technology, who want to remain friends throughout their lifespan and hope to join the same company after graduation.

page128.title: Chithiram Pesuthadi
page128.description: A henchman who is loyal to his boss falls in love with a woman who changes his views on life and decides to mend his violent ways.

page128.title: Chinna Mapillai
page128.description: Prabhu is a kind-hearted poor man who works as a coolie in the bus stand. Visu, a marriage broker wants him to pose as a rich man from Singapore and marry Sukanya to break the arrogance and her money-minded father.

page128.title: Chennai 600028
page128.description: Friendship, love, and rivalry spice up the game of street cricket in the suburb of Chennai whose zip code give this movie its name.

page128.title: Mirattal
page128.description: The story of a fun-loving boy Bablu and his humorous love tale with a don Shankar Dada's sister Deepika

page129.title: Naan
page129.description: A hopeless orphan impersonates his dead co-passenger for his educational purpose and gets into trouble.No One Is Perfect!!

page129.title: Eppadi Manasukkul Vandhai
page129.description: Eppadi Manasukkul Vanthai is a 2012 Tamil romantic thriller film directed by P. V. Prasath, starring Vishva, Irfaan, Tanvi Vyas.

page129.title: Billa 2
page129.description: An ordinary man from the slums enters an underworld gang and becomes the most feared underworld don.It is a prequel to Billa (2007) and focuses on how David, an ordinary man  becomes Billa, a dreaded underworld don.

page129.title: Madhubana Kadai
page129.description: The film is set in a liquor store and talks about life in wine shops. It is a poignant but humorous story that unfolds over a day, and is about a group of hardcore drinkers.

page129.title: Paalai
page129.description: Paalai movie is Period film based on the story of people who lived 3000 years ago. Shammu plays the role of Kaayaampoo in this movie will be romancing with new face Sunil who plays the role of Vala.

page129.title: Marupadiyum Oru Kadhal
page129.description: Jeeva and Mahi, who lives in London, fall in love without seeing each other. When Mahi's multi-millionaire dad (Suman) shifts to Chennai, circumstances result in Jeeva and Mahi getting married, though they never realize their true identities.

page130.title: Vengayam
page130.description: A sub-inspector (Alexander) falls in love with a chirpy villager (Pavina). Meanwhile, fake godmen go missing in the village and he is asked to solve the case. What does a group of children have to do with this mystery?

page130.title: Konjum Mainakkale
page130.description: Konjum Mainakkale is a Tamil drama movie, directed by Karthikeyan APK. The cast of Konjum Mainakkale includes Udhai,Moganapriya.

page130.title: Ammu Kolai Vazhakku
page130.description: Ammu Kollai Vazhaku tells the story of Sivarajan who fights for justice, as he loses his daughter Vairamani who is raped and killed. When the law is blinded by political and monetary power, he has no other option than to hunt down.

page130.title: Manam Kothi Paravai
page130.description: Kannan is in love with his neighbor Revathy, whose father and uncles are the most dreaded goons in the village.

page130.title: Murattu Kaalai (2012)
page130.description: A remake of the Murattu Kaalai (1980 film).Kaalaiyan (Sundar C) is a simple person and the best Jallikattu (Bullfight) player in his village. His world revolves around his four younger brothers.

page130.title: Saguni
page130.description: A young man comes to the city to save his ancestral property, but later learns that a corrupt chief minister is against him.

page131.title: Ishtam
page131.description: Saravanan (Vimal) is helped by Sandhya (Nisha) when he needs some change to make a copy of his job application. When he fails to get the job, he blames and abuses her.

page131.title: Rattinam
page131.description: A young man falls in love with a schoolgirl, who initially resists his advances, but later falls for him. Their families, who come to know of the affair, try to nip it in the bud but the lovers manage to elope. How does this impact the families?

page131.title: Sri Rama Rajyam
page131.description: A Tamil Dubbed Version of the Telugu devotional film directed by Bapu based on the epic Ramayana.

page131.title: Mayanginen Thayanginen
page131.description: The film talks about how people with mental disorders need to be treated with care and one of the subplots in the film even include a romance.Nitin Sathya plays the role of a taxi driver.

page131.title: Urumi
page131.description: Chirakkal Kelu Nayanar, a warrior in 16th century Kerala wants to avenge his father killed in a confrontation with Vasco da Gama and his troops and is assisted by his best friend Vavvali and warrior princess Ayesha.(Tamil Dubbed Version)

page131.title: Thadaiyara Thaakka
page131.description: A young man dreams of making a fortune in Chennai; he owns a travel agency and is all set to marry his lover. After he crosses paths with a loan shark, the latter is killed mysteriously; the young man runs for cover and plans to find the murderer.

page132.title: Ooh La La La
page132.description: Ooh La La La ( Oohrvasi,Latha,Lalitha,Lavanya) is a romantic entertainer!! The hero's only aim in life is to woo girls, as many as possible, without any commitment. Then, comes a girl, there is a twist of fate and what happens to him is Oo La La La all about.

page132.title: Click 3
page132.description:
Avi is an ace photographer who is in a live-in relationship with Sonia, a model. 
One night while returning from a party, the couple accidentally knocks down a young girl with their speeding car. A romantic thriller!!

page132.title: Raja Pokkiri Raja
page132.description: A Tamil dubbed version of Pokkiri Raja Malayalam (2010 film).The film revolves around Madhavan Nair (Nedumudi Venu) who unknowingly kills a teenager and his eldest son, Raja, takes the blame and is sentenced to jail for five years.

page132.title: Nantha Nanthitha
page132.description: Nanda is thrown out of his home by his drunkard dad. While working as a muscleman for his friend, he meets Nanditha and falls in love. Nanda agrees to kill Knockout Chandran, a political candidate, for Devaraj, the local big shot. Does he succeed?

page132.title: Narasimhan IPS
page132.description: A Tamil dubbed version of Malayalam movie Achante Aanmakkal. This action film is based on a police story.

page132.title: Leelai
page132.description: Karthik's flirting ways during his college days leave a bad impression on Malar. A few years later, the two end up working at the same office, Karthik introduces himself to her as Sundar. How long can he carry on this game of deception?

page133.title: Vazhakku Enn 18/9
page133.description: A girl gets in trouble when her boyfriend films her private moments on his mobile phone without her knowledge.A Tamil crime thriller film written and directed by Balaji Sakthivel.

page133.title: Ullam
page133.description: The film after production delays failed to gain a theatrical release and was released straight to DVD in 2012.

page133.title: Sevarkodi
page133.description: The film is based on a real-life story in Thiruchendur about a famous swimming champion. The famous festival of ``Thiruchendur Soorasamharam`` has been shot for this movie.

page133.title: Padam Parthu Kathai Sol
page133.description: Surya (Tharun), a hitman, falls in love with Priya (Shikha), who runs a photo studio in Kanyakumari. Surya takes photos of Priya without her knowledge and sends them to her. Priya mistakes him for Ashok (Darshan), a police officer, takes a liking to Ashok.

page133.title: Maruthavelu
page133.description: Marudhavelu is an action drama directed by R.K.R Adhimoolam and stars Kailash, Natchathira, and Akansha in the leading roles.

page133.title: Vinmeengal
page133.description: Eagerly awaiting the arrival of their first born, Naren and Meera, a loving couple, are crushed when they learn that the baby has cerebral palsy due to complications that arose during pregnancy. Going against the doctor's advice, they decide to raise the baby.

page134.title: Jakkamma
page134.description: Jakkamma is a Tamil movie, it is Romance and Horror movie. Actor Jubin Raj and Meghna Sundar Raj are the lead roles in the movie. Vinayan is the director of the movie.

page134.title: Pathirama Pathukkunga
page134.description: New face Sharan is male lead role of the movie and pair with Swaathi is female lead role of the movie.C.Somasundaram is director and producer of the movie. Sivaji Raja Scores by Music.

page134.title: Aduthathu
page134.description: Aduthathu story revolves around a group of 10 people who are sent to the uninhabited island for a TV reality show. All ten should prove themselves & the prizes will be given to one who comes across & survives after facing all the inhuman conditions.

page134.title: Oru Kal Oru Kannadi
page134.description: A young boy tries to impress a young girl hardly and he too succeeds in it. But there lies the twist, because of a single phone call.

page134.title: Nanga
page134.description: The film, notably Selva's 25th directorial venture, revolves around a group of alumni from the 1985 batch of a Tiruchi College, who reunite in 2011.

page134.title: Kazhugu
page134.description: A man who earns his living by retrieving the corpses of suicide victims has no room for emotions in his life, but things take a different turn when a girl falls for him.

page135.title: Aravan
page135.description: A man who claims to be an orphan joins a gang of thieves, but the truth is later revealed when his life becomes endangered.

page135.title: Kadhal Pisase
page135.description: Vasantha is the daughter of a businessman, in whose house Ranganayaki is a maid. Her son Arun aims to make it big in life, thanks to support from Vasantha and her father. After he falls in love with Vasantha, Arun leaves Chennai to pursue his dreams.

page135.title: Kattu Puli
page135.description: Kattu Puli is an action-thriller set in the dense jungles of Thalaikonam forests in Kerala. The story focuses on three couples, who take a trek into the forest and get tangled in a huge crisis.

page135.title: 3 - Moonu
page135.description: Ram and Janani go through three stages of love from their high school, to college through their later years. A romantic-psychological thriller film!!

page135.title: Vachathi
page135.description: . The story is based on the Vachathi incident that took place years ago.A team entered the Dalit-dominated Vachathi village, searching for smuggled sandalwood and ransacked the villagers' property and done cruel activities on them.

page135.title: The Dirty Picture (tamil)
page135.description: The love story between an actress and a director. Inspired by the life of the late south Indian actress Silk Smitha.( Tamil Dubbed Version)

page136.title: Maharani
page136.description: Maharani movies talk about the consequences of a compulsory marriage. It also reveals the importance of being sincere in a married life. A romantic movie!!(Tamil Dubbed Version)

page136.title: Maasi
page136.description: Maasi is an action-drama movie and stars Arjun Sarja, Mammootty and Hema in the main leads and has been directed by G Kicha.

page136.title: Vettai Nayakan
page136.description: An 'encounter specialist' police officer is accused of extortion and accepting bribes.(Tamil Dubbed Version of 2010 Golimaar Telugu Movie.)

page136.title: Thenmerku Paruvakaatru
page136.description: Set on the backdrop of Theni, the story is about Murugaiyan (Vijay Sethupathi) who is a goat shepherd and he has a loving mother Veerayi (Saranya Ponvannan). She is a widow and struggles hard to raise Murugan and has an overflowing affection for him.

page136.title: Markandeyan
page136.description: Markandeyan is a 2011 Indian Tamil-language film written and directed by FEFSI Vijayan. It stars his son Sabarish, Savika Chaiyadej, Nivedhitha, Santhanam in lead.

page136.title: Kondan Koduthan
page136.description: Kabbadi player Raasu is in love with Sevandhi , his uncle Chellaiya's daughter. As they await marriage, life changes after Sevandhi's brother die on the night of his marriage to Raasu's sister.

page137.title: Dam 999
page137.description: After many years two mariners return to homeland with the hope of a new beginning, little did they know about a disaster that would change their destiny.

page137.title: Kollaikaran
page137.description: Kuruvi (Vidharth) is a petty village thief who hates to make an honest living. The carefree youngster has an unmarried elder sister who works in a mill, and a mentally challenged younger sister.

page137.title: Bodhi Dharma
