page137.description: A master monk tries to protect a naive young physician from a thousand-year-old snake demon. A contest of psychic powers results in mayhem. (Tamil Dubbed Version of Jet li's The Emperor and the White Snake 2011)

page137.title: Kadhalil Sodhappuvadhu Yeppadi
page137.description: Arun falls in love with a fellow student, Parvathi, who is going through a rough phase. Soon, they split and Arun gets attracted to another girl Cathy, which leads her to part ways with her boyfriend.

page137.title: Abhayam
page137.description: 5 friends set out to a farmhouse for a party to celebrate the prospective marriage of Lakshmi. On the way, they collide with a police vehicle and speed away to the party.(Tamil Dubbed Version of Danger 2005 Telugu Movie)

page137.title: Muppoluthum Un Karpanaigal
page137.description: A man falls in love with a beautiful girl, who also loves him. But later, after the man gets injured in a car accident, the truth about her identity is revealed.

page138.title: Marina
page138.description: An orphan boy leaves his cruel uncle and ends up living on a beach where he sells food to earn money. He uses that money to go to night school and his dedication inspires other kids on the beach to study as well.

page138.title: Nellu
page138.description: The film is based on the Kizhavenmani incident that happened in 1968.Nellu documents the social imbalance that prevailed post-independence in the villages. The theme of the movie revolves around the poor agricultural workers and their landlords.

page138.title: Dhoni
page138.description: The story is about a teacher who is unhappy with our education system, and faces hurdles on his journey to make changes to the institution.

page138.title: Rajapattai
page138.description: 'Anal' Murugan, a gym boy, who dreams of becoming a successful villain in films. He bumps into an old man who is under pressure from his son Chidambaram to sell his orphanage to a scheming lady politician Ranganayaki.

page138.title: Mahaan Kanakku
page138.description: Mahaan Kanakku movie is a Tamil movie directed by Sampath.Ramana is in the lead male role. An action comedy!!

page138.title: Oru Nadigayin Vakku Moolam
page138.description: The movie is about the struggles Actresses face to make it to the film industry. Sonia Agarwal is from a histrionics lineage where her father is a drama artist, but her family gets insulted due to competition.

page139.title: Madhuvum Mythiliyum
page139.description: Madhuvum Mythiliyum is a Tamil drama movie, directed by J Jayanthi. The cast of Madhuvum Mythiliyum includes Yuvan, Sriji.

page139.title: Thambi Vettothi Sundaram
page139.description: Thambi Vettothi Sundaram movie deals with an off-beat subject based on a true story happened in Kanyakumari. It is based on the life of a person in a place that is on the Tamilnadu - Kerala border.

page139.title: Vithagan
page139.description: The film, which has been in making since 2008, released on 18 November 2011 as per schedule. 'Vithagan', which also happens to be the 50th film of Parthipan, has him in the role of a police officer, who is brainy as well as brawny.

page139.title: Vellore Maavattam
page139.description: An IPS officer, Muthukumar (Nanda) joins the National Police Academy in New Delhi with his own aspirations and dreams. But he is soon disillusioned and faces the reality.

page139.title: Vaagai Sooda Vaa
page139.description: Vimal was sent by his father to do social service in a village. But later, he gets a good job.

page139.title: Ore Kadal
page139.description: Ore Kadal is a Tamil Dubbed Version of 2007 Malayalam film written and directed by Shyamaprasad. The film examines the extra-marital relationship between an intellectual economist and a housewife.

page140.title: Bhayam Bhayam
page140.description: Dr. Ramdas is leading medical practitioner in Hyderabad. Fed up with the fast-paced city life, Ramdas and his wife decide to move to a quiet bungalow on the outskirts of the city.(A Tamil Dubbed Version of Winter 2009 Malayalam Horror Movie!!)

page140.title: 8am Number Veedu
page140.description: A Tamil Dubbed Version of Telugu movie, Aa Intlo. The movie revolves around a family in a house bearing the number 8. It stars Chinna and Mayuri in the lead roles.

page140.title: Gurusamy
page140.description: Gurusamy is a Tamil movie based on Mythology, it is Swami Iyyapan Film, directed by K R Manimuthu.

page140.title: Konjam Sirippu Konjam Kobam
page140.description: Velu is an honest police officer who falls in love with Archana. The love birds find support at their respective homes and decide to tie the knot. On the day of engagement, a twist happens which stops the engagement.

page140.title: Maharajah
page140.description: Mahadevan (Nassar) is unhappy with his present life which is monotonous and feels that he should live a modernized life which he has missed in his earlier life.

page140.title: Mambattiyan
page140.description: A remake of the 1983 Tamil blockbuster Malaiyoor Mambattiyan!!When Mambattiyan comes to know that his father has been murdered by the landlord, he kills the influential person and those in support of him.

page141.title: Raththa Sarithiram
page141.description: Pratap rises to power and becomes a hero to the poor and oppressed until he meets his nemesis Surya Narayana Reddy. A biographical political crime thriller based on the life of Paritala Ravindra.

page141.title: Sindhu Samaveli
page141.description: The story revolves around an illicit relationship between a girl and her father-in-law. An independent erotic thriller film!!

page141.title: Nanban
page141.description: 10 years after finishing college, two best friends and their enemy go on a search for their third friend, while finding out some truths along the way.

page141.title: Yavarum Nalam
page141.description: Manohar moves into a new apartment, 13B, on the 13th floor with his family, fulfilling his life's biggest dream. But they encounter a series of small but strange incidents.The women in the family get hooked onto a new TV show Yavarum Nalam.

page141.title: Thoonga Nagaram
page141.description: A group of four friends, callous youth, who go hammer and tongs to make both ends meet. Vimal, a wedding videographer comes across his childhood friend Anjali, who is a compere in a local cable TV channel and love blossoms.

page141.title: Peranmai
page141.description: A brave man and a group of 5 NCC girls were onto a trekking in a forest. At the same time, a terrorist group plans to destroy an innovative rocket launch from that forest.

page142.title: Mouna Guru
page142.description: An angry young college student lashes out at the society constantly and as a result, ends up in the crosshairs of some really corrupt police officials.

page142.title: Kanchana
page142.description: Raghava is a typical jobless youth who spends his days playing cricket with friends. Raghava and his friends switch to an abandoned ground that is supposedly haunted to play cricket.

page142.title: Poraali
page142.description: Kumaran & Nallavan reach Chennai in search of jobs and land at the house of their friend Pulikutty. They land jobs at a fuel station and Nallavan falls for co-worker Tamilarasi. Their  past comes back to haunt them.

page142.title: Mayakkam Enna
page142.description: Karthik Subramaniam (Dhanush) is an aspiring wildlife photographer, whose aim is to be featured in the National Geographic magazine, but is forced to take wedding pictures and odd assignments for a living.

page142.title: Osthe
page142.description: A police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians and what happens, in the end, forms the crux of the story.

page142.title: Anbulla Kamal
page142.description: Roy, Soorya, Amir, Gauri come from entirely different backgrounds, but one thing that they have in common is cancer. Kamal Hassan, gives a pep talk on how he lost some of his close friends to cancer and gives the four friends some confidence. (Tamil Dubbed Version)

page143.title: Ayutha Poratam
page143.description: Ayutha Porattam revolves around a group of ammunition manufacturers and is known for their outstanding skills of making them in style.

page143.title: Uyarthiru 420
page143.description: A con man falls for the girl he was deceiving and decides to work as an honest man. While working in a hotel, he discovers that his boss is being troubled by a high-profile man and plans to help him by conning the man.

page143.title: Velayudham
page143.description: An ordinary milkman is forced to become the fictional character Velayudham who takes on the scum of the earth.

page143.title: Sathurangam
page143.description: An investigative journalist working for a magazine fights corruption in high places. When his girlfriend is abducted, he has to determine which of his enemies took her.

page143.title: 7 Aum Arivu
page143.description: A genetic engineering student tries to bring back the skills of a legend of the past and use his skills to save India from a deadly virus attack by China.

page143.title: Rowthiram
page143.description: Shiva (Jiiva) is taught by his grandfather (Prakash Raj) to be bold and brave and fight against all odds, especially all that`s evil. Shiva alls in love with a girl (Shriya Saran) after saving her from a thug.

page144.title: Kasethan Kadavulada
page144.description: It is a remake of Telugu film Blade Babji. A pickpocket takes up the mission of earning 4 crores to rescue the slum dwellers in his area from a builder.A comedy entertainer!!

page144.title: Engeyum Eppodhum
page144.description: Two love stories - one set against the backdrop of Chennai and the other in Trichy - that join together in the climax, in a most unexpected turn of events.

page144.title: Vedi
page144.description: The movie tells the story of a young police officer, Prabhakaran who goes to Kolkata in search of his sister, Aishwarya.A remake of the successful 2008 Telugu film Souryam.

page144.title: Vandhaan Vendraan
page144.description: Arjun was ordered by her girl friend that she would marry him only if he convinces a suave don to surrender to police.

page144.title: Potta Potti
page144.description: Two cousins in a village are aspiring to marry their uncle's daughter. As conflict arises, the girl proposes a cricket match. S. Ramesh is a cricketer who is caught by one of the cousins and what happens next is the rest of the story.

page144.title: Aaravadhu Vanam
page144.description: This movie is based on a real incident that shook the entire nation where entire village community vacated their lands for the sake of young couple in love.

page145.title: Singakottai
page145.description: A Tamil Dubbed Version of Hanuman Junction 2001 Telugu Movie which is a remake of the 2000 Malayalam blockbuster Thenkasipattanam.

page145.title: Enga Veettu Pillai
page145.description: Enga Veettu Pillai is a 1965 Indian Tamil film, directed by Chanakya. The film features M. G. Ramachandran in a double role while B. Saroja Devi, S. V. Ranga Rao, M. N. Nambiar play supporting roles.

page145.title: Veppam
page145.description: Karthi, Vishnu, and Revathi are best friends from childhood and grow up together. Vishnu falls in love with a prostitute and gets involved in a drug deal in a bid to free her from her pimp. But he is double-crossed and ends up dead.

page145.title: Oram Po
page145.description: An expert auto driver and his friend are involved in illegal auto races, but there is a rival gang that is always causing them trouble.

page145.title: Doo
page145.description: Doo is a well knit tale, the story begins with Vasanth who works in the sub registrar office. He lives with his mom and hangs out with his friends. His life takes a turn when he meets his school friend Swapna, a software professional.

page145.title: Yuvan Yuvathi
page145.description: A rich IT professional who is intimidated by his ruthless father bumps into a girl at the US consulate and falls for her.

page146.title: Mankatha
page146.description: Vinayak and his 4 team members rob a booty of 500 crores INR. Trouble starts when two members of the team betray them.

page146.title: Mouna Raagam
page146.description: Divya, a woman grieving over the death of her lover, is convinced into an arranged marriage with Chandra Kumar. Over a year the couple attempt to adjust to each other's presence and live with each other.

page146.title: Thavamai Thavamirundhu
page146.description: The film sensitively portrays the struggles of a father whose main priority in life is the well being of his children, and who is determined to see his children grow up to become decent, successful persons.

page146.title: Deiva Thirumagal
page146.description: A man with disabilities fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his opponent lawyer the value of love and family.

page146.title: Kandha Kottai
page146.description: A young man who is against the idea of love and romance meets a woman who is the exact opposite of him - she is all for love.

page146.title: Unarchigal 2005
page146.description: Unarchigal (English: Feelings) is a 2005 Tamil drama film directed by K. Rajan.

page147.title: Velaikaran
page147.description: This film is the remake of the Bollywood film Namak Halaal.Rajinikanth must save the hotel owner from killers and win his true love, Amala.

page147.title: Maaveeran
page147.description: The son (Rajinikanth) of a freedom fighter (Dara Singh) grows up to fight imperialistic rule.The movie is a remake of Mard.

page147.title: Polladhavan 1980
page147.description: The story is about a teacher and her nephew hired by rich family to teach their daughter. One day she witness a murder in a train and discovers that the murderer is the father of her student. A remake of the Kannada language film Premada Kanike.

page147.title: Rajadhi Raja
page147.description: A rich property owner is killed by his wife and her brother Aadimoolam. Raja, the owner's son, returns from the United States to find out what happened to his father.

page147.title: Panakkaran
page147.description: Rajini is a poor man who works in a labor factory. He works only to give his money to his drunkard father (Senthaamarai) who tortures him for that right from his childhood.

page147.title: Nattukku Oru Nallavan
page147.description: Nattukku Oru Nallavan is the story of an honest police officer (Rajinikanth) and his fight against a dreaded criminal named Daddy (Anant Nag) who indulges in organ transplant mafia.

page148.title: Naam Pirandha Mann
page148.description: Naam Pirandha Mann is a Tamil language film starring Sivaji Ganesan, Gemini Ganesan and K. R. Vijaya in the lead roles. Kamal Haasan plays a supporting role together with Phataphat Jayalaxmi.

page148.title: Mapillai 1989
page148.description: Aarumugam rescues a bride being forced into marriage, and the two fall in love.It is a remake of Telugu film Athaku Yamudu Ammayiki Mogudu.

page148.title: E
page148.description: A doctor chooses an orphan's grandmother and a woman's sister as specimens to test what he claims is a miracle drug, but he might have ulterior motives for testing his medicine on innocent slum dwellers.

page148.title: Sollathan Ninaikiren
page148.description: The story is about three sisters each getting attracted to their tenant, a young man played by Sivakumar.The movie turns the entire concept of romantic movies by its head - the concept being that the hero does not always have to get the girl.

page148.title: Virumbugiren
page148.description: Shivan an aspiring designer's hopes crash when he lands up with the responsibility of looking after his mother and younger brothers with his father's sudden death. He meets Thavamani , a beautiful rustic while on a posting in a village and they fall in love.

page148.title: Uyirile Kalanthathu
page148.description: A man, who is the youngest in the family and much pampered, is detested by his elder brother. He falls for a girl and decides to meet her family, but out of animosity, his brother damages his image in front of them.

page149.title: Thevar Magan
page149.description: The film tells the story of Sakthivel who returns home to meet his father Periya Thevar who is a respected village chieftain to marry his girlfriend.  After the death of his father, Sakthivel takes over the duty of his father.

page149.title: Thendral
page149.description: A young girl's fondness for a writer grows into love over the years; the writer is absorbed in his work and has no time for her. But an unexpected event occurs and he ends up getting her pregnant.

page149.title: Majunu
page149.description: Vasanth is a son of a wealthy MP Gajapathy who hates love and against love marriage. He lives a fun-filled enjoyable life until he meets a girl while rushing to save a baby who is about to fall on a railway track while the girl also rushed for the same reason.

page149.title: Kadhal Kottai
page149.description: A woman loses her purse and her university certificates along with it, but a man finds them and mails them to her. They fall in love with each other through letters and phone calls.

page149.title: Aayirathil Oruvan
page149.description: Anita leads a military group to an unexplored island to find a missing archaeologist and to know about a Chola Prince who went into hiding. They face unexpected adventures.

page149.title: Vietnam Veedu
page149.description: Prestige Padmanabha Iyer retires from his company executive position and has a lonely and unhappy life with his family in the ancestral home Vietnam House, named for the constant fighting and arguing.

page150.title: Viduthalai
page150.description: Viduthalai is a Tamil film is directed by K. Vijayan. It stars Sivaji Ganesan, Rajinikanth, Vishnuvardhan and Madhavi. It is a remake of 1980 movie Qurbani.

page150.title: Veerapandiya Kattabomman
page150.description: Veerapandiya Kattabomman is a 1959 Indian Tamil-language biographical war film directed B. R. Panthulu. The film's screenplay was written by Ma. Po. Sivagnanam while its story and dialogue were written by Sakthi T. K. Krishnasamy.

page150.title: Tenali Raman
page150.description: Based on the life of Tenali Rama Krishna famous jester poet of 15th century.Starring N. T. Rama Rao, Sivaji Ganesan, Bhanumathi Ramakrishna, Jamuna in the lead roles and music composed by Viswanathan–Ramamoorthy.

page150.title: Sri Raghavendra
page150.description: The film revolves around the life of Madhwa saint Raghavendra Swami.It was also the 100th film of Superstar Rajini's career.

page150.title: Pooveli
page150.description: A young man decides to help his classmate who has lost her lover in an accident. Her family thinks that he is her husband; the girl plans to make her family believe that her husband is not a good man, so that he can go back to his life.

page150.title: Pandiyan
page150.description: Pandiyan is a police officer whose sister's husband goes missing. In order to find him and catch the culprits, he goes undercover.

page151.title: Padikathavan 1985
page151.description: The story is about a man who strives hard to make his younger brother to study. The two brothers are the step-brothers of Sivaji Ganesan. The younger brother of rajinikanth after distressing from rajinikanth finally joins with him.

page151.title: Oru Oodhappu Kan Simittugiradhu
page151.description: Oru Oodhappu Kan Simittugiradhu is a Tamil language film starring Kamal Haasan in the lead role of the protagonist, Ravi. This movie is based on a novel by the same name written by Pushpa Thangadorai.

page151.title: Navarathri
page151.description: Navarathri is a 1964 Tamil Drama film by A. P. Nagarajan. The film is well known for starring Sivaji Ganesan in nine distinct roles: the basic emotions - wonder, fear, compassion, anger, peace, love, courage, repulsion and happiness.

page151.title: Naan Sigappu Manithan
page151.description: A narcoleptic becomes a vigilante when tragedy strikes. A film about narcolepsy, a sleeping disorder. An action thriller!!

page151.title: Naan Adimai Illai
page151.description: A wealthy woman marries a photographer against her parents' wishes, and because of the marriage's different social classes, problems soon arise.

page151.title: Muthal Mariyathai
page151.description: A middle-aged man (Shivaji Ganesan) finds escape from his loveless marriage through his friendship with a boatman's daughter (Radha).

page152.title: Maayavi
page152.description: Surya is a tourist guide in Mahabalipuram. He is not averse to stealing small things from tourists. When the times become really hard, Surya and his friend Satyan decide to commit a big time robbery.

page152.title: Manasellam
page152.description: On the way to Chennai, Bala's bag and certificates get stolen on the train.Sundaram provides him accommodation along with other bachelors in the top portion of his house. Malar stays opposite this house and the bachelors are crazy about her.

page152.title: Kappalottiya Thamizhan
page152.description: Chidambaram Pillai, a patriotic lawyer, emerges as a revolutionary leader, and he struggles to free his country from the British.

page152.title: Kana Kandaen
page152.description: A man comes up with a dream plan to help society, but things take a turn when he meets a man who promises to finance his project.

page152.title: Gnana Oli
page152.description: Gnana Oli is a 1972 Tamil language drama film directed by P. Madhavan, written by Vietnam Veedu Sundaram, starring Sivaji Ganesan in the lead role. This film was remade in Hindi as Devata and in Telugu as Chakravarthy.

page152.title: Gauravam
page152.description: Gauravam is a 1973 Tamil language legal drama film directed by Vietnam Veedu Sundaram, starring Sivaji Ganesan in a dual role.

page153.title: Deiva Magan
page153.description: A lawyer with a scarred face is happily married and they have twins; one of the twins has the same scar as the father. Unable to tolerate the similarity, the father gives away the eldest son to someone else.

page153.title: Avargal
page153.description: Avargal is a 1977 Tamil-language romance film made by K. Balachander starring Sujatha, Kamal Hassan and Rajinikanth. The film had a reputation of being one of the most sensitive movies on women’s lib.

page153.title: Aadu Puli Attam
page153.description: A story of a young man who dreams of becoming a policeman, but decides to go against the police due to circumstances and heads a gang of thieves. When he comes to know that his associates are much worse than thieves, he joins the police.

page153.title: Aval Peyar Tamilarasi
page153.description: Ahead of the international women's day, director Kathiravan has come up with an outline that has the potential to deliver a film that celebrates woman's empowerment.

page153.title: Vattaram
page153.description: A chauffeur is framed by a businessman's henchman; unable to bear the humiliation, the man kills himself. His son grows up on the mean streets as a gun dealer, waiting for an opportunity to exact revenge.

page153.title: Sangamam
page153.description: This film depicts the disputes between two forms of the musical professions. One being purely Classical (Carnatic) and the other being rural folk (Tamil Nadu folk).

page154.title: Raasaiyya
page154.description: An orphan falls for a beautiful woman (Roja) who prepares to marry a wealthy man.The film revolves around the life struggle and love life of the character played by Prabhu Deva.

page154.title: Pennin Manathai Thottu
page154.description: A heart surgeon is loved by everyone in his family. A woman and a kid with a heart problem arrive at his house, but when she learns the identity of the doctor, she refuses to let the child have an operation performed by him.

page154.title: Parasakthi
page154.description: "Parasakthi" narrates the misfortunes that befall the members of a Tamil family. The youngest sister gets widowed and becomes the victim of an attempted rape by a temple priest.

page154.title: Mazhai
page154.description: Two men, one an unemployed youth and the other, a notorious gangster, fall for the same girl. The girl falls in love with the first guy; their affair is foiled by her father and the don. She is kidnapped by the don and the young man rescues her.

page154.title: Kanden Kadhalai
page154.description: A remake of the 2007 Hindi blockbuster Jab We Met.A chance encounter between two polar-opposite strangers on a train journey ends up changing their lives.

page154.title: Indiran Chandiran
page154.description: A corrupt mayor decides to live honest life.The story of the film is inspired by Richard Dreyfuss's 1988 film Moon over Parador.

page155.title: Goa
page155.description: The film follows the journey of three young men, Ramarajan, Vinayagam and Saamikannu, who flee from their remote, conservative village to escape their overly strict families and travel to the international tourist-destination Goa.

page155.title: Unnai Thedi
page155.description: Raghu meets Malavika in New Zealand. While on a road trip to Christchurch, they get close. Upon arriving they don't reveal their feelings for each other. Will they ever meet again? Will they express their feelings?

page155.title: Thirupathi
page155.description: A doctor's dereliction of duties at a hospital leads to the death of a pregnant woman, prompting her brother's vengeance.

page155.title: Thillana Mohanambal
page155.description: A villainous man threatens the love between a musician (Shivaji Ganesan) and a dancer (Padmini).

page155.title: Dharmathin Thalaivan
page155.description: A man (Prabhu) meets a small-time criminal (Rajinikanth) who looks like his late brother.This movie is a remake of Kasme Vaade.The film also marked the debut of Kushboo in Tamil cinema.

page155.title: Siva Manasula Sakthi
page155.description: The movie is about the Blossom of love, fun and lots more between the characters Siva and Sakthi. The 1st half shows the blossom of love in the mind of Siva while we find a new turn during the second half where Sakthi reciprocates it.

page156.title: Senthoora Poove
page156.description: The story is about how a young girl is ill-treated by her stepmother and how her brother's friend saves her and her husband. It was one of the highest grossing Tamil films of the year 1988.Vijayakanth won his first Tamil Nadu State Film Award for Best Actor.

page156.title: Satham Podathey
page156.description: Based on a true incident, the story revolves around Bhanu who gets married to Rathnavel Kalidas, a guy who works in railways as a Hockey Player. He married Bhanu, by hiding the facts that he is impotent and is a recovering alcoholic.

page156.title: Priyamudan
page156.description: The story focuses on the protagonist, who is of a hyper-possessive nature with negative shades and therefore, tries to achieve whatever he desires using any means.

page156.title: Poovellam Kettuppar
page156.description: Two friends, both music directors, have a bitter fall out after a fight with a film director. Later, their children end up falling in love with each other, and, when they learn of each other's fathers, come up with a plan to reunite their parents.

page156.title: Ponniyin Selvan
page156.description: This is the story of Venu, a middle class young man who lives in a typical middle class area. His simple life revolves around his loving mother, sister, his neighbor and his friends. He has an inferiority complex because of the scar on his face.

page156.title: Pokkisham
page156.description: In 1970, a marine engineer Lenin (Cheran) from Calcutta comes across a Nagore girl Nadira (Padmapriya). Started with friendship, later seeded with love, Lenin mails a letter once a month.

page157.title: Pasamalar
page157.description: The movie follows Rajasekhar and his relationship with his younger sister. She falls in love with his friend.

page157.title: Paramasivan
page157.description: Siva is in jail, awaiting the death sentence for killing corrupt and evil members of the police force who had killed his father and sister.A police officer decides to employ Siva to assist him in fighting terrorism, renaming him as Paramasivan.

page157.title: Oru Thalai Ragam
page157.description: Oru Thalai Raagam is the heartbreaking love story of Subhadra and Raja, played by (Roopa) and (Shankar) respectively. The film completed 365 days of run in several theaters.

page157.title: Oor Kavalan
page157.description: A villager struggles to get justice for his brother who is killed mysteriously. He finds out the truth and in the course exposes fake god men and the rich who use superstition to commit crime and go un-punished.

page157.title: Muniyandi Vilangial Moonramandu
page157.description: A fun loving college student falls in love with a local bigwig's daughter who gives preference to people belonging to his caste only. The girl's wedding is arranged and she denies that she is in love with him.

page157.title: Moondru Mudichu
page157.description: Balaji (Kamal Hassan) and Prasad (Rajnikanth) fall in love with college coed Selvi (Sridevi).

page158.title: Minsara Kanavu
page158.description: A mother superior's nephew (Arvind Swamy) falls in love with a young woman (Kajol) who has intentions of becoming a nun.

page158.title: Lesa Lesa
page158.description: The story is partially adapted from the 1998 Malayalam film Summer in Bethlehem.The story starts with Chandru cheating most people in and around Ooty of their money due to his childish ventures.

page158.title: Kandan Karunai
page158.description: The film revolves around Lord Murugan, his birth, marriage and his acceptance of the post of the head of the army of heaven.

page158.title: Kalavani
page158.description: Vimalraj is the ill-behaved son of the gullible Saranya and her husband Ilavarasu. Vimalraj falls in love with a girl - much to the despair of her brother who nurses a rivalry against him. What happens next forms the climax.

page158.title: Kalathur Kannamma
page158.description: Kalathur Kannamma is a 1960 Indian Tamil-language romantic drama film produced by A. V. Meiyappan and directed by A. Bhimsingh. The film stars Gemini Ganesan and Savitri in the lead, while Kamal Haasan made his debut in this film as a child artist.

page158.title: Kadhal Virus
page158.description: Deepak is a budding filmmaker trying to get his first production out. He meets and falls in love with Geetha, and decides to take his relationship with her further once his first film is made. Misunderstandings lead to their separation.

page159.title: Ennavale
page159.description: When a man and his friends start a music troupe that performs at weddings, he is highly motivated by his landlord's daughter.

page159.title: Doubles
page159.description: Doubles is a Tamil drama film directed by Pandiarajan. The film stars him alongside Prabhu Deva and Meena in the lead roles.

page159.title: Arangetram
page159.description: Arangetram is a 1973 Tamil-language family drama film directed by K. Balachander, starring Prameela, Sivakumar, S. V. Subbaiah, Kamal Haasan and M. N. Rajam in prominent roles.

page159.title: Azhagarsamiyin Kudhirai
page159.description: The villagers believe the Rain Gods will favor them after the annual Thiruvizha, during which the deity is taken around the village on a wooden horse.They are in for a rude shock when the horse goes missing.

page159.title: 180 No Rules
page159.description: A young man Ajay (cancer victim) meets two lovely women Renu (wife) and Vidya (journalist) in his life.A light-hearted romantic comedy entertainer about the power of the moment.

page159.title: Yathumaagi
page159.description: Anand (Sachin) is an advertisement photographer, he comes across Annalakshmi (Sunaina), who is conservative in her looks. After a few initial encounters, the girl develops love for him.But Anand has other plans.

page160.title: Vamsam
page160.description: A young man tries to experience life and find love amid clan rivalries in his rural village.An intriguing tale of the clash of clans!!

page160.title: Thenavattu
page160.description: A young man goes to Chennai and takes a job making sickles for a an employer -- who murders people; the young man kills his boss's brother who has behaved inappropriately with his girlfriend.

page160.title: Thee
page160.description: It is a remake of the classic Hindi film Deewar.The movie tells the story of two brothers, Raja and Ravi, who follow different career paths: Raja is a smuggler and Ravi the policeman who is asked to hunt Raja down.

page160.title: Thamizh Padam
page160.description: The movie is a spoof and mocks the stereotypical Tamil cinema scenes and situations.

page160.title: Sura
page160.description: Sura is a fisherman who becomes a one-man army and fights injustice when goons try to swindle the simple fisherfolk.An action-packed film, set in a fishermen colony!!

page160.title: Pasanga
page160.description: The movie revolves around the life of Anbukkarasu and Jeevanandham, their rivalry and its consequences and their reunion during the 6th grade at local Government School.

page161.title: Maasilamani
page161.description: A do-gooder man, who fights for the rights of the poor but is known as a rowdy, proposes marriage to a girl and she rejects him. Determined to woo her, he tries to win over her family but another admirer of hers tries to sabotage his image.

page161.title: Kattradhu Thamizh
page161.description: A young post-graduate faces difficulties with finding employment, and struggles against social inequalities. A psychological thriller film written and directed by Ram.

page161.title: Kandaen
page161.description: Vasanth is a computer engineer, wants to marry a girl of his choice. However, in his village, his grandfather wants him to marry his relative. Vasanth in a bid to stop the wedding says that he is in love with a girl.

page161.title: Kalaignan
page161.description: A popular pop star gets stalked by a serial killer and gets framed up.Kalaignan is a 1993 Tamil-language thriller film directed by G. B. Vijay and produced by Ramkumar Ganesan.

page161.title: Kaadhal Solla Vandhen
page161.description: The story's set in Trichy, and you have flaky, fun-loving youngster Nanu Prabhu (Balaji), stepping into college from school with his friend Petha Perumal (Sabesh Karthik), and the freedom of it all blows him away.

page161.title: Kacheri Arambam
page161.description: Paari is a do-gooder helping everyone in need. A magnanimous man, he gives anything and everything to others if they ask for. Promising his dad Vasu (Azhagam Perumal) to earn more, Paari sets out to Chennai. But he faces more challenges.

page162.title: Dhaam Dhoom
page162.description: Two weeks prior to his wedding, a young doctor travels to Russia to attend a conference and gets caught up in a web of crime.

page162.title: Aintham Padai
page162.description: The film is about relationships between two families where hardships and affections are on the competencies. A mass entertainer!!

page162.title: Jayam
page162.description: A young woman's marriage is arranged with her first cousin by her parents during her childhood, but she falls in love with another guy. When the parents fix her marriage with the cousin, she elopes with her lover.

page162.title: Venghai
page162.description: A young man supports his father in opposing a local MLA, who often gives them trouble.

page162.title: Avan Ivan
page162.description: A landlord takes a liking to two half-brothers who con people and adopts them. But his adopted family's harmony is disrupted when a smuggler enters their lives.

page162.title: Maathi Yosi
page162.description: Four friends turn out to be vagabonds and go to the extent of even killing the village President's son. After few similar delinquent experiences, they are forced to leave the village and end up coming to Chennai.

page163.title: Villu
page163.description: Pugazh, with the help of his relative, Inspector Joseph, succeeds in tracking down a wanted criminal Raaka and kills him. He meets Janavi and instantly falls in love with her.

page163.title: Villan
page163.description: Story about twins Shiva and Vishnu. Shiva, the elder one, is a bus conductor, while Vishnu, the mindly retarded one, is handicapped. Shiva overhears his parents' plot to kill Vishnu. He runs away to another city with Vishnu, and strives hard to look after him.

page163.title: Vettaikaaran
page163.description: Police-Ravi is a student aspiring to become a police officer, becomes hunted when he helps his friend out of trouble.The hunted becomes the Hunter to secure his future.

page163.title: Vetri Kodi Kattu
page163.description: Sekar lives in a village near Tenkasi along with his mother Deivanai and two sisters. Drought hits their village and agriculture does not prove to be profitable which prompts Sekar to seek out an opportunity to leave to Dubai for work.

page163.title: Vel
page163.description: Brothers separated as children grow up in drastically different environments.It stars Suriya and Asin and features Vadivelu, Kalabhavan Mani and Nassar in supporting roles.

page163.title: Vasantha Maaligai
page163.description: A woman must overcome a wealthy alcoholic's wicked family as she tries to help him turn his life around.

page164.title: Varumayin Niram Sivappu
page164.description: Poetical forces play in the life of an unemployed yet well educated young man.He finds the depth and the beauty of his principles yet fate leaves him in destitution.

page164.title: Vanathai Pola
page164.description: Vellaichaamy thinks the world of his three brothers, even giving up marriage when he learns that the woman he loves plans to send them to a hostel after the wedding. He works hard to raise them and they too reciprocate his love and affection.

page164.title: Vaalve Maayam
page164.description: A man inexplicably turns away from his fiancee after trying every trick in the book to win her heart.

page164.title: Uyarntha Ullam
page164.description: Uyarndha Ullam is a 1985 Tamil-language drama film directed by S. P. Muthuraman and produced by AVM Productions. The film features Kamal Haasan and Ambika in the lead roles.

page164.title: Ullasa Paravaigal
page164.description: Ravi is in denial about his mental health as a result of the death of his girlfriend. His father and friend Raju hatch a plan to take him overseas to get him treatment for his illness. With the help of his childhood friend Nirmala and Raju, Ravi gets better.

page164.title: Ulaipali
page164.description: A factory worker learns he is heir to a great fortune and decides to avenge the murder of his father.

page165.title: Time
page165.description: Srinivasa, wanting to get married, advertises in the personals and gets a positive response from Tulasi and her father. Without ever seeing each other, over phone conversations, the two fall in love.

page165.title: Thudikkum Karangal
page165.description: Rajinikanth is an auto mechanic and brother of Vijayakumar who works in Jaishankar's estate as a clerk. The movie portrays the events dealing with the clash between Rajini and Jaishankar.

page165.title: Thambikku Entha Ooru
page165.description: An arrogant spoiled brat learns the value of hard work and discipline after spending a year in his father's friend's village.

page165.title: Thalapathi
page165.description: Surya (Rajnikanth) is an orphan raised in a slum. He finds a friend in the local Godfather (Mamooty). They rule the town and forms a parallel government.

page165.title: Thai Meethu Sathiyam
page165.description: Thai Meethu Sathiyam is a 1978 Indian Tamil-language action-adventure film inspired by the western film genre, directed by R. Thyagarajan. The film stars Rajinikanth and Sripriya in the lead roles

page165.title: Sukran
page165.description: Actor Vijay played Guest role.Ravi Shankar (Ravi Krishna) and Sandhya (Natassha), students of a college in Dindigul Tamil Nadu, are love birds. But Sandhya faces problem in her home as her uncle has false eye on her.

page166.title: Soora Samhaaram
page166.description: Pandian vows to catch a drug kingpin after his partner is murdered. When he is kidnapped and turned into an addict, Pandian fights to overcome the addiction and get revenge for his friend.

page166.title: Snegithiye
page166.description: The story is adapted from the 1999 Marathi film Bindhaast written by Chandrakant Kulkarni.he film notably features only female characters in the lead roles.

page166.title: Siva
page166.description: Long-estranged friends (Raghuvaran, Rajnikanth) reunite to bring a villain to justice.The film is a remake of the 1977 film Khoon Pasina.

page166.title: Sippikkul Muthu
page166.description: With his grandchildren at his side, an old man (Kamal Hassan) looks back on his life and marriage.The movie depicts the plight of a young widow who is rescued by an autistic man.

page166.title: Savaal
page166.description: Savaal is a Tamil language film starring Kamal Haasan, Jaishankar, Y.G. Mahendra and Lakshmi. The film which was a remake of Hindi film Haath Ki Safai.

page166.title: Sathya
page166.description: Sathya (Kamal Hassan) is a young man who wants to make a difference and ends up becoming a henchman to a political leader who has his own agenda.The film was a remake of the 1985 Hindi film Arjun.

page167.title: Sattam
page167.description: It is a remake of the 1980 Hindi film Dostana. Two close friends decide to enter law enforcement, one as a police officer, the other as a lawyer, but their friendship starts to unravel when they fall in love with the same woman.

page167.title: Saroja
page167.description: Four friends, on their way to Hyderabad, are forced to take a detour due to an accident. But they end up losing their way and land up in a forest, where they witness a girl getting kidnapped and soon find themselves pursued by the criminals.

page167.title: Salangai Oli
page167.description: A young multi-talented dancer is poverty stricken and a principled person who does not want to compromise on his moral ethics for commercial dancing. A wealthy woman recognizes this talent and provides him with an opportunity.

page167.title: Rhythm
page167.description: Interfering friends and family members get in the way when a photographer and a bank employee meet and begin a relationship.

page167.title: Sigappu Rojakkal
page167.description: Kamal Haasan plays the role of Dileep who is traumatized by women's behavior in his childhood and later a psychopath misogynist who kills women after having sex with them.

page167.title: Roja Kootam
page167.description: Arun secretly loves Mano but sacrifices his love when he learns that she is in love with his best friend.

page168.title: Parthen Rasithen
page168.description: Shankar is a tenant in the house of Banu, who is his good friend and confidante. They spend almost all their time together and she seeks him out as a refuge from her step brother Panneer, whom she dislikes but is forced to live together with.

page168.title: Parattai Engira Azhagu Sundaram
page168.description: The film is a remake of the successful kannada film Jogi The film revolves around a woman who comes to the city from her village in search of her presumably lost son

page168.title: Parthiban Kanavu
page168.description: Parthiban is a marketing executive who loves spending time with his friends. Parthiban’s parents want him to get married but he does not believe in arranged marriage and waits to see a girl as per his likes and dislikes.

page168.title: Oru Kaidhiyin Diary
page168.description: David is an ardent political supporter, however, the leader of his favorite political party is an evil man who rapes David's wife, Rosy; Rosy commits suicide and David is framed by his political idol.

page168.title: New
page168.description: An 8-year-old boy runs away from home and meets a scientist, who transforms him into a young man of 28, although mentally, he remains a child. A fiction laced with sex and comedy!!

page168.title: Neruku Ner
page168.description: A passport official confesses to his wife about cheating on her; she leaves him and files for divorce, then a criminal tries to leave the country and asks him to fake a passport, but he informs the police.

page169.title: Nayagan
page169.description: When a small boy sees his father killed in cold blood by a policeman, he kills the policeman and runs away to Bombay. Eventually, he becomes a Mafia chief.

page169.title: Nammavar
page169.description: A new professor cleans up a crime-ridden college.Kamal Hassan plays a revolutionary history lecturer of a college. The movie is about how he tries to reform the downtrodden college by his initiatives and its consequences.

page169.title: Nandalala
page169.description: Nandalala is the story of a young boy and a demented man who go in search for their respective mothers.It features a highly acclaimed musical score by Ilaiyaraaja.

page169.title: Naan Mahan Alla 1984
page169.description: An honest lawyer is implicated and imprisoned at the behest of a powerful underworld don. After his release from prison, Vishwanath decides to seek vengeance but finds out that it is virtually impossible to do this through due process of law.

page169.title: Naam Iruvar Naamaku Iruvar
page169.description: Naam Iruvar Namakku Iruvar is a 1998 Tamil film directed by Sundar C. Prabhu Deva and Meena played the leading roles, whilst the film featured an extensive cast, along with a bevy of supporting actors

page169.title: Mullum Malarum
page169.description: A laborer gets suspended for dereliction of duty. Enraged, the man gets drunk and incurs an accident that leaves him jobless; he soon gets his chance to get even by rejecting his boss' marriage proposal for his sister.

page170.title: Mounam Pesiyathe
page170.description: Gautham (Suriya) is a restaurant owner. He dislikes the idea of young couples flirting with each other in the name of "love". Unfortunately, Kannan's(Nandha) marriage is arranged with his cousin Sandhya (Trisha Krishnan).

page170.title: Moondram Pirai
page170.description: It tells about a school teacher, who rescues a woman,who is suffering from retrograde amnesia, from a brothel, and protects her in his house located in Ketti. The rest of the film shows how she recovers her memory with this teacher's help.

page170.title: Michael Madana Kama Rajan
page170.description: The film tells a story of quadruplets, Michael, Madhanagopal, Kameshwaran, and Raju, all played by Kamal Haasan. Kamal distinguished each of those characters with his body language and language lingo.

page170.title: Mannan
page170.description: Circumstances force the union leader of a factory to marry his own boss, a rich and arrogant lady who has ulterior motives.

page170.title: Manmadha Leelai
page170.description: The film explores the life journey of a womaniser (Kamal Hassan) and his affairs with various women, including those who are married.

page170.title: Manithan
page170.description: The story revolves around Raja who grows in Juvenile due to hitting his teacher by table weight for calling him as a thief. When his imprisonment years are over, he joins People Welfare Organization in a local community and helps the needy people.

page171.title: Manathai Thirudivittai
page171.description: Deva and Shruti studies in the same college. Deva falls for Shruti and tries to win her with the help of his friend, Steve. One day, Shruti cheats and embarrasses Deva with the name of love which hurts him very deeply.

page171.title: Mahanadi
page171.description: A man tries to get his family back in shape after a stint in jail

page171.title: Magalir Mattum
page171.description: A remake of the American film 9 to 5.Three women working in the same office are constantly harassed by their lecherous boss. The three decide to gang up on him, but a strange accident complicates things.

page171.title: Love Birds
page171.description: A young woman (Naghma) sees visions of her dead lover (Prabhu Deva) everywhere she goes.

page171.title: Kutty
page171.description: A girl trapped between two guys' love. One loves her to make her his better half and the other loving her to stop the former from getting her.

page171.title: Kuruthipunal
page171.description: Two brave police officers infiltrate a terror group in order to bring it down.Produced by Kamal Hassan, the story is a remake of Govind Nihalani's Hindi film Drohkaal.

page172.title: Kodi Parakuthu
page172.description: Kodi Parakuthu is a 1988 Tamil drama film starred Rajinikanth and Amala, directed by P. Bharathiraja.

page172.title: Kanda Naal Muthal
page172.description: The movie begins with two young kids who fight each other in a marriage hall. They meet after two decades, now Krishna and Ramya during a college cultural meet and again lock horns with each other. Fate brings them together in Chennai after a few years.

page172.title: Kalyanaraman
page172.description: Kalyanaraman is a Tamil language film starring Kamal Haasan as the protagonist. The film was a blockbuster and completed a 140-day run at the box office. Six years later, a sequel was made titled Japanil Kalyanaraman.

page172.title: Kai Kodutha Theivam
page172.description: Kai Koduttha Deivam is a Tamil language film starring Sivaji Ganesan, S. S. Rajendran, Savithri and K. R. Vijaya in the lead roles. This film was remade in Telugu as Marapurani Katha.

page172.title: Kadhal Parisu
page172.description: The movie starts with Mohan getting released from prison after serving a sentence on a rape charge. Malini and Chitra are sisters and heirs to a wealthy business. Mohan meets Chitra and soon they fall in love while Malini has sworn off all men.

page172.title: Kadal Meengal
page172.description: A fisherman who is in love with a woman in his village is presumed dead after he fails to return from the sea on one of his trips.A remake of the Malayalam movie Meen.

page173.title: Kaathala Kaathala
page173.description: Two friends, both with the name of Lingam, create a comedy of errors and consequent chaos with their girlfriends and their families.

page173.title: Johnny
page173.description: A parsimonious Barbar must flee from the Police after meeting with a look-alike gangster.This was one of the finest films in Tamil cinema for its making and songs.

page173.title: Ithayathai Thirudathey
page173.description: Prakash, who is diagnosed with terminal cancer and Geetanjali, an equally ill patient fall in love with each other. With just six months left to live, will their love-story have a happy ending?

page173.title: Indhu
page173.description: Indhu is a 1994 Tamil language film directed by Pavithran and produced by N. A. Sudhakar and K. P. Unnikrishnan

page173.title: Hey Ram
page173.description: Saketh Ram's wife is raped and killed during direct action day riots in Calcutta. He is convinced that Mahatma Gandhi is responsible for all the problems happening in the country and sets out to kill him.

page173.title: Guru Sishyan
page173.description: Two friends who indulge in petty crimes meet a man on death row while in prison and decide to prove his innocence.

page174.title: Guna
page174.description: A mentally unstable man believes that he is going to marry an angel once he leaves the mental asylum. When he leaves, a few goons abduct him and ask him to rob a temple where he finds a girl he thinks is his angel and kidnaps her.

page174.title: Dindukkal Sarathy
page174.description: A remake of Vadakkunokkiyantram (1989), a popular Malayalam film by Sreenivasan.The story revolves around an insecure teetotaler Sarathy Raman (Karunas) who feels bad due to his dark skin (his wife Vasanthi (Karthika) is fairer than him).

page174.title: Dheena
page174.description: The film starts with the police arresting Aadhi's men suspecting them for burning an MLA's wine shop. The MLA sends a false evidence to the court against him. But Aadhi sends Dheena who is actually his adopted brother to attack the false evidence.

page174.title: Dharma Durai
page174.description: A man sacrifices everything for his two younger brothers and even spends seven years in prison for a crime he did not commit.

page174.title: Charlie Chaplin
page174.description: It is the first Indian movie to be remade in 6 Indian languages. Ramakrishnan is married to Mythili who is very possessive about her husband. Mythili always suspects her husband fearing that he would end up having an affair.

page174.title: Boys
page174.description: 'Boys' is the story of five boys and a girl from different families They are youthful, vibrant, careless violating all conventions and In the process, they discover their hidden talents.

page175.title: Billa 1980
page175.description: The film revolves around Billa, a feared Mafia don, who is fatally wounded during an encounter with the police. Wanting to uncover Billa's accomplices, Commissioner Alexander trains a lookalike Rajappa to pose as Billa and infiltrate the gang.

page175.title: Bandham
page175.description: Bandham is a 1985 Indian Tamil drama film, directed by K. Vijayan and produced by Anandavalli Balaji. The film stars Sivaji Ganesan, Kajal Kiran, Shalini and Anand Babu in lead roles.

page175.title: Azhagi
page175.description: A successful veterinarian hires his lost love as a housemaid, which does not bode well for his marriage.

page175.title: Ayya
page175.description: A young man, angered by the murder of his father, causes trouble for the man who killed him and took his position.

page175.title: Aval Oru Thodar Kathai
page175.description: Aval Oru Thodharkadai is a 1974 Tamil film directed by K. Balachander. The story revolves around a working middle class woman, who sacrifices her life and desires to support her large family.

page175.title: Athisaya Piravi
page175.description: A con man who is in love with a millionaire's daughter gets killed by the girl's father, after reaching yamalogam he came to know that God had made mistaken by killing him for another one, with the help of yaman he reincarnated as another one to fulfill his love.

page176.title: Arunachalam
page176.description: The movie revolves around Arunachalam (Rajini), who is the son of the VIP of a village who finds out about his past but destiny has its own play.

page176.title: Arinthum Aryamalum
page176.description: There is the innocent boy Satya who comes to Chennai to join an engineering college. And then his problems begin one by one when he encounters the dreaded don Adhi Narayanan, who is actually Satya's father and his hot-blooded son Kutty.

page176.title: Arangetra Velai
page176.description: The story revolves around three unemployed people.his film is a remake of Malayalam film Ramji Rao Speaking.

page176.title: Apoorva Sahodharargal
page176.description: Two brothers separated at birth meet as adults and settle old scores.

page176.title: Apoorva Raagangal
page176.description: Apoorva Raagangal is a 1975 Indian Tamil-language drama film directed by K. Balachander. The film features Kamal Haasan and Srividya in lead roles while Rajinikanth, Jayasudha, Nagesh, and Major Sundarrajan play supporting roles.

page176.title: Anjali
page176.description: The story of a kid with a terminal disease highlighting the atmosphere she grows up in, and the treatment meted out to her by her family.

page177.title: Aalavandhan
page177.description: A psychopath believes his twin brother has married an evil woman and escapes from the hospital to hunt her down.The film was also shot in Hindi (as Abhay) and dubbed in Telugu under that same title.

page177.title: Alaudin
page177.description: A slum boy, who steals from the rich to help the poor, keeps scheming against a powerful man. After he finds a magical lamp, which the man had been seeking, he thwarts the man's attempts to abduct him.

page177.title: Abhiyum Naanum
page177.description: The father of a grown daughter meets the father of a toddler at a playground and recounts the story of his own relationship with his daughter through the years, including his difficulties with accepting her marriage.

page177.title: Aarilirunthu Arubathu Varai
page177.description: A poor man sacrifices his education for his brothers and sisters and when they get rich, they abandon him. Even the girl he loved leaves him for a rich man and he marries a poor girl and lives in the slums with his family.

page177.title: 16 Vayathinile
page177.description: A chronicle of the struggles and vulnerabilities of 16-year old girl in love.The film focuses on the strengths and vulnerabilities of Mayil (Sridevi), a 16-year-old schoolgirl, and the challenges she faces and overcomes.

Tirupathi, Pazhani, and Chidambaram are friends who are physically impaired — one cannot see, the second is hard of hearing and the third is mute. Narmada enters their lives and all three fall in love with her.

page178.title: Yutham Sei
page178.description: A common man's ability to defeat the devil. A cop identifies the mystery and solves the problem. A Tamil neo-noir crime thriller film that was written and directed by Myshkin.

page178.title: Veera
page178.description: The hero falls in love with a girl and learns music for her. The girl's house is destroyed in a cyclone and the hero believes the girl is dead. He goes to the city and marries another woman. One day, his first love comes searching for him.

page178.title: Vaseegara
page178.description: A remake of the successful 2001 Telugu film, Nuvvu Naaku Nachav.A young educated unemployed youth comes to attend the marriage of his Father's close friend's daughter. He ultimately makes her fall in love with him and Marries her at the end.

page178.title: Vaali
page178.description: It tells the story of Deva and Shiva, two look-alike siblings with Deva being deaf and dumb. When Shiva marries his sweetheart Priya, Deva becomes obsessed and has a lust towards Priya.

page178.title: Uyire
page178.description: An enigmatic stranger (Manisha Koirala) with a hidden agenda pursues a young man (Shahrukh Khan) promised to another woman (Preity Zinta). A Tamil Dubbed Version of Dil Se 1998 Hindi war romantic thriller film.

page178.title: Uthama Puthiran
page178.description: Siva (Dhanush) is asked to help a friend in a love marriage. Siva kidnaps Pooja (Genelia D'Souza) on a mistaken identity from the marriage hall. A remake of the 2008 Telugu film Ready!!

page179.title: Unnai Kodu Ennai Tharuven
page179.description: A boy who is abandoned by his mother is raised by an army officer. He turns out to be a model patriot and joins the army, but his loyalties come under the scanner when he meets a girl and falls in love with her.

page179.title: Ullam Ketkumae
page179.description: The movie is all about a group of five college friends — Emaan (Arya), Shaam (Shaam),Priya (Asin),Pooja (Laila) and Irene (Pooja). The friends gather for the wedding of Emaan, years after everyone has parted ways.

page179.title: Thotti Jaya
page179.description: Simbu plays a goon who gets reformed after falling in love and later takes revenge on an underworld don who comes across his love life in the movie. Rowdy Silambarasan, works for a don Pradeep Rawat.

page179.title: Thillalangadi
page179.description: An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.

page179.title: Thamizh
page179.description: Thamizh (Prashanth) leads a happy life with his mother (Manorama) and sister-in-law Kalaichelvi (Urvasi). His brother is working in Kuwait, and Thamizh too dreams of joining him there. Meenakshi (Simran), their tenant, and Thamizh fall in love.

page179.title: Seedan
page179.description: Mahalakshmi is an orphan working in the house of Amrithavalli in Palani. Maha, an ardent devotee of Lord Murugan, shares her dreams and confides in the God, and her only crib is that she never finds enough time from housework to go to his temple.

page180.title: Santosh Subramaniam
page180.description: A young man narrates his past on how his father wants the best things for him but never asks his son's opinion on whether he likes them or not.

page180.title: Saamy
page180.description: Aarusaamy  is the Deputy Commissioner of Police of Tirunelveli who efficiently brings the city under control. Aarusaamy arrives at Tirunelveli after being in exile for some years after being wrongly accused of bribery by corrupt politicians.

page180.title: Poovellam Un Vasam
page180.description: Two families which have been friends for more than 40 years live next to each other, but a misunderstanding between two of their members forces them to cut their ties.

page180.title: Pithamagan
page180.description: A young orphan grows up in a graveyard and is devoid of any human feelings; when he leaves the cemetery and meets people, he experiences emotions for the first time.

page180.title: Paarthale Paravasam
page180.description: A doctor becomes an instant heartthrob after making an appearance in a movie and soon marries a woman. But just after their marriage, the truth about his past is revealed, which leads to complications, taking the couple a step closer to divorce.

page180.title: Ninaithen Vanthai
page180.description: A musician dreams of a beautiful girl and sets out to find her. Soon after, he meets her at a wedding, but by that time his father has already fixed his marriage with someone else.

page181.title: Nil Gavani Sellathey
page181.description: Sam, Jo, Arun, Priya and Milo head to a small village on a pleasure trip. And they reach the place despite a warning that it is not to going to be a nice trip.As night arrives, what arrives along with it is a series of mysterious experiences.

page181.title: Mozhi
page181.description: A musician's love towards a stubborn deaf woman makes her eventually realize that there is more to her life than she previously thought.

page181.title: Mandhira Punnagai
page181.description: Kathir (Karu Palaniappan) is a talented architect known for his creativity. His straight and direct attitude in life fetches him respect and contempt as well. But he lives a carefree life complete with wine and women.

page181.title: Kullanari Koottam
page181.description: Vetri (Vishnu), a jobless MBA graduate, lives on the daily pocket money doled out by his father. On a simple task to recharge the phone account of his father, he bungles up and the money ends up in the account of college student Priya (Ramya).

page181.title: King
page181.description: Raja is the only son of Shanmugam and they both live in Hong Kong. One day while traveling, their car meets with an accident . Then, Shanmugam is infected with multiple sclerosis, a disease for which therapy is only at the primitive stage.

page181.title: Karuthamma
page181.description: Set in rural villages in tamilnadu.The film looks at female infanticide and the hatred that surrounds the birth of a female child

page182.title: Kannedhirey Thondrinal
page182.description: A young man falls in love with his best friend's sister; but decides to sacrifice his love giving more value to his friendship. When the girl's brother learns of his friend's sacrifice, he gives his blessing to the couple..

page182.title: Iruvar
page182.description: An actor (Mohanlal) pushes his friendship with a writer (Prakash Raj) to the breaking point as he tries to become a prominent force in their shared political party.

page182.title: Indira
page182.description: A group of villagers clash with the neighboring village leader as their community begins to prosper. Money and greed threaten the peaceful coexistence of the two warring communities.

page182.title: Ghajini
page182.description: A man, who loses his memory every 15 minutes and is a fugitive, has photographs, notes and tattoos to remind him to kill the man who brutally killed his sweetheart in front of him.

page182.title: Friends
page182.description: A man values his best friend more than anything else in the world. One day he confesses a dark secret from their childhood to his wife, which is overheard by another. Once the secret gets out, the friendship is destroyed.

page182.title: Dum
page182.description: A remake of Jagannadh's 2002 Kannada film Appu. Satya gets into fights and ends up in jail where his own father gets him out on bail.A group of college students beats him up.He gets saved by Suchitra and falls in love with her.

page183.title: Bhagavathi
page183.description: A man elopes with his fiancé to marry her, but her father finds out and has the man killed. But things get complicated when the girl's father gets to know that she is carrying the man's child.

page183.title: Amarkalam
page183.description: A crook is asked by an ex-gang leader to hold the commissioner's daughter captive for two days to ruin the family's honor. The girl while captive falls in love with the crook, but he rejects her.

page183.title: Aaru
page183.description: A thug, with his partners, is chosen to work for a criminal gang and he becomes the left-hand man of the leader. The leader declares a war against another criminal and the thug has to protect him despite losing his friends.

page183.title: Engeyum Kaadhal
page183.description: The story revolves around a girl living in France who falls in love with a boy coming from India.Kamal, a young billionaire, doesn't believe in love. He works hard for 11 months and takes a month's break from all the work related commitments.

page183.title: Dhool
page183.description: A kind-hearted but tough villager goes to the city to meet a minister regarding a chemical factory that is polluting the local river.

page183.title: Ko
page183.description: A Press Photographer helps a team of youths to win the election by mocking corrupt politicians in his newspaper, but later the plot moves quite differently.

page184.title: Ponnar Shankar
page184.description: It tells the story of warrior twins Ponnar and Shankar, who are revered as gods in the Kongu belt of Tamil Nadu.  It is a fictionalized account of the Ponnar Shankar epic, adapted from M. Karunanidhi's novel of the same name.

page184.title: Baasha
page184.description: An auto driver, Manikam, desperately tries to hide his dark underworld side to keep his promise to his father.

page184.title: Thulladha Manamum Thullum
page184.description: A struggling singer feels guilty about a girl losing her eyesight; to meet the cost of her eye transplant surgery, he offers his kidney to a rich man. The girl regains her vision, realizes the sacrifice he has made and reciprocates his love.

page184.title: Thirumalai
page184.description: A chance meeting on New Year's Day leads a young mechanic to a romance, but the father of his new girlfriend is not pleased.The highly commercial success of the film lead to be remade in Telugu as Gowri in the year 2004.

page184.title: Thamizhan
page184.description: Surya, a lawyer with strong values, does not let tragedy stop his quest to help laymen. The film stars Vijay in the lead role with Priyanka Chopra, making her debut as a lead actress.

page184.title: Pirivom Santhippom
page184.description: It is about the life of a young couple in a joint family with the Nagarathar (Nattukottai Chettiar) community located in Karaikudi, Tamil Nadu. This was another grape wine for Sneha as this was completely a heroine-centric film.

page185.title: Aarya
page185.description: Deepika, the sister of a local don, harasses Aarya, a new student, until she falls in love with him. When Aarya rejects her marriage proposal, the siblings bring their wrath down on his head.

page185.title: Priyamana Thozhi
page185.description: Madhavan and Sridevi are inseparable friends since childhood. Madhavan's passion is cricket and his ambition is to play for the Indian team. The friendship between Madhavan and Sridevi is entirely platonic and neither has any intentions of falling in love with each other.

page185.title: Mappillai
page185.description: Gayathri, the daughter of a ruthless construction magnate Rajeswari, falls in love with Saravanan. Rajeswari agrees to their marriage, thinking that he is the perfect husband for her daughter as he is soft-spoken and will cater to their every whim and fancy.

page185.title: Singam Puli
page185.description: Shiva and Ashok, brothers with opposite personalities, begin a deadly feud when Ashok commits a murder. An action-masala entertainer!!

page185.title: Vaanam
page185.description: The story revolves around the lives of five individuals from different walks of life, representing the five natural elements— aether, air, water, fire and earth and illustrates how their fates intertwine on New Year's Eve at a hospital in Chennai.

page185.title: Thaamirabharani
page185.description: The story is set in the backdrop of Thoothukudi. Saravana Perumal is a rich businessman and Subbiah and his daughter Sakunthaladevi are his business rivals. Bhanumathi (Bhanu) is a college student who falls for Bharani and keeps following him.

page186.title: Sathyam
page186.description: Sathyam begins with Sathyam, an assistant police commissioner rescuing a hooligan from encounter thirsty cops, only to arrest him later. Sathyam meets his first challenge in tracking a mysterious killer of three ministers.

page186.title: Run
page186.description: Siva is based out of Srirangam and he comes to Chennai to join a college. He stays with his sister and her husband. Siva does not like his brother-in-law and never talks to him despite several attempts made by her sister to convince both.

page186.title: Pachaikili Muthucharam
page186.description: After starting an affair with a married woman, a married man's life starts changing for the worse in more ways than he could imagine.

page186.title: Malaikottai
page186.description: A young man is granted conditional bail, which requires him to go to the Trichy police station. On his way there, he falls for a beautiful girl. When the girl lands up in trouble, he finds himself facing the wrath of powerful politicians.

page186.title: Kuselan
page186.description: A poor barber lives a peaceful and content life with his caring wife and beautiful kids, but he faces a dilemma when his childhood friend returns to his village as a popular movie star.A remake of the Malayalam film Kadha Parayumbol (2007).

page186.title: Kadhalil Vizhunthen
page186.description: The story focuses on the life of Sabhapathy. He is the football-crazy son of an alcoholic and lives in the slums. He meets Meera after an accident and later develops a liking for her. Sabha returns from his football match to only find out that Meera has died.

page187.title: Kadhal Sadugudu
page187.description: Chithambaram, an important man in the village is an adamant character who always sticks on to his decisions. When the temple festival starts, Kausalya (Priyanka Trivedi) goes to her grandfather's house to celebrate. There she meets Suresh (Vikram), and they fall in love.

page187.title: Gokulathil Seethai
page187.description: Rishi sleeps around through the efforts of a sophisticated, dedicated and ‘immigration officer’ look alike pimp . His Dad, whom Rishi considers to be his ‘friend’ , voices his concern in a friendly way about Rishi’s lifestyle.

page187.title: Gandhipuram
page187.description: Tamil Dubbed Version of 2010 Telugu Movie Rama Rama Krishna Krishna.Mafia leader Ashok Deva is in an unending war with his opponent Pawar. One day, Gauthami is killed by Pawar and she takes the last word from her husband to leave this violence.

page187.title: Anjathe
page187.description: Two friends become enemies when one, who wants to be a policeman, can't make it but the other gets that job by political influence.

page187.title: Ethiree
page187.description: A landlord is tired of his tenants, who constantly harass him and his daughter, and decides to hire a local goon to take care of matters for him.

page187.title: Aanandham
page187.description: A family with 4 sons and their parents who lead life with small departmental store. The story goes with their bachelor life and the married .love of one of the brothers and the misunderstandings with their wives.

page188.title: Bose
page188.description: Former army commando Bose gets fired after he stops a rapist's attack on a student. The young woman and Bose fall in love, but then his family is kidnapped, and he discovers that the rapist has connections to terrorists.

page188.title: Thalaimagan
page188.description: An honest journalist battles corruption in the local police force and government. This film marked Sarath Kumar's directorial debut and for whom the film was also his 100th starrer.

page188.title: Sakkarakatti
page188.description: Chennai-bred Yuvraj (Shanthnoo Bhagyaraj) has had four close friends from childhood. He meets and falls in love with Deepali (Ishita Sharma). However, his cousin, Reema (Vedhika), is in love with him.

page188.title: Sadhu Miranda
page188.description: A job seeker (Prasanna) meets a woman (Kavya Madhavan) who moonlights as a TV producer.Loosely based on 1995 Malayalam film Mannar Mathai Speaking.

page188.title: Rendu
page188.description: Shakti (Madhavan) is a young man from a village, with no job but much ambition and dreams. As he sees his life pass him by, stuck in a rut in his hometown, he decides that he will try his fortunes elsewhere.

page188.title: Pammal K. Sambandam
page188.description: A movie stuntman is against the principle of marriage until he meets a doctor, who he dislikes at first, but later falls for.The film was remade in Hindi as Kambakkht Ishq.

page189.title: Kasthooriman
page189.description: Kasthuri Maan's story revolves around a young college girl who helps her lover realize his dream of becoming an IAS officer amidst her own problems. A remake of the director's own Malayalam film of the same name.

page189.title: Karuppusamy Kuththagaithaarar
page189.description: A contractor and a medical student fall in love, and overcome many obstacles to be together.

page189.title: Idhaya Thirudan
page189.description: A young woman posts her pictures online and emails them to a fictitious address; to her surprise, a person actually exists at the address. They meet and eventually fall in love, but a police officer poses trouble because he is interested in the girl.

page189.title: Dhill
page189.description: After attaining his dream of becoming a police officer, Kanagavel's girlfriend is assaulted by a corrupt cop, leading him to seek revenge.

page189.title: Jay Jay
page189.description: Jamuna, a believer in destiny, writes down her address and telephone number on a Rs.100 note and makes the payment at the cafe declaring that if the note comes back to Jagan then it means that he was destined to meet her.

page189.title: Imsai Arasan 23m Pulikesi
page189.description: Set in the late 18th century during the early stages of the British Raj, the film tells the story of twin brothers separated at birth. Pulikecei XXIII, the foolish elder brother, becomes a puppet of his uncle, the Chief Minister.

page190.title: Durai
page190.description: Raja (Arjun), who can't remember his past, recollects vague images and memories only in his sleep until he meets and falls in love with Anjali (Kirat Bhattal).

page190.title: Deepavali
page190.description: The son of a respected and loved leader falls in love with a girl who comes to live in their locality.Deepavali has been remade into Oriya in 2010 as Dil Tate Deichi and in Bengali in 2013 as Deewana.

page190.title: Sillunu Oru Kaadhal
page190.description: Gowtham and Kundhavi marry, then she finds a diary from his time at college, five years earlier. She thinks he would rather be married to Aishwarya, his college sweetheart, so she makes arrangements for them to meet again.

page190.title: April Mathathil
page190.description: A story of friendship among 8 girls and boys. Kathir is an intelligent guy who grew up in a poor family. In college, Kathir meets a girl named Shwetha and over the time they become friends.

page190.title: Viyabari
page190.description: A businessman who wants to be rich loses out on family and social life. He marries a girl who loves him only because she would prove profitable to his business. He realizes what he lost after the death of his mother

page190.title: Varushamellam Vasantham
page190.description: An unemployed young man sacrifices his love for a girl who is engaged to marry his brother, but ends up earning the affection of his grandfather.

page191.title: Thiruttu Payale
page191.description: Jeevan is sent to the city by his parents unable to put up with his arrogance. In Chennai, he comes across Malavika, wife of a rich young entrepreneur (Manoj K Jayan). She has a clandestine affair with Abbas, his husband's friend.

page191.title: Thalai Nagaram
page191.description: This story is a tale of a man who sacrifices his life to kick out gangsters ruining others lives. It also stars Vadivelu, Prakash Raj and Bose Venkat among others.

page191.title: Sandakozhi
page191.description: A college student who goes on vacation to his friend's home gets involved with the local goon who terrorizes the town.

page191.title: Pudhiya Geethai
page191.description: A man grows up to become an ideal citizen; soon, he falls in love with a beautiful woman. But an astrologer's prediction about him having a small life span could change things for him.

page191.title: Nenjirukkum Varai
page191.description: Ganesan(Narain) is an auto driver and Bhuvana(Deepa), the daughter of a rich businessman, falls for him. Her father(Mahadevan) disowns her but Naren's loving family accepts her as their own and they become one large happy family

page191.title: Mumbai Express
page191.description: A bike rider and three small-time crooks kidnap a rich man's son for a huge ransom, only to discover that they have the wrong boy- the illegitimate son of a police officer.

page192.title: Jore
page192.description: Sabapathy is a widower, he owns a cinema theatre and school. He treats his son Sakthi like his friend. At college, Sakthi falls in love with Shalini , the daughter of a corrupt politician Lingam.

page192.title: Dumm Dumm Dumm
page192.description: A fun-loving city boy and a cheerful village girl are forced into getting engaged by their parents, but the two of them join together to stop the wedding from happening.

page192.title: Emtan Magan
page192.description: A man, who is popular for his strictness in his village, treats his son badly. The son wants to marry his childhood friend but his parents and the girl's parents are at loggerheads, making it tough for him to marry her.

page192.title: Dishyum
page192.description: The movie is all about an affair between a stuntman and a student who pursues courses on arts and sculpture. A case of persons of two different thoughts and two extremes coming together.

page192.title: Chellamae
page192.description: A woman's platonic affection for a neglected rich kid she has known since childhood is misunderstood.

page192.title: Baba
page192.description: An atheist finds himself endowed with magical powers and sets out to take on crooked politicians.The film's story is about a carefree young atheist, Baba, who is a reincarnation of a great saint from the Himalayas.

page193.title: Samudhiram
page193.description: A rich man's son is insulted by a young woman's brother. In order to exact revenge, the man gets his son married to the woman.

page193.title: Thiruvilaiyaadal Aarambam
page193.description: Thirukumaran (Dhanush) is a carefree, laid-back guy who has a great time with his friends. He falls in love with Priya, who is the sister of Guru, a rich business tycoon. The story is about a cat-and-mouse game between Thiru and Guru.

page193.title: Thiruvannamalai
