page193.description: Easwaran is an honest youth, who runs a local cable channel. He is known to fight for the cause of the society and the common man. He enters into fisticuffs with local MLA. Fearing trouble, his mom takes him to a saint in Thiruvannamalai.

page193.title: Thambikottai
page193.description: Thambikkottai is a film about the happenings around an old bridge at Thambikkotai. It is touted to be based on real life incidents in and around Thambikkottai, Thanjavur District.

page193.title: Shajahan
page193.description: The film is about a man Ashok (Vijay) who helps lovers. He understands the psychology of women and knows how to catch their heart. Whenever a man wants a girl to fall in love with him, Ashok makes it occur.

page193.title: Once More
page193.description: A rich young businessman neglects his company and kills his time flirting with women. When his company suffers a major loss and his dad dies in a plane crash, he must go to extreme lengths to protect his business.

page194.title: Nandha
page194.description: Nandha kills his father in the confusion that follows when his mother discovers her husband's philandering. Nandha is packed off to juvenile prison, leaving behind his deaf and dumb mother

page194.title: Marudhamalai
page194.description: Marudhamalai, a police constable, goes to work in a village passing his police exams and getting a merit. Here, he meets Ekambaram, who is his senior officer. Marudhamalai loses a convict on the way to the court due to Ekambaram's soft heart.

page194.title: Kalloori
page194.description: The story is based on the college campus featuring Tamannaah and debutant, Akhil.

page194.title: Priyamanavale
page194.description: A man decides to get married after a lot of persuasion from his father but on a condition. He wants to marry a girl on a year agreement and see if he likes it, if yes then he will continue the marriage and if not then he will annul the marriage.

page194.title: Vasool Raja MBBS
page194.description: A small-time don leads his family to believe he is a doctor, but when his secret comes out, he vows to become a real doctor. A remake of Hindi film Munnabhai MBBS

page194.title: Thirupaachi
page194.description: An affectionate brother gets his sister married off to a man in the city as he feels that villages do not have the facilities to support a decent lifestyle, but little does he realize that the city poses greater risks.

page195.title: Padikathavan
page195.description: Rocky is a 10th-grade dropout youngster who is looked down upon by his father, because of his sharp contrast to the rest of the family, who are well qualified in education. Rocky's friends advise him to love and marry a well-educated girl.

page195.title: Manmadan Ambu
page195.description: Madhan is deeply in love with actress Ambujakshi but he always suspects her, which eventually ends in quarrels. When Ambujakshi goes abroad to enjoy her vacation, Madhan gets irritated and approaches private detective Mannar to spy on her.

page195.title: Madurey
page195.description: A vegetable vendor takes care of an elderly woman and her two young daughters, but he has a dark past that wants to catch up with him.

page195.title: Kuthu
page195.description: The movie is about Guru (Silambarasan), who falls in love with Anjali (Divya Spandana), and incurs the wrath of her father (Kalabhavan Mani). Whether Guru succeeds in marrying Anjali, with the help of his college mates, forms the rest of the story.

page195.title: Payanam
page195.description: The movie deals with the stance of the government officials on such a serious issue and how a belated decision will make a situation worse, in an already edgy circumstance.

page195.title: Siruthai
page195.description: The story is set in Kurnool village area in Andhra Pradesh. Ratnavel Pandian is a tough policeman who cleans up the village, which is virtually ruled by the powerful goons under Bavuji and his son.

page196.title: Kadhal Azhivathillai
page196.description: A young man and a woman fall in love with each other. But soon her father gets to know about their affair and goes to extremes to separate the couple.

page196.title: Anbe Sivam
page196.description: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

page196.title: Kushi
page196.description: The story of how two people fall in love but their ego prevents them from confessing this to each other.

page196.title: Kanthaswamy
page196.description: A CBI officer moonlights as a modern day Robin Hood in the guise of the masked Kanthaswamy, as he helps fight corruption and aid impoverished people.

page196.title: Citizen
page196.description: Citizen is a 2001 Tamil film directed by Saravana Subbiah.Three government officials are abducted in broad daylight by a vigilante who refers to himself as "Citizen."

page196.title: Aadukalam
page196.description: In a village in South India, rearing roosters, maintaining them and using them for fights are a way of life and a matter of honor and lifeline to many people.

page197.title: Youth
page197.description: After a man's bride-to-be runs away on the night of his marriage, he decides to move on and soon falls in love with another woman. But she is already engaged to another man, who, it turns out, was the lover of his fiancée.

page197.title: Unnai Ninaithu
page197.description: Surya works as a receptionist in a lodge in Chennai. He along with his friend Krishnamoorthy manages the entire lodge. Actually, the lodge is owned by Surya’s father but has been leased due to financial troubles.

page197.title: Something Something Unakkum Enakkum
page197.description: A young man leaves his luxurious life to prove his lover's brother that he is not a spoilt rich brat. Once agreed to he works hard, lives like a farmer till the next harvest and wins everyone's heart.

page197.title: Sivakasi
page197.description: A man discovers his brother's sinister behavior when he returns to his hometown; he tries to help his mother and sister regain their old lives.

page197.title: Sivaji
page197.description: Sivaji returns from the U.S. to invest his money for good causes, but seeing his rising popularity, the politicians cheat him out of his property. Sivaji takes this as a challenge.

page197.title: M. Kumaran S/O Mahalakshmi
page197.description: A story about a kickboxer who went to Malasia to his father after his mother's dead.It is a remake of super hit Telugu film Amma Nanna O Tamila Ammayi.

page198.title: Roja
page198.description: A woman from a village in Tamil Nadu marries a sophisticated city dweller and moves with him to Kashmir, where all is rosy - until he gets kidnapped by militants.

page198.title: Raja
page198.description: Ajith is paranoid about getting married. Jyothika arrives at his place and begins to compel him to get married to her. The reason: Ajith was pouring his love out to someone else thinking that she was Jyothika.

page198.title: Kireedam
page198.description: A reworked version of Sibi Malayil's 1989 Malayalam classic film, Kireedam.Shakthi, a Police Constable's son, is aspiring to be a cop himself. He crosses paths with a local.

page198.title: Kadhalukku Mariyadhai
page198.description: A man meets a girl by chance and it turns out to be love at first sight, but there is a problem - she has three over-protective brothers.

page198.title: Kaakha Kaakha
page198.description: After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.

page198.title: Jeans
page198.description: When Nasser declares that he would marry his sons to twin girls only, Lakshmi fibs that Aishwarya too is one of a pair of twins. Aishwarya begins to pose as Vaishnavi, the second twin. How the love pair come out of this tangle is the rest of the story.

page199.title: Enakku 20 Unakku 18
page199.description: Sridhar is a final year degree student and gets selected in the campus selections for studies abroad. He goes to Mumbai for an interview and on his return finds Preeti and loses his heart to her.

page199.title: Bombay
page199.description: A Hindu man and a Muslim woman fall in love in a small village and move to Mumbai, where they have two children. However, growing religious tensions and erupting riots threaten to tear the family apart.

page199.title: Billa
page199.description: The underworld don David Billa (Ajith Kumar), featured on Interpol's criminal list, is hiding and operating out of Malaysia. DSP Jayaprakash (Prabhu) has spent the last few years looking for Billa, leaving behind a life in India.

page199.title: Aathi
page199.description: A remake of the Telugu film Athanokkade It is about Aathi (Vijay), who was brought up in New Delhi (by foster parents Seetha and Manivannan). He comes to Chennai apparently to study. But he is thirsting for revenge on those who had bumped off his parents and close relatives of uncles and aunts who were all living together in a joint family.

page199.title: Virumaandi
page199.description: A temperamental farmer gets embroiled in a bloody clan feud in a southern Tamil Nadu village.The film's narrative is based on the Akira Kurosawa's Rashomon effect. The film revolves around the controversy of the death penalty.

page199.title: Indru
page199.description: Indru (English: Today) is a 2003 Tamil film directed by Naveen S. Muthuraman.

page200.title: Dreams
page200.description: Dreams is a 2004 Tamil language romance film directed by Kasthuri Raja and produced by Saraswathi Srikanth.

page200.title: Nepali
page200.description: A Nepali who works in a supermarket kills a few people and suddenly leaves a clue along with the dead bodies. Gautham, the Deputy Commissioner of Police tries to analyze the clues left behind by the murderer to find some solution to the case.

page200.title: Gemini
page200.description: Teja is a high-profile gangster in North Madras, who often imitates the behavior characteristic of different animals for sarcastic effect. Accompanied by his gang, he arrives at a magistrate's court for a hearing.

page200.title: Mugavari
page200.description: An aspiring music director, trying to realize his dream for over eight years, sacrifices his love for his ambition, but faces a tricky situation when his brother's health deteriorates and his family is at risk financially.

page200.title: Kalabha Kadhalan
page200.description: A young woman falls in love with her brother-in-law, but he keeps rejecting her advances as he loves his wife.

page200.title: Daas
page200.description: The film begins in a small village in Tirunelveli district where a few upper caste men hold a chariot festival. Antony along with his friends pull the chariot into their slum and they naturally incur the wrath of a local leader Annachi.

page201.title: Azhagai Irukkirai Bayamai Irukkirathu
page201.description: Mano loves Jo  and he becomes her friend, hoping to help her win her love for Prem, whom Jo secretly loves. Then they both try to break Prem’s love with Nandini and succeed. Manu realizes Jo’s deep love for Prem and tries to unite them.

page201.title: Avvai Shanmughi
page201.description: A father disguises himself as a female governess to be closer to his daughter. An Indian remake of the American comedy film, Mrs. Doubtfire.

page201.title: Pokkiri
page201.description: Tamizh (Vijay) is ruthless, fearless hit man in Chennai underworld. He swiftly blends into the mafia to the dislike of other members in the gang. He comes across an Aerobic teacher, Shruthi (Asin) and goes head over heels for her.

page201.title: Pazhani
page201.description: Pazhanivel (Bharath), is behind bars. The happenings from his release and his re-entry to the jail make the whole film. Pazhanivel, who comes out of prison, puts his sister Karpagambal’s (Kushboo) life on track through his heroics, and goes back to the prison as a martyr.

page201.title: Pori
page201.description: Hari (Jiiva) is an unemployed youth who runs a pavement book shop in Tripiclane area. His father (Nagesh), an upright retired school teacher, buys him a shop in a building with his PF money. He names it "Periyar Bookshop" and runs it with his friend Karunas.

page201.title: Priyasakhi
page201.description: The film is a contemporary Indian take on life and pregnancy topics, and was also made in Hindi as Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar with Salman Khan and Shilpa Shetty in the lead.

page202.title: Raam
page202.description: The story revolves around the relationship between a mother and her son. The movie commences with Rama Krishna and his mother Saradha lying in a pool of blood; The police find Raam is still alive and arrest him on charges of murdering his mother.

page202.title: Yejaman
page202.description: A chieftain is loved by one and all in the village; his arch rival poisons his wife making her incapable of conceiving a child. On her death bed, his wife promises him to marry another woman who worships him.

page202.title: Varalaru
page202.description: A wealthy young man woos a pretty college student, but his twin does everything he can to ruin his life. The film stars Ajith Kumar in a triple role as a father and his two sons.

page202.title: Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
page202.description: A Police Officer investigates a series of brutal rapes and murders, with the culprits seeming to cover more than one country.

page202.title: Panchathantiram
page202.description: A woman (Simran) leaves her flirtatious husband, but he tries to track her down for reconciliation. A comedy film directed by K. S. Ravikumar, written by Kamal Haasan and Crazy Mohan.

page202.title: Ghilli
page202.description: Velu alias Ghilli is a state-level kabaddi player who is the son of Chennai's Assistant Commissioner of Police Sivasubramanian. Sivasubramanian is not fond of his son, constantly chiding him for his lack of interest in studies and his love for kabaddi.

page203.title: Minnale
page203.description: A young woman is torn between an obsessed lover and a mild-mannered suitor.This movie was Harris Jayaraj's debut as music director and also he won his first Filmfare Best Music Director award in Tamil.

page203.title: Kandukondain Kandukondain
page203.description: An Indian adaptation of Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility" focusing on two sisters of opposing temperaments.

page203.title: Arul
page203.description: Arul (Vikram), who works in a mill, is the third son of four brothers in a family of goldsmiths. Once, Arul's brother steals a chain due to financial circumstances.The story tells how a man is rejected by his family but then finds his way back.

page203.title: Alaipayuthey
page203.description: A computer expert (Madhavan) and a crusading doctor (Shalini) marry in secret, then deal with death and trauma.The film's story is mostly recollected in flashbacks against the backdrop of Chennai and its suburban trains.

page203.title: Veyil
page203.description: A teenager gets caught watching a movie during school hours and is beaten up by his father. Angered by this, he runs away from home and returns after 20 years.

page203.title: Thenali
page203.description: A man is beset by a variety of phobias. Frustrated, his doctor asks him to consult another psychiatrist, who he soon ends up driving crazy.

page204.title: Subramaniapuram
page204.description: Two friends kill for profit, then one betrays the other by leaving him at the mercy of rivals. Years later when released from prison, the traitor is stabbed and slowly killed in the hospital by his former ally.

page204.title: Mudhalvan
page204.description: A reporter accepts a challenge to be the chief minister of Tamil Nadu for a day. He suspends corrupt officials, arrest several politicians, including the chief minister himself; these actions put his loved ones' lives in danger.

page204.title: Manmadhan
page204.description: A young man seduces girls, kidnaps them, and murders them. A girl studying in his college befriends him and starts developing feelings for him.

page204.title: Kovil
page204.description: Unending caste discrimination surrounds Puliangulam and Vepangulam villages to such an extent that small incidents lead to shedding of blood to very large extents. Under such circumstances, love buds between people of different caste.

page204.title: Kannathil Muthamittal
page204.description: A little girl is told by her parents that she is adopted. Determined to find her birth mother, she begs to be taken to a country, where her mother works with a militant group of activists.

page204.title: Jodi
page204.description: Jodi is a 1999 Tamil romantic musical film directed by Praveen Gandhi and produced by Murali Manohar. The film features Prashanth and Simran in the lead roles, with Vijayakumar, Nassar and Srividya playing other pivotal roles.

page205.title: Indian
page205.description: Senapathy, a veteran freedom fighter, is angry. He is angry about the rampant corruption at every level of the bureaucracy. He will clean it up at any cost.

page205.title: Gentleman
page205.description: Due to a past tragedy , a small business owner by day becomes modern day Robin Hood by night takes from the rich to provide education for the poor.

page205.title: Azhagiya Tamil Magan
page205.description: The film revolves around an excelling athlete who has the ability to predict future events. With his unique ability, he identifies several future events, including the attempted murder of his lover by a look-alike.

page205.title: Aayutha Ezhuthu
page205.description: A goon, who dreams of making it big in life, a student leader, who strives to keep politicians away from college election and a third guy who wants to settle abroad. Their lives change after an incident on a bridge.

page205.title: Autograph
page205.description: Follow Senthil's life through vignettes of his past presented by the people he visits while distributing his marriage invitations. His love life is the aspect in prime focus -- while we are presented with nuggets of other development also.

page205.title: Guru
page205.description: A villager, Gurukant Desai, arrives in Bombay 1958, and rises from its streets to become the GURU, the biggest tycoon in Indian history.

page206.title: Naadodigal
page206.description: Three friends decide to do whatever it takes to unite one of their old friends with the girl he is in love with which gradually takes a turn for the worst, but strengthening their bond with each other nonetheless.

page206.title: Paruthiveeran
page206.description: A village tough finally succumbs to the unconditional love of his angelic cousin, but his romance faces insurmountable challenges, including family opposition and his own delinquent personality.

page206.title: Perazhagan
page206.description: A remake of the 2002 Malayalam film Kunjikoonan.The story revolves around Chinna (Surya Sivakumar), a village youth who receives sympathy because he is a hunchback and is lauded for selfless service to others. He covers up his handicap with humor.

page206.title: Naan Avanillai
page206.description: A man is arrested and appears in court for conning and betraying four women, posing as four different men.

page206.title: Dasavathaaram
page206.description: The plot of the film revolves around bringing together the lives of several individuals beginning with the 12th century and ending with the 21st century; the main person being a research scientist who develops a bio-weapon.

page206.title: Chandramukhi
page206.description: Rajnikant a top psychiatrist from America is on an SOS mission to help rescue his best friend Prabhu's wife Jyothika, who suffers from a split personality syndrome.A remake of the Malayalam film Manichitrathazhu (1993).

page207.title: Bheema
page207.description: The movie revolves around two powerful gangs in Chennai, one led by Chinna (Prakash Raj) and the other by Periyavar (Raghuvaran). Enmity prevails between both gangs, with frequent clashes happening, as they try to overpower each other.

page207.title: Ayan
page207.description: Deva is an intelligent youngster whose hobby happens to be smuggling; eventually, though, he works with Customs to get a drug lord arrested.

page207.title: Adhu Oru Kana Kaalam
page207.description: A boy in love with his servant's daughter gets arrested and later he gets in a fight with an inmate. Loosely based on the same movie director  Balu Mahendra's 1982 Telugu film Nireekshana as well Yathra (1985).

page207.title: Anbe Aaruyire
page207.description: Siva (S. J. Surya) is an investigative scribe who shares a live-in relationship with rich and bratty Madhu (Nila). They have hot-headed run-ins and even hotter patch-ups.

page207.title: Unnaipol Oruvan
page207.description: A common man tries to fight terrorism by making anonymous calls to cops. Will he succeed? A remake of the Hindi film A Wednesday!

page207.title: Thirumagan
page207.description: Thirumagan is a 2007 Tamil film directed by Ratnakumar. The film is a village story based on the relationships between a father and son.

page208.title: Mynaa
page208.description: A young woman explores deep-hearted feelings and human tendencies in Munnar. A romantic  saga!!

page208.title: Kuruvi
page208.description: Velu is a car racer who lives with his large family. His father had gone to work at a colliery and never returned, prompting Velu and his family to think that he is dead. Velu comes to know that a Malaysia-based don owes his father a huge sum of money.

page208.title: Jaggubhai
page208.description: A cop goes to Australia to arrest a wanted gangster but fails, and 21 years later, he finds out that he has a daughter from an affair there. When he goes to bring her back, he realizes that his lover was killed by the same gangster.

page208.title: Guru En Aalu
page208.description: A man, who wants his boss to help him set up his company, realizes that his boss has eyes on the girl he loves. To achieve his ambition, he decides to make a sacrifice and get his boss and his girlfriend together.

page208.title: Enthiran
page208.description: The scientist Dr. Vaseegaran creates a robot with artificial intelligence and names it as Chitti. The robot eventually falls in love with Sharmili. The robot starts writing romantic poems and behaves like a human being.

page208.title: Aadhavan
page208.description: Aadhavan is a professional assassin working with his father Ibrahim Rowther and brother Tharani. Doctor Abdul Kulkarni hires Aadhavan to kill prominent Judge Subramaniam.Aadhavan promises to kill Subramaniam within ten days.

page209.title: Aasal
page209.description: It revolves around the feud between the 3 brothers over property; 2 brothers, from their father's Ist wife on one side with their avarice for all the wealth with the righteous 3rd, from his father's second marriage, trying to stop the family from breaking down.

page209.title: Anniyan
page209.description: A man suffers from multiple personality disorder, he shifts from being a lawyer, to a suave supermodel and finally a vigilante who wreaks havoc on people who cheat, loots or con the first one.

page209.title: VIP
page209.description: After a series of mishaps, two friends fall in love with women while saving a company from financial ruin.

page209.title: Vallavan
page209.description: A happy-go-lucky college student disguises himself to have a relationship with a teacher at his school.The film is loosely based on Hollywood films The Notebook (2004) and Swimfan (2002).

page209.title: Yaaradi Nee Mohini
page209.description: A remake of the 2007 Telugu hit Aadavari Matalaku Arthale Verule.Yaaradi Nee Mohini is a Tamil comedy - romance movie, directed by Mithran R Jawahar.

page209.title: Singam
page209.description: Surya plays a cop in Singam, a film that revolves around smuggling activities in Rameshwaram and is on a mission to apprehend a local M.L.A. This is Surya`s 25th movie, and his second with Vivek.

page210.title: Raavanan
page210.description: A bandit leader kidnaps the wife of the policeman who killed his sister but later falls in love with her.The film follows the crux of the epic Ramayana, with a ruthless police officer on the chase to find a tribal leader and lawbreaker, who has kidnapped his wife.

page210.title: Thiruda Thirudi
page210.description: Vasu belongs to a lower-middle-class family and is irresponsible and untrustworthy. Viji is from a Telugu traditional family and is an ambitious and career-oriented girl.Vasu and Viji meet up and one day, Vasu follows her on her two wheeler.

page210.title: TN 07 AL 4777
page210.description: A remake of the 2006 Hindi Language film Taxi Number 9211.The film's story revolves around a taxi driver and the son of a rich businessman, in which the two come in contact.

page210.title: Sarvvam
page210.description: After a man loses the love of his life in an accident, he sets out to find the boy her heart was donated to. But soon it is revealed that the boy himself need to be protected by a man, who want to kill him.

page210.title: Paiyaa
page210.description: The journey of two strangers-a jobless carefree man,and a woman with whom he has fallen in love. Upon the woman's request, he drives her to Mumbai, while a group of gangsters follow them, planning to kidnap the woman.

page210.title: Kavalan
page210.description: A remake of the Malayalam film Bodyguard.The film is about Arjun who is fascinated by power wants to be the bodyguard of powerful people. He plans and becomes the trusted bodyguard of a leading businessman and his daughter.

page211.title: Janaa
page211.description: Janardhanan lives in a village in Tamil Nadu, leading life incognito, taking up the cause of the villagers, making enemies around. And then comes the twist in the tale, the caption in the interval reading...'Interval...Wait just see other face'.

page211.title: Boss Engira Bhaskaran
page211.description: Bhaskaran falls in love with a younger professor, Chandrika but she disapproves of him.Meanwhile, his brother, Saravanan marries Nandhini who is Chandrika's elder sister.  A romantic comedy entertainer!!

page211.title: Silambattam
page211.description: This is the story of Vichu, who is brought up by his maternal grandfather. Vichu has been taught a particular way of living which has resulted in his decreased emotional quotient. However,  there is a mystery behind Vichu's character.

page211.title: Naan Mahaan Alla
page211.description: A playful young man leads a very happy life, but everything changes when his father witnesses a heinous crime. Based on a real incident!!

page211.title: Vaaranam Aayiram
page211.description: A son deals with the death of his father and examines how their relationship influences him through growing up, romance, tragedy and adventure.

page211.title: Seval
page211.description: Seval is a 2008 Tamil period romantic action film written and directed by Hari. It stars Bharath, Vadivelu, Simran Bagga and Poonam Bajwa in the lead roles.

page212.title: Aegan
page212.description: Aegan's story is based on Shiva, a CBI officer, and his efforts to foil the terrorist John Chinnappa. Major Shiva is simultaneously attempting to mend relations with his father's estranged first wife and his half-brother Narain. Complications ensue.

page212.title: Unnale Unnale
page212.description: The film revolves around the aftermath of a relationship between a careless man and a serious woman. Despite being in a relationship, the latter walks out on the former due to his antics with other women.

page212.title: Sachein
page212.description: On his way abroad, a man reflects on his college life and failed romance. It is based on the  Telugu film Neetho (2002) directed by the same one who did this movie.

page212.title: Red
page212.description: An orphan named Red has a heart of gold, but he resorts to violence against bad men in order to protect the people of his town.

page212.title: Puthu Kotaiyilirinthu Sarvanan
page212.description: Saravanan and Shalini flee Singapore together and grow close as they make their way back to India.

page212.title: Padayappa
page212.description: The death of Padaiyappa's father destroys his family. But his luck changes, and he is able to lead a prosperous life, until his nemesis plots to ruin his happiness once more.

page213.title: Muthu
page213.description: The movie is about a loyal servant, Muthu (Rajni), working for Zamindar Malayasimman (Sarath Babu) and the cunning plans by the uncle of Malasimman to capture the whole wealth which uncovers some mystery about Muthu.

page213.title: Majaa
page213.description: The story is about Govindan (Manivannan) and his two foster sons Aadi (Pasupathy) and Mathi (Vikram). All three are petty thieves who decide to reform and settle down in a new place.

page213.title: Kadhalar Dhinam
page213.description: A young man from the slums falls in love with the college dean's daughter; she is engaged to be married to another man. The young man does not wish to disrespect the father who has helped him a lot.

page213.title: Kadhal Desam
page213.description: Two students from "rival" colleges become friends and fall for same woman.Whether that woman will fall in love with one of them and their friendship will be affected.?

page213.title: Kadhalan
page213.description: Prabhu, a popular collegian, meets the governor's daughter and falls in love. After the police tell him to stay away from her, he discovers the hideout of terrorists and tries to make it out alive to turn them in.

page213.title: Kadhal
page213.description: Aishwarya marries Murugan and her family beats him severely. To save his life, she marries another man and cares for Murugan when the beating causes brain damage.

page214.title: Devathayai Kanden
page214.description: Babu is a struggling youngster who makes a living out of selling milk tea, carrying the business on his bicycle. He falls in love with a college girl named Uma. Gradually, Uma also reciprocates Babu's feelings and things go smoothly for a while.

page214.title: Annamalai
page214.description: The film revolves around a poor milkman who befriends the son of the businessman. The latter's father who hates their friendship drives a wedge between them. Annamalai challenges his friend that he will become a successful businessman.

page214.title: Aasai
page214.description: Aasai is a 1995 Tamil thriller film written and directed by Vasanth and produced by Mani Ratnam The film featured Ajith Kumar and debutant Suvalakshmi in the lead, and Prakash Raj in a pivotal role.

page214.title: Aalwar
page214.description: A wealthy man learns of the horrible conditions in a hospital and goes under cover to try to improve conditions.

page214.title: 12B
page214.description: An examination of the possible outcomes of what could have been if a young college graduate caught the bus that he actually missed on the day of a job interview.

page214.title: 7G Rainbow Colony
page214.description: An underachiever falls in love with a girl who has just moved into his neighborhood. He goes to extremes to express his love for her, but she keeps rejecting his advances.
